choices: You decide not to approach her (but run into her later).
Ramona thinks you're taking to long to decide and pulls you away.
1.content:
You get dressed and are ready to head out. The school was not too far from your house, so you could walk. You had a licence, but because of the move, a new one for Bestia had to be processed. Your eleventh grade year was just about to begin. Your parents meet you at the front door to wish you good luck.

"Have fun sweetie!" you mom says.

"Stop babying the boy." your dad tells your mother. "Have a good day son."

"Yeah, whatever." you say with an unenthusiastic attitude.

"What's wrong?" your mom asks.

"You've heard the rumors, haven't you? About how high school girls on this planet are about boys?" you ask. "They fight over them, and some girls even resort to intimidation to get a guy. Their hormones are out of control at this stage in life! I have nothing against furries, but why did we move here?"

"We went over this, son," you dad explains. "We want you to experience new things. You're always so shut out from the world, so we decided to move to a new one. We only had your well being in mind."

"Yeah yeah," you say. "I gotta go, Ramona's waiting on me."

As you meet up with Ramona, the two of you make your way to school.

"Don't you have a licence?" you ask Ramona.

"Yeah, but what I don't have is my own car." she quickly answers back. "Besides it's more fun to walk and talk with my best friend."

"We've only known each other for two days." you remind Ramona.

"Oh details, details." she says with a carefree air about her. Then her smile turned into a frown. "Don't look now, here comes asshole if the year."

The person she was referring to was none other than Luke, who was walking across the street to see you two.

"I'm surprised the school decided to allow you to set foot in the halls." he says with a smirk.

"Good morning to you too, Luke." you say sarcastically.

"Ah, being a little overzealous, are we, Earth boy?" he says, seemingly unfazed by your remark. "Well I'd like to stay and chat, but i have more important things to do."

"Is one of those things being a complete tool?" you say with a smirk.

Luke looked at you with an angry frown. "Watch it, [your name]." he says. "I'm about this close to beating the shit out of you right now."

Just then, Ramona pushed Luke away from you. "FUCK OFF!" she yells.

Luke was aware that Ramona had fully developed her transformation powers, so he decided to back off. "Count your blessings, human. You're lucky that fatty is here to protect you." he says before walking off like the rat that he was.

"LUKE!!!" Ramona yells, but you just grab her shoulder. "He's not worth it." you tell her. Ramona calms down. "You're right. fuck him." she says. You look at your watch. "Uh oh. We're gonna be late if we don't get a move on." you say.

After you arrive at school, Ramona senses that you're nervous. "You've got nothing to worry about, dude." she says confidently. "The girls won't be obsessing over you like that. Besides, you're not much to look at anyway." You gave her a look. "I'm kidding!" she reassures. "Now get your ass in there!"

You walk into the school, and you see that there's nothing but girls at the school, with with exception of a few boys. All the girls turn and look at you, then they rush over to you and bombard you with questions and compliments.

"Wow! You're a human!"

"Did you really move here from Earth?"

"Are you really going to school here?"

"Oh my God You're so cute!"

You nervously chuckle. "Sorry girls, but I've got to go." you say. You sneak out of the crowd, make your way to your locker and see Ramona at hers. "See?" she says. "Usually, they would've tried to grope you by now." You could tell that she was serious. Just then something catches your eye: A beautiful cat furry standing just down the hall. She had thick, slightly messy blonde hair that went down to the middle of her back, silky orange fur with some stripes of a deeper orange, beautiful green eyes, and a lovely, bushy tail.

"That's Chloe Benson." Ramona says to you, breaking you out of your trance. "You didn't think that I wouldn't catch you staring at her did you?"

"Shut up, Ramona!" you tell her.

"So what now hotshot, you gonna talk to her or not?"
1.title: First Day

choices: "I...don't know. I'll have to think about it."
11.content:
You smirk and say "Just watch me." As you confidently stride over towards Chloe.



You were certain you could at least get Chloe to notice you. Hell, you just walked in the door and you literally have half the school clamoring over you. Granted, you hadn't intended for it to be that way, but still, that must mean something. You straighten your hair and check your breath as you come up behind Chloe before tapping her on the shoulder.



She turns around and looks surprised to see you. "Hello." You say in your best charmer voice. "Hi." Says Chloe, somewhat suspicously. "I'm new here, and..." "Oh right, I've heard of you." Chloe interupts. "You're that Earth boy."



"Yeah, anyway, I'm not familiar with this school, and I thought maybe you could show me around?"



Chloe glances at the hall clock. "Well, we've got ten minutes before the bell rings, so I guess I could." So Chloe shows you around the school, showing you were the library, gym, lunchroom, etc was. She finishes her little tour with three minutes until the bell rings. "That's pretty much it. any questions?"



"Just one. would you go out with me this Friday?"



Needless to say, Chloe was surprised that you would ask her this when you had just met her not ten minutes ago. Hell, you even surprised yourself by saying it. For a few moments there was an awkward silence as Chloe just stares at you. "Well? What do you say?"
11.title: You approach Chloe confidently.

choices: The ring is gone! (you dropped it)
The ring is gone! (it's been stolen)
112.content:
Okay, Chloe said she wasn't sure. That didn't mean she would go out with you, but it didn't mean she wouldn't either, so you still have a chance! "Tell you what, come to my house at seven tonight, and I'll tell you if I've made my decision then."



"Alright. Fair enough."



You say your goodbyes, and turn around and head back down the hall towards Ramona. "So Cassanova, how did it go?" She asks teasingly. "Can't really say." You reply "She said she'd think about it, and tell me later tonight." "Well, at least there's a possibility of her dating you, that's more than most other guys who ask her out can say."



"Other guys?"



"Oh yeah, dozens of guys have asked her out, but she usually turns them down. Who knows, maybe you'll get lucky."




So, later that evening, you approach Chloe's house and knock on the door. When the door opens, standing in the doorway is what looks to be a smaller version of Chloe, except her hair is in pigtails. "Hello?"




"Hi, is Chloe here?"



"Chloe! There's a human boy here to see you!"



Chloe comes down the stairs and shoos the smaller cat away. "Was that..." "My little sister, yes. Come with me." You follow Chloe upstairs into her room. "So, have you made up your mind if you want to go out or not?" Chloe doesn't respond. Instead, she starts rummaging through an ornate jewlery box on her dresser.



"Do you know why I asked you to come here?"



"So you tell tell me if you decided to date me or not."



"No. What I really to do, was to give you this."



She holds up a simple golden ring. "Whoa whoa whoa!" You say "I only asked for a date, don't you think it's way too soon to get married?" "That's not what this is for." She says, sounding somewhat annoyed. "In our culture, when a male wants to be engaged, so to speak, to a female, she gives him a test to prove to her whether she can trust him or not." She places the ring in your palm and closes your fist around it. "This ring belonged to my grandmother, and means very much to me. Your test, is to take this ring, and keep it with you at all times. If you return it to me in one week, no more, no less, then I shall go out with you."



You eagerly accept, thinking that this would be simple, and you would have Chloe as your girlfriend before you knew it. How hard could keeping a ring in your pocket be?



How very wrong you were.



The next day, as you're exiting the school to head home, you reach into your pocket for what must be the umpteenth time that day, to make sure the ring is still there.
112.title: A Test of Love

1122.content:
You immediately go into panic mode the moment you realize that the ring is gone. You're disappointed in yourself for blowing your chance at getting with Chloe, you're also mad at yourself for losing something that was very valuable to her! In an attempt to find the ring, you check your other pockets, your backpack, and your locker, but to no avail. There had to be some solution to this. Luckily, you see a solution walking down the hall.


"Ramona!" you call out. She turns around and sees the worried look on your face.


"What's the problem?" she asks.


You explain the whole ring situation to Ramona, and she seems rather calm.


"Okay, no need to panic." she says. "I can help you get through this. Which pocket was the ring in?"


"This one." you say, gesturing to your left pocket.


Ramona walks up to you and gets on her knees. "What are you doing!?" you say in surprise.


"Relax," she says. "I'm not gonna blow you." She moves her face towards your pocket and sniffs inside for a few moments. All of a sudden, she stops.


"Alright, I'v got the ring's scent." she says. "However, I also got the scent of someone that isn't you, which means someone stole the ring."


"What!" you say.


"I said not to panic," she says. "I can led you to whoever stole the ring. Now let's go."


Who does the scent lead you to?
1122.title: The Search is On!

choices: Luke was lying, he has the ring
Luke was telling the truth, he doesn't have it!
11221.content:
You follow Ramona out of the school and down the street. One good thing about having a dog for a friend, if you lose something, there's no way they can't find it. At the end of the street, you see Luke stadnding at the street corner. You already know he must be the one who took the ring before Ramona even tells you so.



"What do you want, monkey boy and Ramona the Hutt?"



"Shut it, ya prick! We know you stole Chloe's ring from me, now hand it over!"



Luke smirks. "What if I don't?" Ramona growls "Then I'll have to punish you." Luke just laughs "You think I'm afraid of you? You humans are all as weak as a..." Luke is cut off mid sentence as you punch him square in the stomach. He clutches his gut as he crumbles to his knees, gasping for air.



"Next time, it's gonna be a lower blow, now hand over the ring!" Luke just glares up at you with clenched teeth. "You'd never have had the balls to hit me if your friend, Chubby, wasn't here to protect you." That was the last straw for Ramona. "That's it! I'm fat, am I? I'll show you what heavy is!' Ramona pushes Luke onto his back, and shoots up to four times her height, before turning around, and bringing her rear down on top of Luke, crushing the air from his lungs.



"Maybe spending some time beneath my ass will teach you some manners."


Luke bangs on Ramona's rump with his fist, and desperately tries to push her off, but it was a hopeless endeavor. Ramona just crosses her legs and smiles to herself. "I'm not gonna get up until you give us the ring."



"I haven't got any fucking ring!!!"



"(your name), search him."



Your reach underneath Ramona's rump, blushing slightly as you did, and felt around Luke's pocket.
11221.title: You Should Have Known

112211.content:
Apparently, Luke forgot that female furries could sense when someone is lying, because you find the ring buried deep in his pocket.


"What do we have here?" you say. "I knew you were lying."


You put the ring back in your pocket as Luke continues to struggle underneath Ramona. "Alright, you got the ring." he says. "Can you let me go now."


You suppose that he's had enough. "Okay Ramona, you can get off of him. We got what we wanted."


"Aw, come on. Just five more minutes." she says. "Don't forget that he called me fat."


You think for a moment. You didn't need Ramona to walk home with you, so why stop her from enjoying herself? "Alright, go ahead." you say, as you walk home. For the remainder of the week, you tie the ring to a string and wear it around your neck under your shirt. On the day you're supposed to return the ring to Chloe, you walk over to her house after school and knock on the door. Who answers?
112211.title: Dishonesty Fail

1122112.content:
When the door opens, you see it was Chloe's sister who answered. "Oh hi, um...." you pause mid sentence, having never gotten Chloe's sister's name. "It's Cora." She says " My mom and my sister are out doing errands right now. Want to come in?" You step inside and sit on the sofa in the living room. "So, my sister gave you grandma's ring. do you still have it?" You take the ring from around your neck and hold it up. "Yep. This'll show your sister she can trust me."



"Oh no it won't!"



Without warning, Cora grabs the ring and yanks it out of your hand, then takes off through the house. "Cora! Get back here!" You cry as you run after her. Being a cat, Cora was much faster than you, so she was easily able to keep ahead of you. Sometimes you would come around a corner just barely in time to see her tail disappear around another. "Cora! Give me back that ring! Chloe will never speak to me again if I don't give it back!"



"That's the idea!"



Finally, you lose track of Cora, and search all over the house for her. "Cora, I don't have time for your games!" After several minutes of searching you find Cora in the hallway closet. "Alright, I found you, now give me the ring!" Cora smirks "That was never part of the game." "Goddammit Cora, Chloe could be home at any minute! Give it to me now!"



"I can't. I haven't got it."



Cora holds out her hands to show you that they're empty. "Where is it?" "I've hidden it somewhere in the house. If you find it in time, then my sister might go out with you after all. If not, and she hates your guts for losing her ring, then you can always have me instead." So that's what this was about. Cora wanted you as her boyfriend, and was jealous of Chloe. With a grunt of frustration, you search every nook and cranny of the house as fast as you can, but after an hour, you still haven't found it.



Your heart stops beating for a second as you hear a car pulling into the driveway outside. Chloe was home! With no time left, you turn to Cora and say "If you don't tell me where that ring is, I'm going to tell Chloe it was you that lost it." Cora just smiles and says "Fine. I'll tell you where it is...."
1122112.title: Hide and Seek

choices: "It's a good thing that ring was a fake."
11221121.content:
"You WHAT!?" you say, hoping that Cora was joking.


"I said I swallowed the ring." she repeats. "It was a little bitter, but I was able to force it down."


"Dammit!" you yell. "And I was so close."


"Awwwww." she says with a condescending tone. "Don't be so sad. Look on the bright side. At least you can have me."


"Are you mental?" you say. "Why would I even consider going out with you after what you just did? Besides that, you're, like eleven!"


"I'm thirteen." she says, with an annoyed look on her face.


"Even so, you're dreaming if you think I'd go out with you." you say. "Besides, you forgot one thing."


"Oh, really?" she asks. "And what's that?"


"I can just tell Chloe what you did, and she will know I'm not lying." you say.


"You're not gonna tell her." she says, and she pushes you down on the ground and crawls on top of you. Her eyes then start to widen, trapping you in a trance-like state. You have an idea of what she's trying to do, but for some reason, you can't react. Cora was about to start commanding you, but then some of her hair tickles your nose.


"Ah.... Ah.... ACHOOOOOOO!!!!"


The sneeze stuns Cora long enough for you to get out from under her. You quickly get down the stairs and sit on the couch, waiting for Chloe. The front door opens, and you see Chloe and someone who you assume to be her mother.


"[Your name]?" she says. "What are you doing here?"


"Your sister let me in." you say.


"Oh, so this is the boy that you gave mother's ring to." says Chloe's mother.


"Speaking of which, do you have it with you?" Chloe asks.


"I did, but when I got here, your sister took it from me." you explain.


"She did, did she?" she says with an unconvinced tone.


"That doesn't sound like Cora." her mother says.


"Spoken like a true oblivious mom." you think.


"Chloe, I know you're mad, but please believe me." you plead. "I know you can tell that I'm not lying."


Chloe looks at you for a minute and sighs. "You're right. You are telling the truth." she says. "Honestly, though, I'm impressed enough that you were up front and honest about not having the ring."


"CORA!" Chloe's mom yells. "GET DOWN HERE!"


Cora slowly walks into the living room. "Where's the ring?" her older sister asks.


She was going to lie, but she glanced at the look on her mother's face. "I.... I swallowed it." she says.


What is Chloe's reaction?
11221121.title: That Can't Be Healthy

choices: "Well, you returned the ring, so yes."
"No. After that little event, I have to give you a different test."
112211211.content:
Cora screams as she her sister comnes towards her, chasing her around the house. Chloe's mother just sighs, as though this sort of thing happens all the time. When Cora comes back around the corner, she grabs her and places her down in a chair. "Relax chloe." She says "I know how to get your ring back. Go get a bucket. (your name), make sure she stays in that seat."



Chloe goes to fina a bucket, as her mother heads into the kitchen. You stand by Cora, making sure she didn't move an inch. You could tell by the look on her face that she was close to wetting herself. You can't really say you feel sorry for her, after all, she brought this on herself.



Chloe comes back with a bucket, while her mother comes back with rubber gloves on, and a bottle of castor oil. She hands the bottles to Cora "Drink it." She says in a commanding tone. "No way!' Says Cora "I'm not drinking that stuff!"



"It's either that, or we take you to the hospital and they cut the ring out of you."



That quickly changed Cora's mind, as she grabs the bottles and chugs down a third of it. For a moment, she looks rather ill, even turning a little green, until finally she heaves forward and vomits into the bucket. You and Chloe both look away as this goes on for several seconds. Chloe's mother waits for her daughter to finish before taking the bucket into the kitchen.



She picks the regugitated ring out of the bucket and rinses it in the sink before giving back to Chloe. "Thanks a lot, Ms. Benson." You say "I was really worried Chloe wouldn't speak to me again after that." "It's no problem dear." She says "Besides, I'm a mom. Trust me, I've cleaned worse messes."



As Chloe's mother sends Cora to her room, you turn to Chloe and ask "Well, did I pass your little test?" Chloe thinks for as minute before saying...
112211211.title: Improvised Gastric Bypass Surgery

choices: "Not yet. There's still one more thing."
11223.content:
Ramona actually gets down on all fours with her nose to the ground and begins crawling along the ground, sniffing every inch. You quickly follow her , as she leads you out of the school, down the road, across the street, and comes to a stop in front of Chloe's house. "I don't understand." She says "The scent leads to here. Could you have possibly dropped the ring here when Chloe gave it to you yesterday?"



"I couldn't have, it was in my pocket this morning."



"Well, I don't know what to tell you, 'cause this is where the trail ends."



Now what are you supposed to do? Tell Chloe you lost her most reasured possesion less than a day after she gave it to you? How would she ever trust you after that? But, then again, she would know if you lied, so either way, she wouldn't be able to trust you. You decide that it's better to face the music and just tell her straight up. You hang your head low as you slowly walk up to Chloe's porch.



"What are you doing?" Asks Ramona.



"Going to ruin any chance I have of being with Chloe."



You knock on the door, and Chloe answers.



"(your name)? What are you doing here?"



"Chloe, there's really no easy way to say this, so I'm just going to say it. I've lost your ring. Someone snatched it from my pocket at school."



You expected Chloe to be mad, maybe even slap you. but to your surprise, she smiles. "Congratulations." she says "You passed." Needless to say, you were confused. "What are you talking about?" "Do you know why I didn't outright turn you down when you asked me on a date?"


You shake your head.



"Not only can female furries sense when someone is lying, but we can sense people's personalities as well. Must other guys who asked me out before, only wanted to get into my pants. But you, I could sense something different about you, sincere affection. I was the one who pickpocketed the ring from you. My real test for you, was to see if you would be honest with me, and you were."



"So, does this mean we're together now?"
11223.title: Appearances Can be Decieving

112232.content:
"There's still one more thing that I need to find out about you." she says.


"Oh really?" you ask. "What?"


Chloe walks up to you, and out of nowhere, she plants a kiss on you and holds it for about ten seconds. After she lets you go, you and Ramona are left standing in shock.


"What the hell was that?" she asks.


"Well, Ramona," Chloe answers. "I wanted to see if (your name) was a good kisser, and he is."


"I am?" you ask in disbelief, since that was your first ever kiss, and you weren't even putting any effort into it.


"Yes, you are." she answers. "And I could tell that you weren't even trying." She then takes out a notepad and writes an address on it, then gives it to you. "Meet me here on Friday night at eight. Dress casual." With that, Chloe walks inside and shuts her door.
112232.title: The Final Test

113.content:
Chloe nervously chuckles and says "Sorry, I don't date humans." This was a serious blow to you, but you play it off as best as you can. "Oh, well that's fine then." you say. "I'll see you around, I guess."


As soon as your back was turned to Chloe, the look on your face takes a dramatic U-turn from where it was just a minute ago. Ramona walks over to you and puts her arm around you, as if she's your big sister. "It's alright, man. Shake it off, shake it off." she says. Hearing her try to comfort you makes you feel a little better. "Look at it this way," she says, "There are lots of other girls. It's not the end of the world."


She was right. If Chloe doesn't want to go on a date with you, that's her loss. As you and Ramona walk to homeroom, you turn the corner and bump into somebody. You're stunned for a second, and when you get yourself together, you see a female furry sitting on the floor, rubbing her head. She was a fox furry with goldish-brown fur, with white fur covering her muzzle, chest, hands, and lower legs. The tips of her ears were black, her eyes were yellow, and she had purple hair with purplish-pink bangs. Her hair was tied back in a long braid, with some of it hanging loose over her shoulders. She was wearing a short blue tank top that showed off her midsection, and jeans that went just below her knees.


"Oh, I'm so sorry." you say.


"It's not your fault." she says, getting on her feet. "I wasn't watching where I was going." She then takes a good look at you. "Hey, you're that human boy everyone's talking about! I didn't know you were friends with Ramona."


"We live next door to each other." Ramona explains.


"That's cool." the vixen says. She then puts out her hand. "I'm Lucy. Nice to meet you."


"Same here," you say as you shake Lucy's hand.... err... paw.


When the three of you get to homeroom, Lucy tells you that she's been very interested in humans since Bestia made contact with them. You found out that the two of you actually have a lot in common. At lunch, Ramona introduces you to Colin, a male mouse furry. After school, you were getting your things and were heading to the exit, when you see two furries talking in an empty hallway. Who do you see.
113.title: Shot Down!

1131.content:
As you come around the corner, you see Lucy and Ramona talking to each other. They didn't seem to notice you, so you quickly duck back around the corner to listen in on them. You kind of feel bad for eavesdropping on your best friend, but from the sound of it, they're talking about you.



"So she just out right rejected him, just like that?"



"Yeah. He tried to hide it, but I could just tell the poor guy was crushed."



"All because he's a human? What does she have against humans anyway?"



"I don't know, but at least she let him down gently."



"Even still, she could have at least taken the time to get to know him first before deciding that. Hell, I just met him this morning and he's seems like a sweet boy to me. I'd go out with him in a heartbeat."



You feel your face burn red as you heard that last part. "You know what?" Says Ramona. "We should do something to cheer him up. Something special. "Like what?" Asks Lucy. Ramona must have whispered what she had in mid to Lucy, because you couldn't hear what she said next.



You hear Lucy giggle. "Oh, he's just gonna love that!" They continue talking as you hear their voices become fainter as they head for the exit. When you're sure they're gone, you head there yourself. As your reach the bottom of the entrance stairs, you run into someone your were hoping not to see for the rest of the day. Who is it?
1131.title: Lucy and Ramona

11312.content:
"Oh, God. Spare me." you say to yourself as you see Luke. His face turns hostile when he sees you, and he walks up to you. "Look, can we make this fast? I wanna go home." you say.


"Trust me, I don't want to see you any more than you want to see me." he says. "I just came to tell you to stay away from Chloe. She's MY girlfriend!" That partially explains why she turned you down. Plus, it makes sense: Luke doesn't like humans, Chloe doesn't date humans. "Dude, she was only showing me around. Don't get your tail in a knot." you say. "Besides, I'm not even interested in her."


"And one other thing." he adds. "Whaaaaat?" you say in a frustrated voice. "What are you doing hanging around my cousin?" he asks.


"Who are you talking about?" you ask.


"Lucy! Who else?"


"Wait, Lucy is your cousin!?" you ask in disbelief. You thought that it was just a coincidence that they were both foxes and had similar names. "Yeah, she is my cousin." Luke answers. "So why are you hanging around her?"


"Well, unlike you, she finds humans to be interesting." you say.


"I always thought that she wasn't right in the head." he says.


"Besides, I think she can choose who to be around without your consent. It's not like you're her father." you say.


"Whatever, do what you want with her. I don't care." he says, turning around.


"If you didn't care, why did you bring up the subject?" you ask. Luke doesn't answer and walks away. "Prick." you think to yourself.


The rest of the week goes by smoothly. You get to know Lucy a bit more, but every once in a while, you see Chloe and Luke together, which irritates you a little bit every time. On Friday night, you walk home alone, since Ramona and Lucy left earlier than you. When you get home, you unlock the door with your key, since your parents were still at work. When you walk inside, you're surprised to see...
11312.title: A Little Warning

choices: Florida. Sandy beaches and plenty of sun
113121.content:
To your surprise, when you walk in the door, you see Lucy and Ramona sitting in your living room. "What are you guys doing here?" Ramona smiles. "Well, I noticed how being rejected by Chloe made you feel, so Lucy and I decided to do something for you to cheer you up."



"Well, I really am touched that you would do that, but it's not really neccesary."



"Even so," Says Lucy "It's not a matter of we had to, it's a matter of we want to. Besides, I think you'll really enjoy what we got for you." She pulls something out of her pocket and hands it to you. It's a travel brochure for a trip to Earth! "You guys seriously went through the trouble of arranging for me to take a vacation back to Earth?"



"Well, it's not just for you." Says Lucy "We're going with you. I always wanted to visit Earth, and Ramona's mom works at the spaceport, so we got the tickets cheap. We'll be spendsing a whole week together, just the three of us."



"But we have school come Monday." You say "How are we..." "Time works differently on Bestia than on Earth." Ramona says "A week on Earth is equal to a weekend here." "But where will we stay when we get to Earth? It costs money to stay at a hotel."



"I've got a few savings bonds stashed away." Says Ramona. "I can cash them in, and exchange it for earth currency when we get there. All that's left, is to decide where to go. Any ideas?"
113121.title: Homesick

choices: Ramona. She is your closest fiend.
Lucy. She might like it, since you overheard that she sort-of likes you.
1131212.content:
You had always wanted to go to Paris. You had an opportunity around the end of your tenth grade year. Your class was going on a trip to Paris, but your parents couldn't afford to pay for your ticket. Looking back on it now, you realize that they were saving the money for you to move to Bestia. At first you didn't want to come here, but now that you have friends like Ramona and Lucy, you're glad you came.


"Hello? Anyone home?" Ramona says, waving her paw in front of your face.


"Sorry about that." you say. "I was deep in thought."


"Have you decided where to go?" Lucy asks. "It's your call."


"We can go to Paris." you say.


"Awesome choice!" she says.


You spent the night preparing for your trip, You parents were happy to let you go. The figured that they owed you for not letting you go to Paris the last time you had the chance. Plus, they were happy to see that you were making friends. The next day, you meet Ramona and Lucy at the spaceport and take the long journey to France. When you finally got to the hotel where you would be staying, all of you plop on one of the beds, exhausted.


"I've been thinking." you say.


"What?" asks Ramona.


"The whole 'time' thing." you say. "One week here is two days on Bestia, and I've spent a week and two days there, which means over four weeks have passed here."


"And?" asks Lucy, not knowing what you were getting at.


"This means that when I was born on Earth, you guys were only a few years younger than you are now." you say.


"Got a problem with older women?" they ask, giggling.


"I didn't mean it like that." you say. "It was just a thought." You sit up, and then you realize that the hotel room has only two beds, meaning that you had to share one with either Ramona or Lucy. Who do you pick?
1131212.title: Voulez Vous Coucher Avec Moi?

choices: The beach is a nude beach!
11312122.content:
Lucy was more than happy to share a bed with you. Actually, she seemed rather thrilled to do so. Ramona was also happy, because this meant she would get a whole bed to her self. "Besides," she said "you wouldn't want to sleep next to me anyway, I kick in my sleep."



That night, the three of you decided you might as well get some sleep now, seeing as you had a busy day tommorow. Well, that, and every channel on the TV was in french. In the middle of the night, you awaken to find Lucy pressed up againt your body, with her arm wrapped tightly around you. At first, you didn't know what to do, but soon you started to enjoy it. Lucy's fur felt warm and fuzzy against your skin, and in helped you relax.



You fell back to sleep, only to wake up again when you feel something long and wet slide repeatedly across your cheek. You look out the corner of your eye to see that Lucy was licking you in her sleep! She stops for a moment, and mutters "Mmmm, (your name), you're so sweet. How did you know I liked this band?" She must be dreaming about the two of you at a concert or something.



You can't help but smile at the fact that Lucy was dreaming about you. On the other hand, you weren't sure if you felt that way about Lucy. Sure, she was a nice girl, but you haven't really known her for that long. You ponder the mater some more before finally falling asleep again.



The next morning, you, Lucy, and Ramona are eating breakfast in the hotel dinning room. "So, what should we do on our first day?" You ask. "I've heard France has some really nice beaches." Says Lucy "How about we spend the day there?" "One problem." Says Ramona "I didn't bring a bathing suit."



"No big deal." Says Lucy "We can just buy you one somewhere. So for about half an hour, you and Lucy waited outisde the chnging booth at the local clthing store, while Ramona tried on different swim suits, finally settling on a blue one-piece. All three of you take a taxi to the beach, but when you get there, you see something that makes your heart sink.
11312122.title: Nocturnal Emmisions

choices: The girls are able to convince you.
You all decide to go to another beach.
113121221.content:
Your eyes widen as you see that nobody at the beach was wearing any clothes whatsoever. You even see an elderly couple sunbathing, which makes you shudder in disgust. You mentally kick yourself for not checking if the beach was a nude beach or not.


"Well, looks like I wasted my money." says Ramona.


"It's not like we have to stay here." you say. "There are other beaches."


"Well, we're already here." says Lucy. "We should just go with it." Your instincts tell you she's only saying that because she most likely wants to see you naked. You look at Ramona for some support, but you get the opposite.


"I'm with Lucy on this one." she says. "There's no harm in going to a nude beach. Besides, it's not like we know anyone here. To the people at the beach, we're just another group of tourists."


"Yeah, but don't you guys feel the least bit uncomfortable with being naked in public?" you ask.


"Not really." they answer.


"Well, I kind of do." you say.


"Got a secret in your pants that you don't want us to know?" Ramona asks with a grin.


"No!" you say.

The debate on whether to stay or to go continues until-
113121221.title: Au Naturel

1131212211.content:
After several minutes of debating, you finally sigh in defeat, reluctantly agreeing to stay on this beach. The girls begin removing their bathing suits, seeming to enjoy teasing you while they did it. Before long, they both stood in front of you, with only their fur covering them. "Well?" Says Ramona. "We're waiting." She indicates your swim trunks. With another sigh, your grab your trunks and pll them down. At least Ramona and Lucy were nice enough not to make any remarks.



As the three of you try to find a place to lay out your towels, you keep thinking to yourself, there's no one you know here, you just blend in with the crowd. The three of you find a spot close to the water. As you lay back on the sand, Lucy and Ramona on either side of you, you noticed that there are a good amount of furries on vacation here too. Reptiles, felines, dogs, all kinds of them sunbathing or playing around in the ocean. Unfortunately, Lucy catches you staring.



"Enjoying the view?"



"Huh?"



"Oh come on! A guy your age on a beach full of naked young women? What else would you do but stare?"



"So what are you saying, that I'm some sort of pervert?"



"No. It's only natural that you would, but if you really want to stare at something, why not me?"



Lucy lays back on her towel, striking a sexy pose. You feel your face burn red as you blush. "What's wrong? You're okay with looking at other girls naked, but you can't handle me?" Says Lucy teasingly. You suddenly feel Ramona wrap her arm around you from behind. "Hey, don't I get some attention?" She says as she presses her chest against your back. You were pretty sure that by now your face was so read, your head looked like a tomato.



To make things worse, turns out you were wrong about no one you know being here, becuase you see one such person coming up the shore towards you right now. It's...
1131212211.title: Go With the Flow

11312122112.content:
Just when you thought that nothing could ruin this moment, something did. You could live with just that, but why did it have to be-


"Luke!?" Lucy exclaimed. "What the hell are YOU doing here?!"


"Well, I wanted to spend a week here with Chloe, and here I am." he answered. "What are you doing here? Especially with him."


"That's none of your business." said Lucy.


"It's only fair that you answer my question since I answered yours." he retorted.


"If you must know," Ramona interrupted, "we're spending a week here with [your name]."


"Jesus, you two must be really desperate if you're pining after a human." Luke remarked.


"It's not like that. We didn't plan to come here. We just went with the flow of things." Lucy said back. She then got up and stood face to face with her cousin. "Besides, what's so bad about humans anyway. They're cool, especially [your name]. Why do you even care who I hang out with?"


"Because you're my cousin, and if you're hanging out with a human, I'm a loser by association. I'm not letting you waste your time with him."


"There's two things wrong with that Luke." she said. "One, I'm older than you by four months, so you can't tell me what to do. Two, you know that we live in a matriarchal society, so even if you were the older cousin, you're still a little bitch compared to me!"


"Like hell I am!"


Meanwhile, you and Ramona looked at each other. "I think they forgot that they're in the middle of a beach." you said.


"Meh, nobody's really looking or anything." she said back. "Either they don't notice or they don't care."


"Even so, this argument is starting to get annoying." you said. You then got up on your feet. "Didn't you say you came here with Chloe? I don't see her with you."


"She's at the hotel. We're staying at a real fancy place, since I can afford it." Luke said, showing off.


"Wait, so you're here at a nude beach by yourself with a bunch of girls around?" Ramona rhetorically asked. "I bet Chloe would love to hear how you're cheating on her."


"Oh, please. It's not cheating if I don't touch anything." Luke said.


"You are such a scumbag." said Lucy, looking at her cousin with a look of disgust. "C'mon, you guys, let's go somewhere else." So the three of you relocated to another location at the beach. As you all got back to the hotel sometime later, you had a question.


"Guys, if female furries can sense dishonesty, and Luke was obviously lying to Chloe about where he was, why didn't Chloe sense it?" you asked.


"He probably used the 'tell the truth, but not the whole truth' loophole." Ramona explained. "Of course that sly fox would have figured that out."


Later that night, you took a shower, and when you dried off and open the bathroom door-
11312122112.title: He Never Fails to Ruin Your Day

choices: "Yeah! That little dick needs to be knocked down a notch."
113121221121.content:
You nearly jump ten feet in the air when you see Lucy standing just outside the bathroom door as you come out in only a towel. Lucy can't help but burst out laughing. "How long were you standing there?" You say, a little angry. "About five minutes." Lucy says, still giggling. "Anway, I was wondering if you would like to go out on the town with me tonight? See the sights, get something to eat?"




"You already know that Lucy kind of has the hots for you, and you get the feeling that she wants to do more than that. But, if you don't go, she might take it as you rejecting her, and the last thing you want to do is hurt her feelings. "Sure, I guess we could do that."




You could swear you heard Lucy supress a sqeal of delight as she runs off to get ready. You get dressed and meet Lucy in the hotel lobby. "Where's Ramona?" You ask "She decided to go off on her own for a while. Come on, we've got a lot to see." She grabs your arm and prectically drags you out of the hotel into the street. Your first stop was the Eiffel Tower. The two of you took the elevator up to the top, and looked out on the city. It was quite beautiful at night.



You feel Lucy place her hand over yours, and almost expect her to try to kiss you, but she doesn't. Next the two of you decided to hit a local restaurant for dinner. Unfortunatley, the entire menu was in french, so you had no idea what anything was. Fortunatley, Lucy had studied several of earth's languages and was able to translate the menu for you. That was lucky for you, because you almost ended up ordering a platefull of frog legs and snails.



After dinner, the the two of you went for a stroll in the park. "Well, this was a pleasent evening." Says Lucy happily. "Yeah." You say "And we still have six more days here." Suddenly, you see a sight that instantly makes your blood boil with rage. About then yards away from you, you see Luke and Chloe sitting on a park bench, making out. even though Chloe wasn't interested in you, the fact that she was dating a lying, cheating, racist prick like Luke just fills you with pure anger. even if she wouldn't date you, she deserves better than him!



Then, you get an idea. You could tell chloe right now how Luke had been at the nude beach this morning, that might piss her off enough to break up with him. You tell your idea to Lucy, and what does she say?
113121221121.title: Lucy asks you out.

choices: She unleashes her fury on Luke!
1131212211211.content:
An evil smile forms on your face as Lucy agrees to your idea.


"I think we should wait until they're done making out, though." she says. "I'm sure that he'd want to enjoy his last kiss with Chloe."


So the two of you wait for the happy couple (for now, at least) to finish... "embracing" each other, which didn't take much time. As the two of you walk over to them, you think to yourself about how you had a crush on Chloe. At first, you think that you're doing this because you still kind of like her, but after realizing that she just isn't your type, and that you have two other girls that care about you (especially Lucy), you quickly dismiss that.


"Well, well, well." you say. "What have we here?"


"You know, seeing you two twice in one day really makes me mad." he says back.


"Luke, you never told me that you say [your name] and Lucy earlier today." Chloe says.


"That's not the only thing he's never told you." you say. "Like the fact that he's a cheating snake!"


"We saw him at the nude beach checking out other girls." says Lucy.


"What! That can't be true! You're lying!" says Chloe, immediately denying the accusation.


"I am am I?" Lucy says. "Chloe, I have nothing against you. In fact, I think you're a great person, and you deserve better than Luke. Think about it. Has there ever been a time where he's given you a straight answer to any question regarding where he's been or what he's been doing?"


Chloe ponders for a second and her eyes widen at the fact that Luke has never done that, and her senses as a female furry told her that Lucy wasn't lying. All the while Luke was nervously sweating, and he finally stood up.


"Okay, fine, I was at the beach looking at other girls, and I've cheated on Chloe before!" he says, finally admitting it. This surprises even you and Lucy, because neither of you had been aware of the fact that Luke had been unfaithful for so long. What surprises you further is what he says afterward.


"So what if I did!?" he says. "I'm not gonna chain myself to one girl! I'm not married!"


Lucy gives her cousin a look that practically spelled disappointment. "I can't believe we're related." she says.


Chloe looks at the ground for a long time, taking in everything, until finally-
1131212211211.title: Exposed

choices: Punts him clear across the park!
11312122112112.content:
For a moment, time seemed to come to a stop, as Chloe just stared at the ground, no saying a word. But when she looked up, you knew all Hell was about to break loose. "YOU BASTARD!" You could literally see the flames in Chloe's eyes as she shoots up to twenty feet tall, casting a long, menacing shadow over Luke.



The look on Luke's face could only be described as "oh fuck" as he immediately turns and tries to run away. Chloe simply stomps her foot, causing the ground to shake just enough to knock Luke off balance, tripping him. Chloe picks luke up by his tail and holds him in front of her face.



"YOU SAID YOU LOVED ME!"



For the first time ever, you could see Luke was scared, actually on the verge of pissing his pants. Meanwhile you and Lucy stood below, enjoying the sight. Lucy actually pulled out her cell phone and was recodring the whole thing. "This is so going on Youtube." She says with a smirk.



If looks could kill, the glare Chloe was giving Luke right now would cause him to burst into flames.



"WELL? WHAT DO YOU HAVE TO SAY FOR YOURSELF?"



"Um...what can I say, I'm a ladies man?"



"WRONG ANSWER!"



With that said, Chloe lifts Luke up high over her head and...
11312122112112.title: Big Trouble

113121221121121.content:
You didn't expect it. Lucy didn't expect it, and Luke REALLY didn't expect it, but it happened. Chloe drops Luke into her mouth. She swishes him around inside her mouth for awhile, and you could've sworn you saw her bite him lightly. After a while, she spits him out onto the ground.


"I would've swallowed, but you taste terrible." she says. "Now you listen and you listen good. You're gonna go straight back to the hotel, and tomorrow, you're taking me back home. After that, don't EVER let me even see you again! Got it?"


Luke meekly nods his head and runs off to the hotel where he and Chloe were staying.


With all her anger released, Chloe shrinks back to normal size. "Thanks for exposing him, you guys." she says.


"No problem, " says Lucy. "You deserved better than him, anyway."


Chloe chuckles, then she turns to you. "I owe you an apology."


"For what?" you ask.


"I told you that I didn't date humans when in reality I just didn't want to hurt your feelings by telling you that I had a boyfriend." she says. "Even after that, you still tried to help me, so I should pay you back."


Chloe walks up to you and...
113121221121121.title: Bottoms Up!

1131212211211212.content:
To your great shock (and delight), Chloe actually kisses you square on the lips. It was only a small peck, but even so, it was amazing considering it came from the girl who had rejected you not long ago. Sure, she said she did it for a reason, but still.



But small peck or not, it was enough to make Lucy mad. "Hey! I said you deserved better than Luke! I didn'tsay you could have (your name)!"



"Why not?" Says Chloe. "He's not your property. I don't smell your scent on him." right away, you knew this was going to lead to someone getting hurt. Lucy had just saved Chloe from a bad relationship, and how does she thank her? By trying to seduce you. Even though you had never said Lucy was officially your girlfriend, she apparently took you agreeing to go out with her as a confirmation.



On the other hand, even though you were pretty much over Chloe, you couldn't help but feel tempted to go with her over Lucy. Sure, Lucy was a nice girl, but you did have a crush on Chloe first, where as you weren't even sure if you felt the same way for Lucy.




Needless to say, while you were lost in your thoughts, Chloe and Lucy were busy arguing.



"He liked me first!"



"You turned him down!"



That was only so I wouldn't hurt his feelings!'



"Oh, don't hurt his feelings by breaking his heart, yeah that makes sense!"



You could see that this was going to come to blows being exchanged, so you quickly step in between them. "Hey! Settle down now, the both of you!" Chloem looks across from you to Lucy and says "How about we let him choose?" Lucy agrees, confident that you'll choose her over Chloe. So, it's up to you, who do you pick?
1131212211211212.title: A Love Triangle If There Ever Was One

11312122112112121.content:
"I... choose... Lucy." you say. Lucy immediately squeals with joy as she hugs you tightly.


"Oh, well." says Chloe. "I guess it can't be helped. I'll see you guys at school next week. Or is it two days?"


Lucy chuckles. "Yeah, see you around."


"Whoa, whoa, whoa." you say. "Let me get this straight. Not too long ago, you two were fighting over me, and now that I've made my choice you're civil again? Did I miss something."


"Well, this isn't unusual, [your name]," says Chloe. "This is what almost always happens when a guy chooses which girl he wants to be with. We put it behind us. It's just part of our culture."


"I will never understand furries." you think.


Later that night, you and Lucy go back to your hotel room. It was empty, so Ramona must still be out. You and Lucy sit on the bed and start chatting.


"Has anyone ever told you that you talk in your sleep?" you ask her.


"No, why." she asks back.


"Because you were hugging me tightly last night, licking my face in my sleep, then you were talking to me as if we were on a date." you say.


Lucy's face burns red, embarrassed at the fact that she did all of that. "I guess you figured out that I liked you right then, huh?"


"Actually no," you say. "I overheard you saying that you would go out with me in a heartbeat."


"You little sneak!" she says, playfully shoving you. "You were eavesdropping!"


"Guilty."


"You know, I'm gonna have to punish you for that."


"How."


"I'm gonna kiss you."


"And how is that a punishment?"


"Because I'm not gonna let you stop for air." without warning, Lucy forces her lips on you while pushing you down onto the bed so that she was on top of you. Like she said, she wasn't letting you get any air. This continues for a while until-
11312122112112121.title: Culture Shock

113121221121121211.content:
Despite the fact that you were starting to suffocate, you were actually enjoying this. That is, of course, until you hear the door open and your blood freezes in your veins. Lucy finally removes her lips from yours long enough for you to take a breath, as you both turn to see Ramona standing in the doorway, staring at you.



For what seemed like hours, the three of you just stood there, frozen in the awkwardness of the situation. Then finally, Ramona bursts out laughing. "What's so funny?" you ask. "Well, for one, the look on your faces!" says Ramona between fits of laughter "And two, if you two wanted to suck each other's faces, you could have picked a more private spot!"



After she stopped laughing, the three of you tell each other how the night went. "So where did you go?" Lucy asks Ramona. "Well, first I went to this restaraunt, but I couldn't understand the menu, and ended up ordering something they called "Grapes Suzy" or something like that."



"Crepes Suzette."



"Yeah, that. Then I found this museum, where the was a gigantic crowd gathered around this one painting, "Moaning Lisa" I think it was called. Didn't look like anything special to me."



"You mean the Mona Lisa."



"Whatever. After that, I just wandered around the city, enjoying the sights. How about you guys?" You tell her about your night with Lucy. She especially enjoys the part where you ratted out Luke to Chloe, Lucy even shows her the video of it. Then you get to the argument with Chloe and Lucy, and your decision on them.



"So, does this mean you and Lucy are...you know... boyfirend and girlfriend?"
113121221121121211.title: Well..........This is Awkward

choices: You run into Chloe during lunch
You're ambushed on the way to lunch
Ramona wants to talk to you in private
12.content:
You slowly walked towards the cat furry, despite the fact she was surrounded by a few other girls, and what Ramona said you felt you had to talk to her, one of those you'd regret it for years to come if you didn't moments. You cautiously approached the group, you watched each of the girl's gaze, doing your best to not be noticed even though you were walking through an empty hallway, although you could feel Ramona's gaze never once leave your back. You made it about a foot from her before she decided to turn, straight towards you, here eyes meeting with yours. You froze in place, any thought of a hello dissipating on your lips as her deep green eyes transfixed you, although your small trance didn't last long as you felt something latch itself onto you.

"Hey Chloe, it's that boy from Earth, isn't he just so cute" you hear from beside you. Turning your head slightly you see a smaller cream-coloured rabbit furry latched tightly onto your arm her ample chest surrounding your arm. Although she was smaller than you for the moment you could feel her becoming larger each second she held onto you. However before she could become as tall as you Chloe walked over and gently pushed the rabbit furry off you. "Janice what exactly do you think you're doing?" Chloe says her gaze becoming a piercing stare as she looked at the other fur.

"What do you mean what am I doing? Look at him he's adorable, I just wanna cuddle him a bit.....maybe take him behind the school and have some fun..."Janice replies her voice trailing off at the end. Chloe for her part looked quite the opposite of what you would have expected, she looked almost disgusted with the rabbit fur, although you had no idea why as Ramona told you that Janice's behaviour was normal. She turned to you for a second "sorry about that, I'm Chloe Benson by the way" she says a small very cute smile crossing her features.

"Yeah.... I'm [Steven]" you reply, she continues to smile although you could feel the rest of the female furs moving closer "see you later" you say quickly before running back over to Ramona. Ramona for her part was just standing there looking more than a little shocked "wow I didn't expect you to get out of there unscathed" she says "I knew Chloe was a good girl, but I wasn't expecting her to defend you"

"Yeah, you wouldn't happen to know why she would do something like that would you Ramona?" you ask. She just shakes her head in reply, "I've known Chloe for a few years, but as I said, if you were on your own....well you probably wouldn't be a virgin for very long, so I don't know why she'd stand up for you. Although it is possible that she might like you" Ramona says playfully pushing you. "Sure sure" you reply. Ramona looked like she had another remark but just as she was about to speak the bell rang for your next class. "Race you to class" Ramona says before taking off.

"Ramona wait up" you yell running after her, thankfully you were able to catch up to her as she stood outside a classroom "don't do that" you say glaring at her as you catch up "you're not only my guard but my only guide to this school at the moment." Ramona smiled at you "sorry, you're right I really shouldn't have left you, forgive me?" she says a slight whine escaping her lips as her head turned slightly to the side, her eyes seeming to grow big and teary.

"Alright, alright I forgive you, just stop giving me that look" you say her face instantly changing from the sad pouty look she was giving you to a smile before she walked into the classroom. "Ramona you are such a cheat" you mutter to yourself before you follow her into the classroom. Like the hallway the classroom was filled with female furs, although thankfully your first class was mathematics, which you normally loathed, but it was one of the few classes with a male teacher. Like the hall you were swarmed with female furs trying to get your attention either through compliments or questions, a few even trying to cop a feel, although Ramona hit their hands away. Thankfully it only lasted a few seconds before Mr.Markus, cleared his throat "girls I know you are all excited about our newest student, however your hormones will not delay or interrupt my class, now everyone sit down or else" he barks, being a dog furry this was literal. Every girl expect Ramona went scrabbling for a seat, their eyes coming to focus squarely on Mr.Markus, you choose an empty seat and sit down Ramona taking the desk to your right.

"Now class we're going to start with some very simple algebra" he says moving to the board and writing down a question. "Alright can anyone solve the equation?" he asks. You raise your hand and he nods in your direction, "X = 2, Y = 3" you say, he smiles "very good, that is correct, now moving on" he says. This continued for a few minutes although you were the only one who ever answered any of the questions, and you weren't the only one who noticed. Finally Mr. Markus had enough "Ms. Thierson could you answer this next question?" he asks. "Umm...what?" she says her head snapping back to face Mr. Markus, you could see him frown, "ladies if you are not going to be able to pay attention just because there is one boy in the classroom we are going to have real problems" he says.

Ramona raises her hand and he nods in her direction "the answer is X = 5, Y = 6, Z = 2" she says. Mr. Markus literally sighs in relief "thank you Ms. Barks, it's nice to know at least one of the girls in my class can pay attention, as for the rest of you I will not lie, you don't have to pay attention in my class, however I can and will fail you do I make myself clear" he says. A smattering of "yes Mr.Markus" was the only reply he got. He sighed and got back to his lessons, before long the bell sounded for the class to change and Ramona led you to your next class which was English, thankfully you had a male teacher for English as well so the girls were kept relatively under control during the start of the class. Though there were only 3 male teachers in the whole school, even if you lucked out and got the 3rd, there were 4 classes in a day. English however went much differently then math, the girls were focused quite intently on the class, a few girls even using their ability to grow larger to make sure they were the ones chosen to answer questions.

You were quite happy that you weren't having to answer all the questions as although you were smart, you didn't know everything and even though you knew it wasn't really your fault you didn't like the fact that it was your mere presence was disturbing the math class. You gave off a very soft sigh, although Ramona apparently heard it as you felt a pencil jab you in the arm, you turned to look at her and she quietly passed you a note. "What's wrong?" it asked. You stared at her for a few seconds debating wether to tell her before quickly writing on the opposite side "math" and passing it back. You pass it back and she looked confused at your answer "what about math?" she writes back. "I'm a distraction" you reply, and she gives you a small smile she was about to pass you another note before you hear a loud "ahem" and the two of you look up to see Mr. Snythe the teacher staring at the two of you "are you two passing notes?" he says his gaze switching between the two, "she was just giving me direction on how to get to places since I don't know my way around" you say.

Mr.Snythe stare at you for a second before nodding "very well, but could you please wait till after my class and do it then" he says. You nod and he walks back to the front of the class continuing his lecture, the class soon ending after that.
12.title: You approach Chloe shyly.

121.content:
Lunchtime rolled around and you and Ramona were in the lunch area looking for a place to sit. You turn to look to your right and you bump right into somebody. It was Chloe.

"Oh, hello." you say.

"Hi." she says back. "We've got to stop meeting like this."

"Anyway," Ramona says. "I see an empty table over there. Wanna sit with us, Chloe?"

"Sure." she says.

So the three of you spent lunch together, talking and laughing. You felt so good having Chloe around you. She had a presence about her that you found very attractive. At the end of the day you, Ramona, and Chloe meet up at the front door of the school, then somebody comes along that ruins your mood: Luke.

"What the hell do you think you're doing?" he asks you.

"What are you blabbering about, Luke?" you ask, not in the mood.

"You're hanging out with MY girlfriend!" he says.

Chloe lets out a frustrated sigh while rubbing her temple. "We've been over this, Luke." she said. "I'm not your girlfriend, I never was, and I never will be."

You and Ramona stifled some giggles.

"She's right." Ramona says after getting herself together." You've been saying that Chloe was your girlfriend since middle school. You know that you're not getting any. Give it up, already."

Luke turns red and walks away without another word. The three of you laugh as you leave the school building.

"Well, my mom's picking me up in a few minutes." Chloe says. "I'll see you guys tomorrow."

"Bye." you and Ramona say.

As the two of you began to walk back home, you tell Ramona: "Man, Chloe is so cute."

"Ask her out, then." she says.

"What? I can't do that!" you say.

"Why?"
