This was coming off to a good start, you've made friends with the girl of your dreams (even though you met her a few hours ago). Just then the teacher walks in. He was a male skunk furry with glasses. You knew that male furries could enhance any of their five senses, especially hearing, so you decide to keep quiet.

The teacher, Mr. Jonah, explained how his class worked. You were partly paying attention, until he came to one part in particular.

"To encourage student interaction and to help you enhance your study habits, I've paired up each student with another at random so you can be study partners."

This is it. Your chance to get close to Chloe. But wait, there were twenty students in the class, including you. What are the odds that-

"The first pair is [your name], and Chloe Benson." At that point, you wanted to jump out out of your seat, but you manage to contain yourself.

After that class, the rest of the school day went by pretty quickly. Not even Luke could bring you down now. As you were about to leave the school with Ramona, Chloe approaches you. "Hey, [your name]. I was wondering, is Science one of your best subjects?"

As a matter of fact, it was. "Yeah, why?" you ask.

"Well, it's just that I'm not very good at science, and I want to get all A's again this year, so I thought that I could use this study partner thing to my advantage." she says. Chloe then hands you a piece of paper. "Here's my phone number and home address." You then take a piece of paper, write your number and address on it and give it to her. "Thanks!" she says. "So, is tomorrow okay?" You nod your head in agreement. "Alright, see you then!" Chloe says before walking off.

"Nice going Romeo." Ramona says. You just scored a date with Chloe.

"Whatever, Ramona." you say.

"Hey, I thought you'd be happy." she answers back.

"Are we gonna get going or not?" you say impatiently.

So what happens when you get home?
132.title: Kissed By Lady Luck

1322.content:
Finally. The moment you've been waiting for. Chloe was gonna be over any minute now. Just then, you get a video call on your laptop. It was Ramona

"She there yet?" she asks.

"Not yet," you answer.

"Listen," Ramona tells you. "I just don't want you to get your hopes up. Chloe isn't the type of girl to use you just for your smarts, but she probably just wants to study, nothing more."

"That's fine." you say. "At least we're friends." Another video call comes in. It was Colin.

"Hey, [your name], I didn't know that you were friends with Ramona." he says.

"We live next door to each other." Ramona answers.

*DING DONG*

"I gotta go you guys." you say. "Chloe's here." you shut down your laptop and go down to the door to greet Chloe. You see your mom going to get the door.

"Don't answer it." you tell her.

"Why no-" your mom begins to say, but then she looks through the peephole. "Oh, I get it."

When your mom leaves, you open the door.

"Hi!" Chloe says.

"Hey." you answer. "I hope it didn't take too long to get here."

"Not really." she replies. "I actually live two blocks from here." You smile to yourself.

"Well, come on in." you say.

The two of you studied for about an hour, then you decide to relax.

"Hey, [your name]," Chloe says. "There's word around the school that there's gonna be a back to school dance on Friday."

"Well, that's cool." you answer.

"You sound like you don't want to go." Chloe states.

"What would be the point?" you ask. "It's not like I know anyone that well to ask them to go with me."

"Well, you know me pretty well." she says. "Why not go with me?"

"You sound like you're asking me to the dance." you say, finally catching on.

"Maybe I am." Chloe replied coyly. "So what do you say?"
1322.title: The Study Date

13221.content:
"Sure!" you say a little too enthusiastically. "I'd love to go with you!"

"What's with the sudden attitude change?" Chloe asks suspiciously.

In your mind, you frantically try to find an excuse to prevent Chloe from finding out that you liked her.

"Eh, that's no matter. Well, I'd better get going." she says. "My dad gets antsy when I spend too much time at a friend's house, especially a friend that's a boy." You tell her goodbye, disappointed that she couldn't stay any longer.

THURSDAY AFTERNOON..........................

It was lunchtime, and you were outside looking around for where Ramona and Colin were sitting. Just then, you see them waving at you.

"So, how's it going?" Colin asks.

"Pretty good. Can't take my mind off the dance." you say.

"Okay, before you send me on a guilt trip, I admit it. I was wrong." Ramona says.

You give her a confused look. "What do you mean?"

"I was wrong when I said that Chloe was only going to your house to study." she admits.

"Well, I hope you've learned something, missy." you say, mockingly.

"Don't push your luck, [your name]." she says back.

"Speaking of luck," Colin says. "It looks like ours just ran out."

You and Ramona turn around to see what Colin was talking about, then looks of disgust form on both your faces. Luke was approaching the table where you three were sitting. All three of you thought the same thing: "What the hell does this douchebag want?"

"Well, well, well," he says, in his usual condescending manner. "If it isn't Nerdy, Fatty, and Earthy. The gang's all here." You, Ramona, and Colin roll your eyes at his pathetic excuse for a diss. He pays no attention and continues talking. "What's this I hear about [your name] and Chloe going to the dance?" he asks.

"NONE OF YOUR GODDAMN BUSINESS, THAT"S WHAT!" Colin shouts standing up.

Luke calmly looks at him and says: "You face looks red, mousy-boy. Got a fever?" Colin sits back down, embarrassed.

Ramona stands up and looks Luke right in the eye. "Back off, if you know what's good for you." she threatens.

"Temper, temper." Luke says with a grin. "I just came in to give Earth Boy here a little advice."

"Like I need any advice from you." you said.

"Tsk, tsk. That mouth of yours will get you into trouble one of these days. You should watch yourself." Luke remarks. "I just wanted to tell you to keep away from Chloe. She's mine."

"Wait a sec," Colin says. "I thought you were going with my older sister Eileen."

"What does that have to do with anything." Luke says. "Well, I think I've been around you freaks long enough. I'd better go." Then he walks off.

"Yeah, keep fronting, you little bitch! You're not fooling anyone!" Ramona called out to him.

Luke responds by giving her the finger without even turning around to look at her. It took you and Colin to hold Ramona back after that.

After she calms herself down, she looks at Colin with a grin. "So, miss 'queen bee twelfth grader' is going to the dance with Luke?" she asks him.

"Yeah..." he replies.

"What do you mean 'queen bee'?" You ask Ramona.

"She's the most popular furry on campus, and she's the one who organizes all the Friday meetings." she explains.

"Oh, so that's why Colin knows so much about them." you say.

"Yup." he says with a shy smile.

"Wait, I forgot to ask," you say to your mouse friend. "Who are you going to the dance with?"

He got nervous and started to stutter. "W-well..... you see, I............ w-was gonna g-go to the d-dance with-"

Ramona cut him off and rolled her eyes with a smile. Then she turned to you. "He's going with me."

You spit the soda out of your mouth. "You!?" you say in surprise.

"Yeah," she said. "He finally manned up and admitted he had feeling for me, and to be honest, I feel the same about him."

".....................................wow" was all you managed to say.

The following night, you arrive at Chloe's house. You knock on the door, and who answers?
13221.title: Who Did You Ask?

choices: "Um, my parents are expecting me, I have to go."
132211.content:
When the door opened your breath was practically taken away. She was wearing an extra long, orange blouse to match with her fur, with blue jeans and her hair in a ponytail.

"Wow." you say. "You look beautiful."

"You're not too bad yourself," Chloe jokingly says. "Well, c'mon! We're gonna be late!" The two of you walk to the school together.

The dance was being held in the school gym, and when the two of you got there, everybody was dancing. You spotted Ramona and Colin sitting on the bleachers.

"Hey, you guys." you say.

"We've been waiting for you two." Ramona says.

"You were?" you say, surprised.

"We wouldn't want to start dancing without our friends here." Colin says.

"You consider me as a friend?" Chloe asks.

"Of course!" Ramona answers. "Any friend of [your name]'s is a friend of ours."

Chloe smiles and lightly blushes.

"Oh, and the teachers trusted us enough not to get any chaperones for the dance." Colin adds.

A few minutes later you were getting something to drink. You still haven't started dancing with Chloe, though. As you finished your drink, another song starts playing. It had an upbeat, techno feel to it. Chloe gasps in delight.

"Oh my God!" she exclaims. "This is my favorite song!" She then pulls you onto the dance floor and starts dancing with you. You were never the best dancer, and you knew this for a fact, so you try to go with Chloe's movements.

"What song is this?" you ask her.

"I have no idea. I just wanted to get you to start dancing." she says with a giggle. "You need to get out of your comfort zone, [your name]."

She was right.

Soon the song ends, and a slower one starts playing. You knew this was your chance to get close to Chloe. Just then Chloe embraces you with a hug and slowly moves with you. You hugged her back and danced with her. This was probably the best moment of your life. After the song ended, Chloe needed to go to the bathroom, so she excused herself. You used this time to leave the gym and go into the hallway so you can catch yourself. You felt like you were in heaven. You were on the perfect date, with the perfect girl. You walk down the hall and looked down the left corridor and saw Ramona kissing Colin. If that wasn't your cue to get back into the gym, you didn't know what was.

As you get back inside, you see Chloe sitting on the bleachers. The two of you get back to dancing, and when Ramona and Colin got back, the four of you switched dance partners, so now Ramona was dancing with you, and Chloe with Colin. After a while, you and Chloe decided that it was time to leave. Chloe wanted to get one last drink first, so you tell her that you'll meet her outside. However, as you made your way out, you run into the one furry that you've been wanting to stay away from all night, Luke.

"I thought I told you to stay away from my girl, you little bitch!" Luke shouts.

You really did not want to deal with this. Not tonight, of all nights.

"You're here with Eileen, you hypocritical piece of shit!" you answer back.

Luke gets mad and pushes you."WHAT THE HELL DID YOU JUST SAY TO ME?!" Luke was so loud that everyone in the gym turned their attention to you and him, including Chloe.

"Listen Luke," you say. "You can keep harassing me if you want, but I promise you that when the day comes where you finally cross the line, I will beat the shit out of you so bad, you'll run home like a scared PUNK!"

Luke has finally had enough. He starts cracking his knuckles. "I'll take my chances, you little-" Just then Colin punches him right in the face, out of nowhere.

"I've been wanting to do that all year." Colin says.

After that you walk outside and stand by the school gates. What were you gonna do now? You and Luke just made a scene in front of everyone, including Chloe. What would SHE think? She'd probably assume that you were just as bad as Luke.

"That was really brave of you." you heard someone say. You turn around and see Chloe shyly smiling at you.

"You mean you're not mad?" you ask.

"Why would I be?" she asks back. "You did what you needed to do. Luke needed to be put in his place. He had no right to call me his girl."

You laugh in agreement. "You're right. Well, I should be getting you back home." you say.

On your way back, Chloe spots a photo booth. She pulls you over to the booth and the two of you take some pictures. It was pretty fun. Finally, you got Chloe back home.

"Thanks for walking me back," she says. "Despite what happened with Luke I still had the most wonderful night of my life." She then leans forward, gently grabs your shoulders and plants a passionate kiss on your lips. "Good night." you nervously say after the kiss ends.

"It doesn't have to end," Chloe says. "My mom sent me a text during the dance saying that he won't be home until midnight. We can hang out in my house till then."

You check your watch and see that it's half past ten. What do you say to Chloe?
132211.title: Let's Dance

choices: She forces a kiss on you.
She grows to twice her size and pins you.
You try to get out of there before she has a chance to do anything.
133.content:
You grunted in disgust. History wasn't your worst subject, but you found it really boring. Then again, that was Earth history. Who knows? Maybe Bestian history won't be as boring. You take your seat in classroom when you hear a familiar voice.

"I didn't know we had this class together too."

"Colin?" you say as you turn around.

"In the flesh and fur." he said with a grin. "We still have time before the teacher arrives, so we can relax and chat for a bit."

"Okay," you say. "I've wanted to ask you something anyway."

"What is it?" the mouse asks.

"How do you know so much about the girls' secret meetings?" you ask him.

"My sister." You give Colin a confused look.

"She's in twelfth grade, and the most popular girl in school. She runs the meetings." he explains.

"That still doesn't explain how you know what goes down in those meetings." you say.

"I set up a camera in the girls' locker room." he says.

"And how did you manage to do that?" you ask.

"You're full of questions, aren't you?" he asks sarcastically. "I got detention once and had to clean the gigantic locker room as punishment. I made a quick trip to the AV room and set up a camera that has a wireless link to my laptop."

"Sneaky." you say.

After class ended, the rest of the day went by nicely. You didn't see much of Chloe, which disappointed you. You were about to leave with Colin and Ramona when the three of you hear someone's voice.

"Colin!" the voice says.

You all turn around to see a white mouse furry with thick fur and bouncy, reddish-pinkish hair that went a little past her shoulders. She was taller than you and Colin but slightly shorter than Ramona, who was two inches taller than you.

"Hey, sis." Colin answers.

"That's your sister?" you ask.

"Eileen." she says. "And you must be [your name]."

"How do you know my name?" you ask her.

"You're the new kid, and you're a human. Everyone knows your name." Eileen says.

"Oh," you say, embarrassed that everyone at school knows you.

"Say, your're pretty cute." she says. "You mind staying after school with me and a couple of my friends?"

"Don't try it, Eileen." Ramona and Colin say at the same time. Then the three of you leave the school with Eileen just standing there.

"Nice try, but I won't go down that easy." she says to herself with a smile.

The next day, your last period was gym, a class shared by eleventh and twelfth graders, and you just finished changing back into your regular clothes. You were the last to leave the locker room, telling Colin and Ramona that you'd catch up with them later. As you left the locker room, you see Chloe coming out of hers. The two of you exchanged glances.

"Hey," she says.
.
"Hi," you answer. A smile forms on your face as she walks away, but then a voice breaks your smile.

"Hello, cutie."

You turn in surprise to see Eileen standing by the door of the girls' locker room.

"I was waiting for you to get out of there." she says.

"That's nice, but I have to go." you say hastily as you try to leave, but Eileen grabs your shoulder and pulls you into the girls' locker room. Colin was right, it was huge.

Eileen then pushes you to the ground and she crawls on top of you. "You did well at playing hard to get," she says, licking her lips. "But I ALWAYS get what I want!"

What does she do now?
133.title: How I Met Your Sister

choices: Colin bursts into the door and gets you out of there.
Nothing happens, and Eileen goes on with what she was doing
You kick Eileen in the stomach!
1332.content:
All of a sudden, you feel more pressure on your body. The pressure continues to increase until it comes to a sudden stop. You look up to see that Eileen has grown to twice her size! You start to panic.

"Seriously, Eileen," you plead. "Let me go!"

"Why should I?" she asks. "I've got you right where I want you. I'd be crazy to let you go now."

"But I don't like you like that!" you say, trying to persuade her.

"Why?" she asks. "Is it because of Chloe?"

"What are you talking about?" you say, lying right through your teeth.

"Don't lie to me!" she yells, putting more pressure on you. "It's obvious that you like her!"

You then remember Ramona telling you that female furries can sense dishonesty. You're screwed.

"I don't understand how you can like me so much after one day." you ask in-between your gasps for oxygen.

"It wasn't just one day," Eileen explains. "Colin and I live across the street from your house, and I saw you when you moved in. It was at that moment that I decided that I had to have you for myself. But when I figured out that you liked Chloe, it made things complicated."

"So you just want me because I look attractive to you?" you ask, disgusted. "That's sick!"

"What's the problem?" Eileen asks, not even caring. "It's not my first time doing this. I've taken several boys before you, but you're my first virgin, so I'm gonna make this real good, just for you." Your face freezes with fear. "But for what it's worth, you're far more attractive than any of the boys I've taken. You're someone worth keeping." You appreciate the compliment, but you still didn't want Eileen to be the girl you lost your virginity to.

"Just give in," she says "Once you've had a go with me, Chloe will be the last girl on your mind. I'm doing you a favor." Eileen lovers her face down to yours.

...............................................

Meanwhile, Colin was waiting outside for her sister to drive him back home, but he didn't see her anywhere. Just then, his laptop starts to sound an alarm. It was the alarm that he set up to ring whenever someone was in the girls' locker room when classes weren't in session. He opened his laptop and looked at the camera footage. His sister was about to rape his best friend! (Well, they had only met a day ago, but he knows a good friend when he sees one.) Colin rushes to the locker room so he can save you.

Back in the locker room, Eileen was about to kiss you, and once she does, you were hers for the taking. You were getting desperate, and just when she's about to kiss you........
1332.title: Heavy Weight

13323.content:
You had no other option. Obviously, nobody was coming to help you. You were on your own, so you did what you had to do, and that was to fight. You take your foot and kick it as hard as you can right into Eileen's stomach. The yell that she let out almost burst your eardrums, which means you hit her good and hard. The giantess mouse fell over to her side, writhing in pain.

"Why you son of a bitch!" she yelled. "You're dead!"

Unfortunately, when Eileen fell, she fell into the space between you and the exit. Damn your rotten luck. You make a mad dash through the room, hoping to lose her. "Don't even try to hide from me!" she yells.

Just then, the door bursts open, and Colin runs inside. "What the hell, Eileen!" he says to his older sister.

"Stay out of this, little brother!" she snaps back.

Colin runs up to Eileen's foot and jabs his finger in a spot right next to her ankle, which makes Eileen fall to the floor.

"Dude, how did you do that?" you say, amazed.

"Every female furry has a weak spot." he says. "In the case of mice, it's right by the ankle."

"Wow." you say.

"We should just walk home. I actually live across the street from you."

"Yeah, your sister told me," you say.

That night, you were in your room playing video games when you hear your cell phone ring. When you answer it, who's on the other line?
13323.title: Right in the Gut!

choices: The girls are afer you harder han ever!
133232.content:
"Hello?"


"Hi. Is this (your name)?"


"Yes. Who is this?"


"This Chloe. We passed each other outside the locker rooms today."


"How did you get this number?"


"That's not important. Anyway, I just called to ask if it's true you kicked Elieen in the gut today."


"Yeah, I did, why?" "


"It's just that, well, frankly that's never happened before. A boy fighting back againt a female? That's unheared of."


"She was going to rape me! If you were in my position at the time, you would do the same."


"Well, you realize what this means, don't you?"


"What?"


"It means there are two possible consequences for your actons today. Every female in the school has heard about what happened with you and Elieen. Now, they'll either stay away from you, or, they'll be coming after you even more. Females tend to like a challenge. Also, Eileen will probably be looking for you, now that you've pissed her off."


"So what should I do?"


"My advice, you might want to always keep a can of mace on you, just in case."


The next day.....
133232.title: How Did She Get Your Number?!

1332321.content:
You couldn't sleep that night. Sure, there was the chance that the girls would avoid you, but there was also the chance that they'd be after you more, and that was something that you REALLY didn't need. Heeding Chloe's advice, you go down to your basement and find some mace.

The next day you slowly walk outside, mace in your pocket, to check if anybody was waiting for you. Nobody was. You wait outside your yard to wait for Ramona, when suddenly-

"BOO!" someone says from behind you.

You give a surprised scream. You turn around and see Ramona laughing her tail off.

"What the fuck!?" you say angrily.

"Language, language." Ramona says, still laughing.

"That's not funny," you say. "I almost maced you!"

"Yeah, I'd expect you to carry mace after what happened yesterday." your friend says.

"I don't understand." you say. "How can everybody in the school know about this so fast?"

Ramona sighs. "Need I remind you that Eileen is the most popular girl in school? She's Facebook friends with everybody in the school. and then some." You had forgotten that Facebook has been available on Bestia for almost 2 years, Friggin Mark Zuckerberg.

"After she posted what happened, she got over 100 comments in less than five minutes!" she continues.

"Oh great." you say. "Why does my life have to be so damn hard."

"Look at it this way," Ramona says. "You have two lines of defense."

"Two?"

"Yeah. You have your mace, and you have me." she says. You were right. Ramona was a good friend. It was nice to know that you had your back.

"Well, let's get outta here before Eileen sees me." you say, fearing that mace won't be enough for her, even if you did know her "weak spot".

"Chill man, she already left." Ramona says. "Eileen can drive herself and Colin to school, remember?"

"Oh, right." you say.

"Hey, [your name]!" you say. You and Ramona turn to see Luke coming your way.

"What do you want now?" you say, not being in the mood for his nonsense.

"Relax, bro. I just want to apologize." he says.

"Really?" you say with a doubtful tone.

"Yeah. Any guy than can hold his own against a girl is worth my respect." he says. "So I came here to say that I consider you a friend."

"Ramona?" you say.

"As much as I'd hate to say this," she says. "he's not lying."

"Okay then." Luke says. "I'll help you keep the other girls off your back, 'kay?"

"Thanks," you say.

When you get to school, every girl in the building suddenly turned their attention to you. You gulped. Just then, Colin runs up to you.

"Hey, [your name]." he says. Then he looks at Luke. "Wait, so you guys are cool, now?"

"Yup." Luke says.

So you, Ramona, Luke, and Colin walk down the halls together. Luke and Colin's lockers were on the other end of the hallway, so you were left with Ramona, since her locker was next to yours. As you got your books, a rabbit furry sneaks up behind you and wraps her arms around you, pressing her chest against your back.

"Hey there, handsome." she says.

"Back off, Julie!" Ramona barks.

Julie then sniffs you. "Your scent isn't on him, so he's not yours," she says. "So why should I back off."

"You're a freshman, and your're fourteen." Ramona says. "Why don't you find a guy that's your age?"

"You know full well that I like a challenge." Julie retorts.

Ramona growls somewhat loudly, which was a signal to Julie that she'd be no match for Ramona should they get in a fight, so she backed off.

"Looks like you got some solid defense." you hear a familiar voice say.

"Hey, Chloe." you say. "Before I forget, I want to thank you for giving me that tip last night."

"Nothing to it." she says, "But there's only one sure way to get these girls off your back."

"What," you ask.

"You need to get a girlfriend." she says.

"Well how am I supposed to do that?" you ask, not having much experience with girls.

"Well, Ramona's a good choice for a fake girlfriend." Chloe says. "She's really strong, so you won't have any worries."

"While that isn't far from the truth," Ramona interjects, "I think Chloe is a better choice. She may not be as strong as me, but she's more agile and knows all the weak points of all furry types."

Who were you going to choose? You know that Ramona can hold her own in a fight, but you like Chloe.

If you chose Chloe, you'd be with the girl of your dreams, even if the relationship wasn't actually real. However, she's not as strong as Ramona.

Who do you choose?
1332321.title: Friends Stick Together

13323212.content:
“I think I’ll go with Chloe.” You say. Chloe smiles. “Alright then. Give me a second.” To your shock and surprise, Chloe begins removing her clothes right then and there, in front of everyone. “What the hell are you doing?!” You exclaim.


“If you’re going to be my boyfriend, I have to make sure my scent is on you. Now hold still.” Without warning, Chloe pins you against your locker and begins rubbing her body against you, with the every girl in the halls staring in shock and anger.


As Chloe rubs her face against yours she whispers “Stroke my back while I’m doing this, that’ll really drive it home.” You slowly and smoothly pet her back as she begins to purr, while you could hear several growls coming from the crowd of angry females.


“You do realize you’re only you’re only pissing them off even more the longer you drag this out?” You whisper in Chloe’s ear. “I thought if I was going to do this, I might as well do a good job.” She whispers back. “Don’t worry, I may not be as strong as Ramona, but I can handle myself.”


For a good fifteen minutes, Chloe kept rubbing her up and down yours. You secretly admit to yourself that you kind of enjoyed this. This smoothness of her fur, smell of her scent, and the fact that she was pretty much dry humping you.


Finally, Chloe releases you and puts her clothes back on. “I hope you all were paying attention to that.” She says, turning to address the crowd. “Because he’s mine now. If anyone tries to molest him again, they’ll have to deal with me! You got that?”
13323212.title: Public Display of Affection

choices: She frowns and says: "Sorry, I only like you as a friend."
133232122.content:
Once Chloe was done with her... "performance", she turns to you and says: "I'll see you later, sweetie." When she turns to leave, she brushes your face with her tail, putting a smile on your face. Right after that, everybody leaves the scene, some females hanging their heads in disappointment, others crying.

"Will you stop smiling like that?" Ramona says. "It's friggin' creepy."

You get yourself together as soon as she said that. You were then approached by Luke and Colin. "I think I got mindfucked just now." Luke says, still not believing what he saw.

"My thoughts exactly." Colin says "So I guess you now have guaranteed protection."

By the time lunch came, news of you and Chloe's "relationship" was spread to the people that were either not there to see what happened or they were just late to school. Chloe also made it clear that Ramona was the only other female that she trusted to be close to you. Not having random chicks attack you gave you some peace of mind.

You and Chloe met up with the rest of your friends, and Ramona suggests that you and Chloe sit at a table alone and make googly eyes at each other.

"Don't you think we've made our point clear already?" you ask her. Ramona leans over to your ear and whispers softly so that Chloe couldn't hear.

"I thought that you wanted to spend some alone time with your new GF."

"Now that I think of it, that is a good idea." you say.

Ramona rolls her eyes.

You and Chloe sit at the table and start talking. "I guess we should get to know each other." Chloe says.

"Okay," you say. "You go first."

Chloe blushes slightly. "Okay, well..." she says. "I'm an honor student, I like watching movies, I'm really interested in music, and I love singing"

"Are you good at singing?" you say.

"Maybe..." she says with a smile.

Just then, something interrupts you conversation.

"Chloe!" you hear a familiar voice say. It wasn't Eileen, so you were a little relieved.

"What do you want, Julie." Chloe says.

"You know damn well what I want, bitch!" the rabbit says. "Save the formalities. I want to make this quick!"

"You should really learn to respect your upperclassmen." your "girlfriend" says casually.

"IT'S A CHALLENGE, PEOPLE!!!" Luke yells. "Dude, whip out your camera!" Luke says to Colin. "This shit is going on Facebook!"

Again.... Friggin' Mark Zuckerberg.

Ramona appears at your side. "The center of her lower back," she says.

"What?" you say, confused.

"That's the weak spot for rabbit furries." she says. "Chloe knows this already. This may be short, but damn it's gonna be fun to watch."

As Ramona said, it was quick, but it was longer than Ramona expected. Julie was fast, so Chloe had a little difficulty getting to her weak spot.

After the fight, the rest of the school day went by nicely. You saw Eileen on her way to one of her classes, but she didn't see you. After school, you decide to walk home with Chloe since she lived three blocks away from your house. You decide to tell her that you liked her for real. You're worried about how she'll react.

"Um, Chloe..." you struggle to say. "I want to tell you something."

"What" she says.

"Well... I wanted to say that I actually like you for real." you finally say.

"I know" she says. "I knew that you liked me from the moment I first saw you in the halls on the first day of school."

"Oh, really?" you say, surprised.

"Dude, it was pretty obvious." she said. "When I said hi to you by the locker rooms, I saw that smile on your face." she says laughing. "I'd be lying if I said it wasn't cute though."

"Well, do you like me?" you ask.
133232122.title: A NEW CHALLENGER *press start*

1332321221.content:
You knew Chloe was just being coy, but still you had to know for sure. “Well then, would you agree to go out with me this Friday?” You had spoken before you had time to think about what you were going to say. You mentally slapped yourself as soon as the words escaped your lips.


But to your great surprise and joy, Chloe said. “Sure. Where do you want to go?” You could here the sound of screeching tires as you suddenly came to a halt. “You’ll actually do it?” “Why not? You seem like a nice guy. That, and it’ll help convince anyone who sees us that we’re actually together.”


“Great! So, I’ll pick you up at seven. By the way, um, where do you live?” “You’re looking at it.” You realize you had stopped directly in front of Chloe’s house. She turned and headed towards her front door, turning back and winking at you before going inside.


For a moment, you stood there like a statue, frozen in disbelief at what had just happened. Then, you run home as fast as you can. When you get home, you race upstairs to your room, and practically jump for joy! You really got Chloe to agree to go on a date with you! You smack yourself across the face to make sure you’re not dreaming.


SMACK!


Nope! This is real! As you rub your stinging cheek, you come to realize that this will also be the first date you’ve ever gone on in your life. You pray to God that you don’t screw this up, or what’s worse, another girl doesn’t screw it up for the both of you.


The rest of the week went by rather well. No one else had challenged Chloe for you, and you hadn’t seen Eileen since she had tried to rape you. All in all, things were pretty uneventful. You told your parents about your plans for Friday night. Your mother insisted you wear a suit for the occasion, but you told her you were just going to see a movie, not going to the prom. Even when you told them Chloe was a furry, they didn’t seem to mind.


“I can’t wait to see what the children will look like.” Your mother said. “Mom!” You say. “We haven’t even dated yet! We’re nowhere near ready to think about that!” “Well, it never hurts to plan ahead.”


Finally, it was your big night. You met Chloe at her doorstep exactly at seven. Thankfully, she answered the door, so you didn’t have to meet her parents. “I’ll be back dad!” She called behind her as she shut the door. “So where are we going?” She asks. “I thought we could catch a movie together.” “Sure. Sounds fun!”


Before Beastia had made contact with Earth, there was no such thing as movies. But since then, they had begun making films of their own, as well as importing them from Earth. As You and Chloe arrive at the theater and look at what was playing, you decide to be a gentleman and let Chloe choose.


To your surprise, she picks an action movie. You had expected her to pick on of the Twilight movies that were showing. Sure, you’d rather get a lobotomy than see it again, but at least it would be bearable with Chloe anyway.


You order a large popcorn and two sodas, one for each of you at the concession stand. Halfway into the movie, you reach over Chloe for the popcorn without looking away from the screen and hear an “eep!” You look over at Chloe and, much to your embarresment, you had missed the popcorn, and instead, placed your hand between Chloe’s legs. You both visibly blush, staring at each other in awkward silence.


The person sitting directly behind you had seen what had just occurred between you and Chloe. To make it worse it was some one you knew! Who was it?
1332321221.title: Movie Night

13323212211.content: Ramona saw what just happened, and how does she take it?
13323212211.title: B-U-S to the T-E-D!

133232122112.content:
When you see that it was Ramona who saw what had just happened, you thinkt that she would understand. Unfortunately, this wasn't the case.

"And here I thought that you were a nice guy." she says before standing up and storming out of the theater. You screwed up big time. You turn to Chloe and say "I'm gonna go calm her down."

"Good idea." she says. When you walk out of the theater, you see Ramona heading out of the building. You follow her to her car and call out to her.

"What do you want?" she says with her back turned to you.

"Ramona, that wasn't what it looked like." you try to explain.

She turns to you with an angry look on her face. "Is that really the best excuse you can come up with?" she says. "I help you get together with Chloe and you repay me by trying to get into her pants!? How selfish can you be?!"

"You know that I wouldn't do that." you say.

"I thought so too, but I guess I was wrong." Ramona says before turning her back to you and getting into her car. "Now get out of my way before I run you over." she says before closing her car door. You decide to just go back into the theater when you run into Chloe right by the entrance.

"Chloe," you say, "you're not mad at me, right?"

"Of course not," she says. "I know that it was just an accident."

"I thought that female furries could sense when someone is lying." you say.

"Well, strong emotions can distract a female from the truth." Chloe says."It's likely that her anger is clouding her judgement, but I can't see why she's so mad. It's as if she's taking it personally."

Chloe was right. Ramona was taking this somewhat personally. You decide to try and talk to her tomorrow, which was a Saturday. She should be calm by then. You and Chloe decide to skip the rest of the movie and walk home. When you get to Chloe's house, she turns to you and says: "Just so you know, I don't kiss on the first date."

"I can live with that." you say.

The next day, you go over to Ramona's house. When you ring the doorbell, who answers?
133232122112.title: Clouded Judgement

choices: "I know what I saw! I don't need an explanation!"
"Go ahead. I'd love to hear this."
1332321221122.content:
You were half hoping that Ramona wouldn't be the one to answer the door. If she did, she would've most likely slammed the door in your face. Thankfully, someone else answered the door. It was Ramona's little sister, Roxanne. You first met Roxanne the day you moved to Bestia. While her big sister had a half-chubby, half-voluptuous figure, Roxanne was thinner, and her hair was tied back while her big sister's hair was loose. Then again, she's only twelve. She might grow to look like Ramona in a few years.

"You're the human boy from next door, right?" she asks.

"Yeah, is Ramona home?" you ask.

"She's in the shower. You can come in and wait for her if you want." she answers.

"Thanks," you say.

You knew that female furries don't start going boy-crazy until they turn thirteen, so you could trust Roxanne almost as much as her sister. Besides, when she does turn thirteen, she'll probably go after boys closer to her age.

When the two of you get in the living room, Roxanne starts up a conversation to kill time.

"Ramona seemed really upset when she came home last night." she says.

"She was, was she?" you say, pretending to not know what she was talking about. "I wonder what happened."

Roxanne eyed you suspiciously. "Has anybody told you that female furries can sense dishonesty?" she asked.

You sigh. "On numerous occasions." you answer.

"So tell me what happened." she says, suddenly interested. "Why was she so mad?"

"Why is it so important to you all of a sudden?" you ask.

"It won't hurt to tell me. Pleeeeease? Come on, tell me." Roxanne says.

"This is why we rarely have guests over, Roxy." a voice says. You turn around and see Ramona standing at the bottom of the staircase with a towel wrapped around her and her hair somewhat dried. You think to yourself, "Why couldn't she just put on some clothes?"

"Go upstairs, Roxy." Ramona says. Her little sister complies and walks up the staircase. "Make it quick." Ramona says while leading you farther away from the stars so her sister couldn't hear. "What do you want?"

"I wanted a chance to explain myself. What you saw last night wasn't what it looked like."

What does Ramona say?
1332321221122.title: Roxanne

choices: Choose Ramona and explain the situation to Chloe.
Choose Chloe and explain your now "real" relationship to Ramona.
13323212211222.content:
You sigh in relief and begin to explain the entire situation. The whole time, you tried to maintain eye contact with Ramona, but the fact that she was wrapped in a towel and still dripping wet made it hard not to stare. When you finish explaining yourself, you stay quiet and give Ramona some time to think. After a few seconds, you speak up.

"Do you still think I'm lying?" you say.

Ramona sighs. "I want to believe that you're lying, but I guess my emotions were getting the best of me at the time. I'm sorry."

"It's okay." you say. "But do you mind if I ask you a question?"

"What is it?" she asks.

"Why did you take it so personally?"

Ramona freezes for a second. She looks at the floor and puts her arms behind her back. "Well... it's because..." she walks over to you and suddenly hugs you. "I like you too."

You were surprised to say the least. However, this didn't make any sense. Ramona's been helping you get close to Chloe all this time, so you ask her why she did that for you.

Ramona starts sniffling. "Because I wanted you do be happy. I'd be selfish if I took you for myself when you liked someone else. It's been so hard to restrain myself from telling you how I felt, because if I did, I thought that you'd be afraid of me taking advantage of you."

"You're my best friend, Ramona." you say. This is actually the first time that you said this out loud. "I wouldn't be afraid of you."

Ramona lets go of you and wipes her eyes. "Thanks. I'm sorry I got you so worried about me."

"No problem. I should get going, though. It's 10:30 in the morning and my parents still aren't up yet."

"So you snuck out? You naughty boy." Ramona said. It was nice to hear her sarcastic comments again.

As you left Ramona's house, you felt a little conflicted. You like Chloe, and she seems to like you too, but Ramona's feelings for you were even stronger. Hell, she INSISTED on you choosing Chloe as your fake girlfriend when she could've had you choose her, but Chloe has some concern for you too. She took the time to warn you about the consequences of the whole Eileen situation, and just like Ramona, she'd defend you in a heartbeat.

You're so deep in thought that you pass your house without noticing, but then the sound of someone singing makes you stop. You could tell that it was a female, and her voice sounded heavenly. When you turn in the direction that the voice was coming from, you see that you had stopped walking right in front of Chloe's house and she was on her front porch singing a song. You remember her saying that she loved to sing, and from what you're seeing, she's damn good at it. Since she has her eyes closed, she doesn't notice you standing there. When she stops singing, she opens her eyes and is surprised to see you.

"How long have you been standing there?" she asks, blushing.

"Only a few seconds. You're a great singer, by the way."

"Thanks," she says. She walks over to you. "Did you sort things out with Ramona?"

"Yeah, I did." you answer. "On another topic, what were you thinking about when you were singing?"

Chloe blushes again. "Last night." she says.

"Even with everything that happened?" you ask. Chloe nods her head.

"So I was thinking... do you want this relationship to be for real?" she asks. You say yes without thinking.

Chloe giggles. Then she gives you a quick kiss on the lips. "See you around" she says.

You're really stuck, now. You don't know which girl to choose.
13323212211222.title: Ramona's Reaction and Chloe's Song

choices: A group of girls from school
133232122112222.content:
You've never felt more conflicted in your life than you do right now. Both Chloe and Ramona admitted the like you. Well, Chloe didn't exactly admit it, but she kind of implied it. Either way, you couldn't pick one without letting down the other. You couldn't bring yourself to choose oneof them yourself, so you pull a coin from your pocket, and tossi in the air.


Heads I go with Chloe, tails I go with Ramona,you think. As you wtach the coin spin in the air, time seems to almost come to stop, seemingly taking forever for the coin to fall. You could almosthear the whoosh of the air as it spinned, and when it finally started to comedown, you heard a whistligsoundlike an A-bomb dropping. When the coin hits your palm you quickly close your fist, afraid to see what your choice would be.


For what felt like hours, but was really abou a minute, you stood there with the coin in your hand as your palm began sweating. Finally, you open your fist and look at the coin.


Heads.


Your heart sank and rose at the same time. You would get to stay with your crush, but that also meant breaking your best friend's heart. Then you remeber Ramona saying she told you to pick Chloe because she wanted you to be happy. Maybe she would take this better than you thought.


Unknown to you, standing out in the open for the last several minutes has made you a vulnerable target. Someone is silently creeping up behind you, ready to pounce. But who is it?
133232122112222.title: With The Flip Of a Coin

choices: Chloe sees what's going on and jumps from her bedroom window to save you.
1332321221122221.content:
You didn't notice that someone was creeping up behind you until you notice a shadow that was bigger than yours on the ground. You try to run, but it's too late. The person behind you pushes you down to the ground and pins you. You struggle to get free, but only manage to turn around and see the face of your captor.

"Long time no see." Eileen says. She was only slightly bigger than her normal size. She probably didn't want to attract attention.

"Damn it, not you!" you say.

"Don't tell me you didn't expect for me to try to get back at you." she says with an evil chuckle.

"And how do you plan to do that?"

"Well, even though I am extremely mad at you, I'm still after your virginity."

You get even more mad since you don't understand why she is so persistent to take "that" from you. "Why is it so important to you?" you say angrily.

"You know that males are pretty rare on Bestia, so imagine how hard finding a virgin male is." she says. "It's the ultimate prize. People will be talking about me for years."

"So basically you're an attention whore." you say.

"So what if I am?" she says casually, as if she had no shame in it. "I am willing to make a deal with you, though."

"Well, since I have no other choice, I guess I'll listen." you say.

"I'll stop pursuing you IF you tell me what's going on between you, Ramona, and Chloe." she says.

"Ramona and I are friends, and Chloe and I are dating." you say bluntly. "Don't you already know that?"

"Don't play dumb with me." she says. "I've been watching you closely from my room since the day you kicked me in my stomach. I saw Ramona coming home looking very mad, and I knew that she had gone to the movies since I overheard her talking to Colin about it. I also knew that you and Chloe were there too, but I decided not to follow you. I knew that you had something to do with Ramona being upset, and I want to know why and what happened at her house. I also want to know everything about your relationship with Chloe."

You realize that you should start carrying mace despite the fact that you had a girlfriend. "You promise?" you ask, not trusting her.

"I swear." she says. You didn't know if furry females were really honest when it comes to swearing their word, but you had a nagging feeling that Eileen was going to use this information against you, but what choice do you have?
1332321221122221.title: That Nosy Bitch

13323212211222212.content:
Elieen feels a tap on her shoulder, and turns her head in time to see an orange fist speeding towards her face. WHAM! The impact shatters Eileens nose with a sickening crunch that echoes across the block. Eileen is thrown backwards off of you. She lays flat on her back clutching her nose, blood pouring down her front.


You look up to see Chloe offering you a hand. She pulls you onto your feet and turns to Eileen as she lays squeaking in pain. "I should have you arrested for trying to steal my mate!" She snarls. "Couldn't you smell my scent on him? He's mine!"


Eileen shakily gets onto her feet, one hand still clutching her nose. "If you so much as touch him again, I'll swallow you whole! You got that rat?" You didn't know bit then, but on Bestia it is a serious insult to call a mouse a rat. In that moment, Eillen foirgot all about her nose and charges at Chloe.


Chloe's claws spring from her fingers and they begin brawling right there in the street. You tried shouting for them to stop several times, but they just ignore you. You see Ramona walking up the strret towards you,and stops to watch the show.


"Eileen tried to rape you again, didn't she?" She asks calmly. "Yes, now I can't get them to stop!" You say. "I don't Chloe getting hurt on account of me!" Ramona chuckles. "Don't worry, furries are very quick healers. Any injuries she might get will be gone by tomorrow."


That at least eased you mind a little. You and Ramon both continue to watch the fight as a small crowd gathers and begins cheering them on. Chloe had taken some damage, haing several bites and scratches, but she had done much more damage to Eileen. "Care to bet on who will win?" Ramona asks jokingly. "Actually, there's somthing i need to tell you." You say.


You hesitate. Should you tell Ramona about your decision to o with Chloe now?
13323212211222212.title: Rescue!

choices: I really feel bad for her."
maybe she and I can be co-mates with you."
133232122112222121.content:
"What did you want to tell me?" Ramona asks. No turning back now. You pull Ramona aside, away from all the commotion. When you reach somewhere private, you become nervous, and Ramona notices. "What's the matter, [your name]" she asks.

"Ramona..." you begin to say, "After I left your house, I ran into Chloe and she asked me... if I wanted a real relationship..."

"And you accepted her offer, right?" Ramona say.

"I'm sorry, Ramona." you say.

"It's fine. I said I wanted you to be happy, didn't I?"

"But not at your expense."

"You couldn't choose both of us. I wish you the best. If it doesn't work out, I'm still here."

"That's another thing. I don't want you to make yourself miserable over me."

"I'll be okay. Good luck to you two." Ramona says, smiling. "We should get back to the fight."

On your way back to the fight, you see Colin in the crowd.

"Colin, if you cheer for Chloe, I'll kill you when we get home!" Eileen yells.

"Pay attention!" Chloe yells as she punches Eileen in the face once more, and she doesn't get back up, too weak to move.

"That'll teach you to put your hands on my mate!" Chloe says. You rush over to her, checking her wounds.

"Don't worry about it." she says. "I heal fast."

When everybody leaves the scene, you tell Chloe about your conversation with Ramona.

"I had no idea." she says. "If that's how she feels, then...
133232122112222121.title: Breaking the News

choices: She doesn't take it so well
She's perfectly fine with it, it's Ramona's father you should worry about
1332321221122221212.content:
"Co-what?" You say. "Co-mates." Say Chloe. "There's a little-known law on Bestia that says two females can legally share the same male, provided they agree to a contract. Most females either don't know about it, or would rather have what male they can find to themselves. Perhaps Ramona would be willing to agree."


You think about what Chloe had said for a moment. You didn't really see a downside to it. This way all three of you could be happy. But en, Chloe brings up the catch. "There is just one problem though." She says. "The law says we can only legally be co-mates if we are all living together." That really did lower your hopes. You doubt that Ramona's, Chloe's or your own parents would be willing to let all three of you live with them. what's more you haven't eve considered what your parents would say about this.


Probably something like, "You're only sixteen! You're way too young to do this! It's practically getting married!" "I don't know, Chloe." You say. "It seems there would be a lot of complications involved. I mean, where would the three of us even live?"


"I'm really not sure." Says Chloe, shrugging. "But let's ask herfirst, see if she even wants to do it first. Then we'll worry about that." You both head for Ramona's house. When you get there, Ramona's mother answers the door. To your surprise, se wasn't a labrador like her daughtes, but a collie. "Yes?" \


"Hi, is Ramona home?" You ask. "Who are you?" We're friends of hers from school." Says Chloe. "We have something important we need to discuss with her." "Oh. Come on in then." She leads you into the living room and you both sit on the sofa. "Ramona isn't here right now, but she should be home soon. What was it you wanted to talk to her about?"


You and Chloe hesitate. You're not sure if furry parents were like human parents, and wouldn't want their children doijng this kind o thing at their age. "Well, you see," You begin. "Ramona told me she has a thing for me. To be honest, I kind of like her that way too. BUt Chloe here had my eyes first. After finding out, Chloe proposed sh an Raona be co-mates for me. We wanted to se if she would agree."


How does Ramona's mother react
1332321221122221212.title: Mutual Agreement

choices: Your parents. They're easier to convince.
Chloe's parents. It'd be best to convince the girls' parents first.
13323212211222212122.content:
When you finish explaining this to Ramona's mother, she was unusually delighted to hear the news.

"Oh, that is so romantic!" she says. "I'm so happy for Ramona right now."

"Well, it's not set in stone yet," Chloe says. "We still have to get your husband, my parents, and [your name]'s parents on board."

"Well, if he has a problem with it, I'll be able to convince him." Ramona's mother says. Just then, a car pulls up outside the house. The door opens and in walks Ramona and her father. He, unlike his wife, was a golden retriever, just like his Ramona and Roxanne.

"You kids go outside." her mother says.

"Okay," the three of you say. Once you get outside, Ramona looks confused, so you explain everything to her. She's overjoyed to know that she has a chance with you after all. The situation with Ramona's parents seems to be under control, so who's parents are next?
13323212211222212122.title: One Parent Down, One To Go!

133232122112222121222.content:
You decide it would be better to get the girl's parents to agree before your own. Plus it gives you time to think of how you're going to explain this to them. s you and the girls approach Chloe's house you see Eileen is still laying in the street, being loaded onto an ambulance. "Not that I feel sorry for her," you say "But will she be alright?" "I told you, we heal fast." Says Ramona. "She'll be fine by tomorrow. But if we're lucky, Chloe might have put her in a coma for a while."




Chloe smiles. "I did sock her pretty hard." All three of you approach the front door and you knock. When the door opens, you are visibly surprised. Standing there was an exact copy of Chloe! "Chloe! What happened?" Said the Chloe clone as it worriedly looks over the first Chloe. "Relax mom, I'm alright." This was Chloe's mother? Now you see where she got her looks If you didn't know better, you'd have sworn they were twins.




"Who are they?" Asks Chloe's mom. "These are some friends of mine." Says Chloe. "We have something important to discuss with you." You all take a seat in the living room and explain the situation to her mother. At first she looks surprised, but she soon smiles. "This is wonderful news!" She says "My little kitten has found her mate! And he's a human to boot!"




"We're glad you agree." You say "Now we just need to tell your husband." On saying that, Chloe's mom's face visibly darkens. "You won't need to worry about that." sh says, a little disgruntled. "Chloe's father abandoned us when he found out I was pregnant with her." Now you feel like a jackass for bringing it up. "Oh....I'm....so sorry." You say. Chloe's mom quickly regains her cheerful demeanor. "Don't worry about it." She says, waving a hand. "That was long ago. I've gotten over it. Have you decided where you're going to live?"




"We're still working on that." Says Chloe "Plus we still have to get (your name)'s parent to agree. But thanks a lot mom." Chloe hugs her mother before you all head towards your house. You pretty much repeat the whole thing with your parents. All three of you in the living room, your parents sitting across from you. "So what did you want to tell us?" Your mother asks. You repeat yourself for the third time that day, explaining the whole co-mate issue.



How do your parents react?
133232122112222121222.title: Meet The Folks

1332321221122221212222.content:
To your surprise, your parents were taking this really well. Your mom was almost enthusiastic.

"This is great!" she says. "Here we were thinking that you weren't going to get a girlfriend till college, but here you are with two!"

Ramona and Chloe, who were sitting on either side of you, giggled to themselves. And you look at your mother with a look that said: "Pleas stop talking." Unfortunately, she doesn't.

"You know, you two," she says to Chloe and Ramona, "you're the first girls that [your name]'s ever brought home."

"That's not true, mom!" you object. "I've brought girls home before!"

"You're lying." Ramona and Chloe say simultaneously, looking at you with sly grins on their faces. You need to stop forgetting that female furries can sense dishonesty.

"It's not that embarrassing, [your name]." Chloe says.

"Yeah, look at it this way." Ramona says. "At least Chloe and I don't have to deal with any crazy ex-girlfriends."

"Yes, you definitely don't need to worry about that." your dad says. This was the first time he's ever embarrassed you like that. Usually, it was just Mom.

"That's it! This conversation is over!" you say.

Later, you and your (almost legal) co-mates meet outside your front door.

"So what are we gonna do regarding where we're going to live?" you ask.

"Well, my house is out of the question." Ramona says. "There's already me, my parents, and my sister, so having two more residents is impossible. On top of that, Roxanne is gonna make it hard for the three of us to have any privacy."

"There's always my house." Chloe says. "It's bigger than Ramona's, and it's only me and my mom living there. Plus, unlike most mothers, my mom respects my privacy a lot."

"My house is a good option, too. The guest room is nice and big, so that can be our room, while my current room can be the new guest room."

What's the final decision.
1332321221122221212222.title: Not What You're Expecting

choices: You see something in the contract that makes you have second thoughts
You don't see anything that you object to
13323212211222212122221.content:
Ultimately, you all agree that Chloe's house would be the best option. Chloe's mother was more than happy to accept you and Ramona, provided tha it was only until after you all finished school. Luckily, Chloe's house had a guest room with two beds, so there was no problems with the sleeping arrangements. Chloe would keep her room, and you and Ramona would share the guest room.



It didn't take long for the two of you to get moved in. You didn't really own very much, just your Xbox, laptop, and your clothes. Your parents. of course, were a bit sad to see you move out of the house so early in your life, but you promised them you would visit every so often.



On Friday after school, you and your soon to be mates head to he local resgistration commitee to get to work on your co-mate documents. All three of you were sitting in an office, while a female black horse searched through a file cabinet for the proper papers.



The thing with horse furries is they are naturally two to thee times the size of any other species, and this buildind hadn't been built with horses in mind. So the room was rather cramped for her, especally her chair, which stuck tightly to her rump. "I ought to sue this place." You heard her mutter. Finally, she found the the correct document and sat behidher desk, the chair on her ass creaking loudly.



"Now then, just sign on the indicated spaces, and you three will oficially be co-mates." Chloe and Ramona quickly skim the document and sign. You decide to carefully read it before signing.
13323212211222212122221.title: Moving In

choices: Chloe and Ramona basically own you
You are required to submit to a fertility test
133232122112222121222211.title: Second Thoughts

1332321221122221212222111.content:
You read down the contract and everything seems fine until you reach the very bottom. In very small print you can make out the few sentences. When you’re done reading them you realize signing this contract pretty much signs you away to Chloe and Ramona as their property. You audibly gulp and turn to the two anthro girls, “Guys I don’t know about this.” The tow approached you from behind, “What’s wrong.” You show them the extremely small printed final few sentences. Chloe looks at you with a worried expression, “Don’t worry, you know Ramona and I would never abuse that sort of thing. Now, maybe every now and then will tease you about it in a sexual kind of way,” when Chloe says sexual she runs her claws down your chest and belly. Chloe continues, “But we’d never try to do any harm… we love you.” With that Chloe wraps her arms around you, followed by Ramona, the two furry girls were very warm and made you start to sweat.

You three were interrupted by the desk attendant who was a chubby and now irritated male rat, “AHEM, sorry to break up the love fest but are you gonna sign this thing kid or what?” You apologize and start writing your name down. This had angered Chloe a little bit though and she had flashed the attendant a few dirty and angry looks before you all left. You finished signing the paper and handed it to the desk attendant, he stamped it and a few minutes later handed you three an official copy. You all jumped for joy, “Yay, we’re all finally mates.” Chloe and Ramona kiss you on the cheek and the three of you leave, back to Chloe’s house.

Chloe’s mom congratulated you three on becoming mates and you all had dinner together. You three spent the rest of your night together in your bedroom, watching television and eventually cuddling each other. Chloe and Ramona sat on either side of you and pressed their furry bodies against you and wrapped their arms around you. It started to get late and soon you three decided to turn in for the night. As you turn out the light you notice that your two anthro babes were growing, “What are you guys doing?” Ramona answered, licking her lips, “You know, just making ourselves grow so you’ll have to large, furry anthros to warm you up, I heard it was going to be very cold tonight and we can’t have our favorite human getting cold now can we.” You smiled as you got back into bed in between them and you were enveloped completely by the two furry females who giggles as they squished your head in between their breasts. You fell asleep that night covered in the warmth and fur of your mates.

As you look at the co-mate contract over carefully you notice that it is almost the same as a court marriage document, so you signed it and the horse furry said "Congrats." as she took it and made a copy for the system so that you can keep the original.

Some time after you got home you go to the guest room. You turn around to sit on the bed, but you didn't get to because the sight of Chloe and Ramona standing in front of you naked kept you from moving. They start walking to you and all you know was for the next fifteen minutes they were dry jumping you and you were enjoying very last second of it. Suddenly they asked who was going to be your "first". You quickly realize what they ware talking about. You couldn't decide as they both stared at you, each hoping that you would choose themselves. You knew they couldn't both be your first, so you suggest flipping a coin to keep from hurting their feelings. Heads for Chloe, tails for Ramona.Neither girl objects to the idea and you flip the coin.
