Completely forgetting the big question.
1332321221122221212222122.title: that was my last coin!

choices: Skip to the day of the trip.
13323212211222212122221222.content:
The next day, at school all of the girls were eying you with looks of jealousy. Word must've spread about you, Chloe, and Ramona becoming co-mates. During homeroom, the teacher mentions a class trip, which gets everyone in the class excited. During lunch, it was all you and your friends could talk about.

"I can't wait for this trip!" Colin says excitedly.

"We could all use a little R&R." says Ramona.

"Did the administration where we're gonna be going?" Chloe asks.

"Since my mom works in the administrations office, I was able to find out." Luke says. "We're going to Arckana."

"Where the hell is that?" you ask. You've lived on this planet for nearly a month, but you still didn't know the different places.

"Arckana is a city in the north. We're gonna be staying at their five-star ski resort." Luke.

"But what about Eileen." you say, worried. "I know I have two girlfriends and a bottle of mace to protect me, but-"

"Don't worry, I know what you mean. She's sneaky." Colin says. "But you don't have to worry about my sister. This trip is only for eleventh graders, so she can't come."

Everyone at the table sighed in relief.
13323212211222212122221222.title: The Class Trip

choices: It's a female furry with that hungry look in her eyes (oh shit!)
133232122112222121222212222.content:
Needless to say, you were excited for this trip. You had never really skied before, you were more of a snowboard kind of guy. But still, it would give you the chance to spend some time with your new mates. On Friday morning, the entire eleventh grade is taken by bus to the airport. Normlly, the males and females would go on seperate palnes, but since you, Chloe and Ramona were legally mates, you were allowed to go on the same plane with them.

As soon as your flight takes off, the surrounding females begin bombarding the three of you with questions.



"You can seriously share a guy with another female?"


"Why would you want to do that?"


"Wouldn't you rather have him to yourself?"



Fortunately, Chloe and Ramona made sure to sit on either side of you, to make sure none of the other females tried anything. You decided you might as well take a nap, since this would be a three hour flight, and slip your headphones over your ears to drown out the girl's chatter.



When you reach Arckana, you recieve good news and bad news. The good news is, the entire class would be staying at the resort hotal for the weekend. The bad news is, Every student had their own assigned rooms, and yours was two floors above Chloe and Ramona. Afraid one of the other females might try something, you explain to the chaperone that the three of you were allowed on the same plane, so you should be allowed in the same room.



The chaperone, Mrs Bartly, a skunk furry, said she would inform Chloe that you would be transfered to her room under legal circumstances, much to your relief. As you lay on your bed in your room, the door opens and your heart sinks as you see who it is entering.
133232122112222121222212222.title: Skip to the day of the trip.

1332321221122221212222122221.content:
A white cat furry with long, black hair entered the room.

"Hey, Jessica." you say, recognizing her as one of the girls in your English class, and one of Chloe's closest girlfriends. "Chloe's not here right now, I think she's in the lounge on the ground floor."

"Oh, I know that, [your name]. I passed by her on the way over here." she says, with a strange look in her eye. "I came to see you."

"Okay, what do you need?" you ask suspiciously.

"Oh, I just wanted to talk." she says, taking a seat next to you. Now you were really suspicious. You had made small friendships with some of the girls in your class, but Jessica was NOT one of them. Secondly, during your time at the school, you've heard rumors about Jessica's various ex-boyfriends. Of course, those rumors could be bullshit, but it's better to be safe than sorry. Luckily, you brought your trusty can of mace with you on the trip, just in case. You'd have to wait until she tries something first, though.

"What do you want to talk about?" you ask.

"Well, word on the street is that Chloe and Ramona are your co-mates." says Jessica.

"What of it?"

"Well, I heard that most humans were monogamous, so it's a bit of a surprise." she says.

"Yeah, I still find it hard to believe, even now." you say. "But I love the both of them. The thought of having to choose one and hurt the other is too much to bear."

"I understand." says Jessica, then she looks at you with a glint in her eye. "You know, if you ever get bored of those two, I'm always available." She puts one of her legs over yours while she says this.

"Uh... no thanks." you say nervously.

"Don't be shy, cutie." she says. "I know how boys are, they eventually get bored of the woman they're with and seek satisfaction from another. I can be your other." She then wraps her arms around you back and says "Maybe you'd like a demonstration?" You felt Jessica's arms get bigger, as does the rest of her body. You reach for your mace before her grip gets too tight. You spray the mace right in Jessica's eyes and she screams in pain. As soon as you were free from her grip you run out of the room and head for the stairs, thinking that the elevator wouldn't be a good idea. The hotel had seven floors, including the roof. You were on floor five, which is right in the middle. Chloe was on the ground floor, in the lounge, and Ramona was on the roof, in one of the hot tubs. Where do you go?
1332321221122221212222122221.title: An Uninvited Guest

choices: She makes it to you in time
She can't get through the crowd
13323212211222212122221222212.content:
As you run down each staircase two steps at a time, you think since Jessica is Chloe's friend, maybe she won't try anything around her. You can hear Jessica's footsteps as she furiously runs after you. You're too scared to see if she's behind you. When you reach the bottom of the last staircase, you run across the hotel lobby, into the lounge room.



The entire room is filled with female furries, all lounging on sofas and bean bags. A giant screen tv takes up one entire wall, showing some movie you've never seen. You frantically look around the room, trying to find Chloe. You spot her at the other end of the room, chatting with some friends. You don't even take three steps towards her when Jessica tackles you from behind, pinning you to the floor.



As Jessica stradles you, the attention of everyone in the room is instantly drawn to you. Jessica stares down at you with a snarl, her eyes burning red, from anger or the spray, you can't tell. Almost immedieately, the entire room begins crowding around you eager to watch the show.



Where the hell is Chloe!?



You can just faintly make out Chloe trying to force her way through the crowd, to once again save your ass. In the back of your mind, you can't help but feel a little patetic, having to rely on Chloe to always come to your rescue. You quickly put that thought aside as Jessica leans down towards your face, a low growl escaping her lips.



"You're going to pay dearly for that spray."



Her voice is low and dangerous, like a snake poised to strike.



Jessica unsheathes her claws and begins slicing off the buttons of your shirt, one by one. Your arms are pinned to your sides, you can't reach your mace, Jessica is already double your size so she's too heavy for you to throw off. Can Chloe get to you in time?
13323212211222212122221222212.title: How Many Times Has She Saved You Now?

choices: Invite Ramona to take a walk with you tonight.
133232122112222121222212222122.content:
Chloe keeps trying to push through the crowd of girls. "Out of my way!" you hear her yell. Unfortunately, it didn't sound like she was very close, and Jessica had already sliced your shirt open.

"I tried to be nice, but now you're gonna get it!" Jessica says as she raises her right paw, ready to slice you to ribbons with her claws. Just then, you see a flash of red and a flash of gray strike the the middle of Jessica's back. She was instantly knocked out and fell to her side. You look up and see Luke and Colin offering you their hands to help you up.

"Thanks, guys." you say as they pull you to your feet.

"No sweat." says Luke.

"And for future reference, a cat furry's weak spot is the middle of her back." says Colin. That was very valuable information. Now you had two girls to worry about: Eileen, who was after your virginity, and Jessica who was after your life. Thanks to Colin, though, you knew both of their weak spots. The three of you make your way to the elevator and Chloe finally catches up to you.

"Oh, my God!" she says, looking at you. "Are you okay?"

"I'm fine Chloe, no need to panic."

Chloe grows to twice her size and wraps Colin and Luke in a hug. "Thanks so much, you guys! How can I ever repay you?" she asks.

"Not squeezing the air out of us would be nice." says Luke.

Later that day, you, Chloe, Ramona, Luke and Colin were at the top of the ski hill, ready to go down. Ramona pulls Chloe from you and the others to talk to her in private. You sneak behind them so you could hear what they were talking about. The conversation pretty much went like this:

"I heard what happened with Jessica."

"Yeah, it was way too close."

"I feel really bad. I mean, I'm [your name]'s mate, too, but so far I haven't done anything to help him. Meanwhile, you're always saving him."

"Actually, it was Luke and Colin that saved him this time."

"Still, though, I feel like I haven't been the girlfriend he deserves, you know? It may sound silly, but I feel like he likes you more than me."

"You know that's not true, Ramona. Remember that night when he couldn't decide which one of us would be his first? If he liked me more, he would've chosen me in a heartbeat."

"You know, you're right. I'm being paranoid."

Oh, great. Now you have Ramona thinking that you like Chloe more than her. You needed to do something to let her know that's not the case, but what?
133232122112222121222212222122.title: It Was Bound to Happen One of These Days

choices: Nope, she just walks past you.
1332321221122221212222122221221.content:
Later that night, the issue with the sleeping arrangements was finally resolved. You were allowed to share a room with your two mates. The only problem was each room only had two beds. Being a gentleman, you let Chloe and Ramona take the beds while you ordered a cot from the hotel staff. You and Ramona were alone in the room while Chloe was off at the steam rooms. You look at your watch and see that the time is five-thirty. They should be starting to serve dinner in the dining room now.



You had been thinking how you heard Ramona say she thought you liked Chloe more than her. You had wanted to show her that wasn't how it is, but didn't have any idea how you would do so, until now. You look over at Ramona, who lay on her bed, reading a magazine.



"Hey Ramona?"



"Yeah?"



"Wanna go get some dinner, just you and me?"



Ramona shrugs and closes her magazine, deciding she might as well. In the dinning hall, food was served buffet style. You could pick whatever you wanted, and eat as much as you want. They had normal food like ribs, chicken, burgers, etc. But since Bestia made contact with earth, they began importing dog food, cat treats, and other such items, so that was also on the menu.



You and Ramona sit across from each other at a table, you picking at a chicken leg while Ramona chowed down on a bowl of kibble. "So Ramona..." You begin to speak, but Ramona raises a hand to stop you as she pauses to finish swallowing her food. "Yes?"



"I wanted to talk to you about something. I heard you feel that I like Chloe more than I like you." Ramona looks surprised. "How did you...wait, you were eavesdropping on me and Chloe, weren't you? You little sneak!" She says, playfully punching you in the shoulder. "Anyway, I want you to know that's not the case. You and Chloe are both beautiful in your own right. I couldn't possibly choose one of you over the other. Sure, Chloe is always saving my ass, but she just happens to be around whenever some girl tries to pull something with me. If I loved Chloe more than you, would I have wanted to have dinner with you alone?"



Ramona waves a hand. "Don't worry about it. Chloe already showed me how paranoid I was being." But as Ramona was speaking, you happened to look over her shoulder and see Jessica sitting ten tables away, glaring at you. An icy chill runs through your body as you feel as though her piercing eyes are staring into your soul. She gets up from her table and starts coming toward you. she wasn't seriously dumb enough to try anything with Ramona sitting right here, was she?
1332321221122221212222122221221.title: Does This Count As a Date?

13323212211222212122221222212212.content:
Ramona notices your uneasiness and asks what's wrong. She then turns around and sees Jessica. The turns back at you and says "It's okay, don't pay her any mind. Just focus on me." You do so as Jessica comes closer and closer to you. To your surprise, she just walks by your table saying nothing. Before she completely passes you, however, she whips you in the face with her tail. It didn't hurt, but you said "Ow" out of instinct.

"I saw that." Ramona say, glaring at her.

"I know." Jessica replies, not bothering to turn to look at the girl addressing her.

You hear Ramona growl in frustration. "Like you said, don't pay her any mind." you say. Ramona smiles at you and playfully kicks you underneath the table.

"Well, this is your night, so is there anything else you want to do?" you ask.

Ramona thinks for a second and says...
13323212211222212122221222212212.title: Neither the Time, Nor the Place

choices: You come to a stop, unharmed.
133232122112222121222212222122122.content:
Ramona leads you to the supply department where you both rent a long wooden sled. After putting on your snow gear, she takes you outside to the skilift.



"So you want to go sledding?"



"Yep, on this one particular mountain."



"What mountain is that?"



"Mount Back Breaker."


As soon as Ramona said the words "Mount Back-Breaker", your blood turns to ice, and not from the cold weather. For one thing any mountain with the words "Back-Breaker" in its name had to be trouble. Second, Mount Back Breaker was the highest mountain in the whole resort. You have a crippling fear of heights.



Your breath begins to quicken as the lift takes you higher and higher, all the way to the top. You and Ramona are the only ones around, the whistling of the icy wind echoeing through the entire peak. You don't want to look like a wuss in front of Ramona, but neither do you have a death-wish. Ramona sets the sled down at the very edge of the sloap and sits at the back end. "Well? Get on."



Perfect. Not only were you about to go zooming down a mountain at god knows how many miles per hour, but you get to have a front row seat to the whole thing. Your whole body is skaking as you sit in front of ramona. When she asks what's wrong, you just say it's the cold air. You feel like you are staring into oblivion as you look down the mile long slope, knowing that any second you would go speading to your doom.



Finally, Ramona pushes off, and away you go. As the freezing air rushes past your face, you imagine how you would look with your mouth frozen in a permanent G-force grin if you survive. You feel like you are on an out of control roller coaster as you continually gain speed. Ramona leans left and right, making the sled swerve as she lets out a howl of excitement.



After what felt like hours, but was really about fifteen seconds, you are close to the bottom of the gigantic hill. Maybe you were being over dramatic before. IT's alsmost over, and you sort of actually enjoyed it. It looks like you'll survive after all.
133232122112222121222212222122122.title: Dashing Through The Snow...

choices: Chloe and Ramona have something planned for you.
Luke and Colin invite you to have a Boys' Day Out with them.
1332321221122221212222122221221222.content:
You spoke too soon. All of a sudden, the sled crashes right into a rock, sending you and Ramona flying! You black you from the shock of it all. You wake up in your room God-knows-how-much time later. You see Ramona looking down at you with a smile.

"Up already?" she says. "That was shorter than I expected."

"How long have I been out?" you ask. "And how did we make it out of that crash?"

"Well," Ramona explains. "While we were zooming through the air, I was lucky enough to find a pile of snow to soften the fall. I grew to twice my size to cover you, and we landed in the snow safely. I snuck back up here so nobody would know what happened, and you woke up five minutes later."

"So nobody knows what happened?" you ask. "Not even Chloe?"

"Nope, it's our little secret." she says with a wink.

"One last question." you say. "Why don't I feel the slightest bit of pain from the fall?"

Ramona chuckles. "You can thank my girls for that." she says, looking down at her chest. You blush at the realization that Ramona's breasts cushioned your fall. You tried not to look directly at them.

"It's okay to stare." Ramona says. "I am your girlfriend, aren't I?"

"Still, won't it make you feel a little uncomfortable?" you ask.

"No, and I hope this won't make you feel uncomfortable." Without warning, Ramona kisses you deep on the lips. While she kisses you, you realize that this was the first time that Ramona's saved you. When she breaks the kiss, she gives you a smile. Later, Chloe comes back to the room.

"Did I miss anything?" she asks.

"Nah." says Ramona.

That night you fall asleep with your two mates cuddling either side of you affectionately.

The next morning...
1332321221122221212222122221221222.title: CRASH!

13323212211222212122221222212212222.content:
The next morning was the final day of the trip. You and your two mates spent most of the day snow-tubing and bobsledding. After lunch, you met up with Luke and Collin and decided to have a snowball fight. To make it more intersting, it was boys versus girls. Each group bulit their own fort and you spent the rest of the afternoon pelting each other with snowballs. Of course, Chloe and Ramona grew to twenty feet tall and sent boulders of snow flying towards the three of you, but doing so had aslo made them larger targets. By the end of it all, you all looked like living snowmen.



That evening, everyone packed their things and loaded onto the busses for the airport. You sat next to Ramona, while Chloe sat bhind you, with Luke and Collin in front. Collin and Ramona were busy arguing over who had won the snowball war.



"You two cheated by growing into giants!"



"What are you talking about? You can't cheat in a game where there are no rules!"



"Still, you had an unfair advantage!"



While they were busy bickering, Luke turns around to face you. "Hey (your name), Luke and I are gonna have a guys' day out this Friday, wanna join us?" "Sure." You had been spending a lot of time with your girlfriends, but none at all with your new buddies. Not too long ago, you and Luke were worst enemies. If he had asked if you wanted to hang out then, you would have told him to go to hell.Yet here you are now, friends with him.



By the time you boarded the plane home, you were already feeling tired from the day's events, and fell asleep almost as soon as the plane left the ground. The next thing you knew, you were awake in your own bed. Ramona lay next to you, her arm wrapped around you as she looked down at you smiling. "Sleep well?"



"What happened?"



"You passed out on the plane. You looked like you were having a good sleep, so I carried you home from the airport while Chloe carried the bags."



It was then that you noticed that you face was once again pressed to Ramona's bosom. Ramona giggled as she saw you blush. "I told you, it's perfectly alright." She gently presses you your face deeper into her cleavage. You decided if she was okay with it, you might as well enjoy it, the warmth and softness of her furry breasts feeling like heaven against your face. At this moment, Chloe happens to come in the room and laughs. "I'm sorry, am I interrupting you two?" Instead of breaking her hug, Ramona just shakes her head, holding you tighter. "Not at all. Care to join us?"



The week goes by rather quickly and pretty uneventful. At school, you sometimes pass Eileen and Jessica in the hall. The would glare at you, but they didn't try anything. Friday afternoon, you meet Collin and Luke in front of Collin's house. "So where do you guys wanna go first?" You ask. "I know this great place we can hang out downtown. Follow me." Says Luke as he leads you and Collin up the street.



Unbeknownst to you, Eileen was watching you from her window as you walked by. She smiles evilly as she dials Jessica's number on her phone. "He's going with my brother to his hang out spot. I'll meet you there. Without those two other bitches to protect him, he'll be ours for sure. Just remeber, I get him first."



Where does Collin take you?
13323212211222212122221222212212222.title: Boys' Day Out

133232122112222121222212222122122221.content:
You were surprised and delighted that you were taken to an arcade. When you go in, you see all sorts of games that you've never seen before, plus some that were imported from Earth, like Dance Dance Revolution and Tekken.

Colin takes you to play a game that he said was one of his favorites. "That's low, Colin. Challenging a newcomer to your best game? For shame." Luke says jokingly. You look at the game screen and see that Colin's name covered the high score chart in all the game modes. After looking at the game, you realize that this is similar to Street Fighter. Since you like a challenge, you decide to play against Colin. Hell, you have nothing to lose.

"You're on." you say.

You and Colin fight it out, and it was pretty evenly matched.

"How are you so good at this game on your first try?" he asks in amazement.

"I learn fast." you answer.

The fight was taking so long that the timer on the top of the screen reached zero, and since you had a tiny bit more health than Colin, you won.

"Damn, you're good." he says. "But I'll get you next time."

"There's not gonna be a next time." Luke says, with an unusual tone of worry in his voice. "Look who just got here!"

You and Colin turn around and are shocked to see Eileen and Jessica enter the arcade.

"I doubt they're here to play video games." you say.

"Quick! To the bathroom!" Luke says, and the three of you bolt to the men's room. By the time Eileen and Jessica spotted you, you had already made your way inside. You lock to door and turn to see Colin on the verge of a panic attack, and Luke didn't look so good, either. You begin to think for a moment, but your train of thought was interrupted by a knock on the door.

"Luke, Colin, we know you're in there with [your name]." says Eileen. "Hand him over and we'll leave you two alone."

You expected Luke to revert to his old ways and sell you out, but instead, he says "Can we have a few minutes?"

"You get five, and that's it!" says Jessica.

"I think I have a plan." you whisper to your friends. "I noticed that this place has low ceilings, and there's a lot of people here, so Eileen and Jessica won't be able to grow to maximum size. All we have to do is work our way through the crowd and then we can just catch a cab to get home."

"It sounds like a good plan, but who knows how long it will take for us to get a cab." says Colin. "We should just call Chloe and Ramona to come get us."

"Who knows how long it will take them to get here?" Luke asks.

"If Eileen and Jessica try to bust down the door, they'll attract unwanted attention, and the arcade manager will most likely throw them out." Colin explains.

"Well, Colin, I have my mace on me, so if push comes to shove, I'll spray them, then we can just jab at their weak points."

You and Colin had your own opinions while Luke stayed neutral, so he had the deciding vote on which plan was better. He eventually chooses....
133232122112222121222212222122122221.title: Arcade Ambush

1332321221122221212222122221221222212.content:
"Collin's right." says Luke. "Even if we get past them, once we get outside they have room to grow. I say we wait here." "Time's up!" Comes Jessica's voice. "Now are you gonna hand him over, or do we have to break this door down?" "Fuck you!" All three of you say. You hear Eileen and Jessica laughing outside the door. "Wrong choice." Says Eileen. "Now, we're gonna punish all three of you!"



The door shudders as they both begin banging on it. At first they tried kicking it down. "If you come in here, I'll burn both your eyes clean out of your skulls!" You threaten, hand ready at your mace. "Your spray won't save you this time!" Says Jessica. "I warned Eileen about that, so this time we came prepared! We're both wearing swim goggles!"



"Oh, fuck me." You say, now that your only weapon is useless. "Oh, we plan to." Says Eileen as they continue punding the door. If they manage to get it down before help arrives, you're fucked, in more ways than one. Now, there is a pause as they stop banging on the door, then a loud thud as they suddenly slam into it. This goes on for several minuets as they charge the door again and again.



THUD



(pause)



THUD



(pause)



THUD



With each impact you flinch, knowing that each time they strike the door, they get closer and closer to claiming their prize, your virginity. Finally, another voice from outside the door says "What are you doing, trying to break into the men's restroom? the two of you need to leave right now!" It's the manager! The three of you sigh in relief, rescue had finally come.



Or has it?



Your heart stops as you hear Eileen say "Please, help us! Our boyfriend slipped on the floor in the bathroom and hurt himself! Please unlock the door!"
1332321221122221212222122221221222212.title: The Calvary Arrives

13323212211222212122221222212212222121.content:
"Oh, well if that's the case, I'll let you two in." says the manager. In your mind you wished that the manager was a female, then she would've known that Eileen and Jessica were lying.

As the two of you reach her, she looks confused.

Colin's mom instinctively rejected the thought of her daughter doing something like that. "When I get my hands on you two, I'm gonna...." her sentence trails off as soon as she noticed that her mother was there.


"You're gonna what?" her mother asks, raising an eyebrow. You and Colin couldn't help but smile, but that just starts Eileen up again. "Stay out of this, mom! This is MY business!"


Her mother doesn't say anything. She simply walks over to Eileen, who wasn't moving and inch and was showing no fear in her face. "I dare you to tell me that again." she says.

You wake up gasping a huge breath of air and look around. You were still in your room, with Ramona sleeping in the other bed. You look in a nearby mirror to see that all your clothes are still on, but your forehead is sweaty. “Oh, thank God.” you say. “It was just a dream.”


“Bad dream, huh?” says Ramona. You’re heavy breathing must’ve woken her up. She walks up to you and you hug her, which takes her by surprise. “It’s okay.” she says “Just relax.”


That dream has you tense the entire morning. It’s a Saturday, but you don’t feel good at all. You don’t say a word at breakfast, which worries Ramona, Chloe, and her mother. “May I be excused?” you say as you get up and go to the bathroom. When you get into the bathroom, you hear a voice say “Look at yourself.” You look around and see nobody else. “Who’s there?” you ask. “Look in the mirror.” the voice says.


You comply with what the voice tells you. When you look in the mirror, you see your reflection staring back at you, with a disappointed look on his face. “You’re a nervous wreck.” he says. You realize that this is your conscience talking to you. “How can I not be?” you say. “I have two girls after me. No matter what I do, they just keep trying and trying.”


“They keep trying because they know that deep down you’re still scared of them.” says your conscience. “That alone is all the motivation they need.”


You realize that he was right. As long as you show no fear and stand your ground, they can’t do anything. “Girls like Eileen and Jessica feed on intimidation.” he continues. “That’s what fuels them to keep going.”


“You know what you’re right.” you say with a newfound confidence. You leave the bathroom and see Chloe and Ramona on the living room couch, watching TV. “We’re going out tonight.” you say.


That night, you, Chloe and Ramona were walking down the street. “Why the sudden burst of confidence earlier today?” asks Chloe. “Let’s just say I’ve woken myself up.” you answer.


You then hear Ramona and Chloe gasp. “What’s wrong?” you ask them. They point in the direction they were looking. You look to see Jessica across the street, staring at you. You have a look of confidence in your eyes as you walk across the street to face her. Chloe and Ramona just look at you as if you were crazy.


“You must have a death wish if you’re facing me without your girlfriends protecting you.” she then unsheathes her claws. “I’d be more than happy to grant that wish.”


“Go ahead,” you say. “I DARE you.”


“You’re just asking for it now.” she says, but with a calm demeanor.


“I know I am, but I’m not scared of you anymore.” you say. “So do it. Come on.”


Jessica growls in anger and swings at you only for you to catch her wrist in mid-swing. Her eyes shrink in surprise. “You’re not lying.” she says, more to herself than to you. “You really aren’t scared of me.”


“Don’t ever harass me again. Got it?” you say as you let go of her hand.


“Got it.” Jessica timidly says before tuning around and swiftly walking away.


You look across the street to see Ramona and Chloe with looks of amazement on their faces. “That was unbelievable.” says Chloe. “No kidding.” says Ramona.


With that issue out of the way, you and your two mates make your way to…

"Chloe was just showing me some tracks from one particular artist." "Really? Who?" you ask. Chloe tosses you the case for the record, and you look at the singer on the cover.


She was a lady, and a cat furry as well. She had long blonde hair, and light orange fur. You look at the singer's name. "Olivia Lockheart?" you say, confused that she looked like she was related to Chloe. "Wait a sec." you say. "Yep. That's my grandma." she says with a smile. This explains Chloe's knack for singing.


"So what were you doing last night?" Ramona asks. You decide to try out the trick that Luke showed you. "Oh, me and Colin just crashed at Luke's house and used Colin's laptop." you say. "They probably watched stupid YouTube videos all night long." Chloe says to her co-mate.


She was somewhat right.


Later that day, after you remove the hidden camera from the bookshelf, you pass by Chloe's mother's bedroom door and over hear her talking to her daughter. She was saying something about a family member coming to visit for the winter break. Who's coming to visit?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Twisted

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
The conversation pretty much went like this.

“Mom, do we have any plans for winter break?”

“Well, I had planned on going on vacation, but a family member is coming to town for the break.”

“Really? Who?”

“Grandma Olivia.”

“Wait, if Grandma Olivia is that family member you’re talking about, then why can’t we visit her? She has a bigger house and-”

“It’s a four hour drive, and gas is expensive. Besides, I don’t think it’d be fair to put [your name] and Ramona through all that just to see our family member.”

“*sigh* I guess that’s true.”

You rush over to your room so Chloe or her mother wouldn’t find out you were eavesdropping. When winter break finally comes, Chloe and her mother leave to pick up Olivia. When they come back, you and Ramona go down to the living room to greet them. When you hear them approaching, you hear someone say “I just can’t wait to see this mate of yours!” You then hear a giggle followed frustrated sigh.

When the door finally opens you see Chloe, her mother, and Grandma Olivia. Olivia looked like a thirty-year old mother while Chloe and her mom looked like her twin daughters. The years obviously haven’t caught up to her. “So this is him!” Olivia says excitedly. “He’s just adorable!” You blush a little. “And this is Ramona, my co-mate.” says Chloe. Ramona smiles and says hi.

Later that evening, all of you have dinner, but where?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Grandma Olivia

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
That night, as you all sat at the dinner table, you decided to get to know Olivia better.



"So, Grandma Benson..."



"Just call me Olivia dear."



"Okay, Olivia, Chloe tells me you used to be a famous singer."



"Oh yes. I was pretty much the Bestia equivlant of Marilyn Monroe in those days. I even still have the awards that I won on display in my living room. But as the years went on, people's taste in music changed. It didn't bother me though. So I settled down and started a family."



"If you don't mind me asking, just how long ago was this?"



"About forty years."



You guess that would put Olivia somewhere in her sixties. "Well, you certainly look great for someone your age." Chloe glares at you from across the table when you say that, but Olivia just chuckles. "Thank you. If I didn'tknow better, I'd think you were trying to flatter me."



Olivia actually seemed to enjoy answering your questions. You guessed it brought back memories of her celebrity days. When it came time for bed, there was a small dilema. Since you and Ramona had the guest room , Olivia would have to sleep on the couch. You offered to switch places with her, to which she said she was so happy that Chloe had found herself a gentleman. In the middle of the night, as you lay on the couch, you are awakened by the sound of footsteps coming down the stairs.



You call out "Who's there?" but get no answer. In the darkness of the room, you can makeout the shape of a furry moving through the livingroom. You turn on the lamp, to see the sleepwalking....
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Family Dinner

choices: She says goodnight and goes back to bed.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
You're eyes are still adjusting to the darkness, but the shadow eventually turns out to be...


"Olivia?" you say. You know for sure that it's her, but she seems to be sleepwalking. You walk up to her and snap your fingers in her face, which does the trick. "Wha? Oh my." says Olivia. "What was I-"


"You were sleepwalking." you tell her. "Oh, I see," she says. "I must be thirsty or something." Olivia takes a seat in a nearby chair. "Well, stay there. I'll get you some water." you say.


Olivia chuckles. "You know, you don't have to be such a gentleman in order to win my approval of you dating my granddaughter." You shake your head as you pour some water into a glass. "It's not like that. it's just how I am. I was taught to treat guests properly." You hand her the glass and she drinks the water.


"Ah, thank you very much." she says as she gets up. "No problem, Olivia." you say. Olivia then looks at you with a smile. "You know, you are such a cutie." she says as she brushes your face with her tail in a way that reminds you of when Chloe first did that to you.


What happens now?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Cat or Cougar?

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"Well, goodnight hon."



As she turns around to go back to bed, you suddenly blurt out "I would love to hear you sing sometime." Olivia turns to look at you with a surprised look. "Oh, well, I don't know sweetie. It's been so long since I last sang for anyone. I'm pretty sure my vocal cords must be rather rusty." You give her an assuring smile. "I'm sure you can still sing like a bird."



Olivia smiles warmly. "Thanks hon." She says, giving you a hug. "I'll think about it. Maybe I could put on a little show for you before I go home. Maybe even get Chloe to join me." With that, she leaves the kitchen and goes upstairs to bed, while you lay back on the couch and fall into a dreamless sleep. The following afternoon, your cellphone rings. It's Collin, and he sounds desperate.



"(your name)! I need your help!"



"What's wrong Collin?"



"This girl is stalking me!"



"What girl?"



"I was at the mall earlier today, and I noticed this skunk girl following me. It's not like how it was with you and eileen, thank god, but still, even as I left the mall she was still following me. I started running and so did she, I couldn't lose her! Now she's standing outside my house, just staring at my window!"



"Hang on, I'm coming over."



You go to Collin's house to see that he wasn't kidding. Standing in front of his house was a tall female skunk. She wore a leather jacket, with tight black pants and high heeled boots, with her white hair in a tall, spikey mohawk, and mutiple piercings in her ears and nose. All this mad eher appear to be part of the punk/biker crowd. Hell, you wouldn't be surprised to see her riding a harley.



At firt, she looked kind of threatening, but you had always been taught not to judge others by their appearance. For all you know, she could be a good, kind person. On ly one way to find out. You approach her and say "Excuse me, but, what are you doing stalking my friend?"
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Punky Skunky

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
The skunk girl flinches a little, but she (thankfully) doesn't spray you. She turns slightly to look back at you, and she blushes at the sight of you. She then turns back around and continues looking at Colin's window. "Hello?" you say, thinking she was just ignoring you. She finally speaks, albeit rather quietly. "You're... you're Chloe and Ramona's boyfriend, right?" she says.


"Yeah..." you say. "Who're you?" You don't remember seeing her in any of your classes, or on the trip to Arckana. "My name is Natasha." she says. "I'm a sophomore." Well, that explains why you don't recognize her. You never made a point of getting to know the students in other grades.


"Well, what are you doing here?" you ask in the most polite way possible. "I... wanted to talk to Colin, but... I just don't know how. I've been following him trying to get myself to say something... but I just couldn't. I was hoping that he'd come out so I could tell him how I feel."


You feel kind of sorry for Natasha. "Well, I guess he was kind of scare because of...um..." you struggle to find a nice way to say this. "Because of how I look?" she says, finishing your sentence. "I guess that makes sense. I don't normally dress like this." You think to yourself that this is most likely another reason why you've never seen her. "I usually wear sweaters and jeans, but I thought that if I loked more edgy, then he might like me."


"You don't have to do that. Just be yourself." you say. "Tell you what, I'll go and talk to Colin and I'll let him know that he has nothing to be afraid of." Natasha smiles "Thank you." she says. You take out your phone and dial Colin's number. "Hey, Colin. Can I come in?" you ask. "Go ahead. The door's open." he says. When you walk in, the first thing you see is Eileen in her knees scrubbing the kitchen floor, a sight that you couldn't help but smile at. She still had one week of punishment left. You would've given her the chair, but something's better than nothing, right? You go upstairs and enter Colin's room and see him playing a handheld game.


"So this is what it's come to?" you say, smiling.


"Ths is not funny! I have a chick stalking me!" he says. "Now I know what it was like to be you."


"Okay, number one, no you don't. My situation was MUCH worse. Number two, stop being a drama queen. Natasha's not as bad as you think."


"Wait. That girl out there is NATASHA!?" he says, surprised.


"So you know her?" you ask.


"Yeah, she was in my gym class last year." he says. "I never would've guessed that was her. She normally dresses less... edgy."


"Well, believe it o ot, she wanted to get your attention." you say. "So do me a solid and go talk to her."
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: A Longtime Crush

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
Collin sighs as he puts down his game and heads downstairs, with you following close behind. Just before you head out the door, you can't help but take one more look at Eileen. Then you realize not only was she scrubbing the floor, but she was doing it with a toothbrush. You smirk to yourself as you shut the door behind you.



Natasha stood at the end of the walkway to the proch, looking down at her feet with her hands behind her back. She looks up as she hears Collin approach and just stares down at him, behing about a head taller. "Hi." Says Collin. "Hi." She says, albiet quietly. "So, you're Natasha? You sure look different than I remember you." Natasha looks away as she speaks. "I...was told you might like me if I was dressed like this. I didn't even think you noticed me when we were in the same class togther."



"Who told you that?"



"My sisters. They dressed me like this."



"Well, if anything dressing like that will scare people away. So, my friend here tells me you have a crush on me, that's why you were following me."



Natasha nods.



"Well, if you want, maybe we could, I don't know....
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Confrontation

choices: Eilen (she must've snuck out of the house).
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"Maybe you'd like to go see a movie with me tomorrow night." Colin asks Natasha. Her face brightens up upon hearing this. "Really?" she says.


"Sure, as long as you don't take anymore wardrobe advice from your sisters." he says, and they both chuckle.


"Don't worry about that." says Natasha, who proceeds to take out the piercings in her nose and most of the piercings in her ears. She then mats down her mohawk and puts it in a ponytail. "Ah, that feels much better." she says. "So... I guess I'll see you tomorrow night, then."


As she walks out of view, Colin immediately turns to you. "Dude, I need you to shadow me."


"Say what?"


"I've never been on a date with a girl before, and I don't want my first date ever to end up as bad as yours." You then remember your first date with Chloe, and all the drama that followed, which happened to be at the movies, too. "You had to bring that up?" you ask. Then again, if that incident didn't happen, you wouldn't be where you are now: with two hot girlfriends that would do anything for you. Think about it: your relationship with Chloe, which was fake at the time, wouldn't have been as strong as it was now, and Ramona probably would've been miserable.


"Alright. I'll help you out."


When you go home, you tell Chloe and Ramona about Colin's date. "Heh, I never knew the guy had it in him." Ramona says.


"Yeah, I just can't get over the fact that Natasha's older sisters would tell her to dress like that." Chloe says.


"You really think they told her that to make her look bad?" you ask.


"There's no other reasonable explanation." she answers.


"Well, all we have to do is make sure that Colin doesn't fuck this up." says Ramona.


"Or that nobody else fucks it up for him." you say. "Eileen may be out of the picture, for now, but Natasha's sisters might sabotage this date."


The following night, you, Chloe, and Ramona go to the movies. The three of you were going to keep an eye on Colin and Natasha without Colin knowing. Natasha looked especially beautiful tonight. she had on a purple blouse and a navy blue skirt. So far, the date seemed to go well, but once Colin and Natasha got their snacks, someone shows up, looking for troublr.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Movie Night: Take Two

choices: "What are you talking about? We're here to look out for our sister."
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
Through the double doors of the theater entrance, walks two skunks which, from the way they were dressed, you knew had to be Natasha's sisters. One of them looked like she was wearing a porqupine on her head, due to her hear being set in spikes all over her scalp. She wore a black short sleeved shirt with a skull on it, and a red and black checkered skirt with knee-high boots with spiked heels.



The second skunk had long hair down to her shoulders, with a single bang covering her left eye. She wore what was once a regular shirt, but she had apparently cut it in half so that it ended just below her chest, exposing her stomach. She wore ragged, torn black jeans and combat boots on her feet.



"Well, I can see why they told Natasha to dress the way she did." You say. The two skunks spot Natasha heading into the screen room, and start to follow her, before you and your two girlfriends step in front of them. "Alright you two, give it up." You say. "We know what you're here for."



"Who the hell are you?" Said the skunk with the spikey hair.


"I'm the guy who's here to make sure you don't screw up my friend's first date." You say. "What are you talking about?" Said the second skunk. "Don't give us that!" Snaps Ramona. "We know you gave your sister bad fashion advice advice to make her look bad, and now you're here to ruin her first date with Collin."



The two skunks look at each other, before looking back to you and saying...
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Double Trouble (or is it?)

choices: "we wear this so no one will try to mess with us."
"these are just disguises." They look IDENTCAL to Natasha...
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
At first, you started to believe that they were trouble, but now that you see closer, one of them is eyeing you. "Wait a minute, you're [your name], right?"

         You're starting to get tired of the attention so as a sort of reply, you sigh, about to give one last intro. But you were cut off.

         "That's him alright," the other skunk says. "Lemme guess, shadowing your friend as well? Natasha told us about you, and of her date asking you to help him out."

         Now this was interesting. "So, wait," you say, "you're not here to sabotage her date?"

         They give out hearty laughs, so very unfitting to their appearance.

         "Dude,"
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Kindred minds and hearts

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"So what if we are?" the sisters say simultaneously.


"Why would you want to sabotage your sister's chance at finding a mate?" Chloe says. Her tone of voice sounded like she was more offended than Natasha would be.


"Why should Natasha find a guy before us?" the skunk with the long hair asks.


"Maybe it's because she's likeable?" you think, not daring to say that out loud.


"Oh, i get it." says Ramona. "You're jealous of your little sister!"


"NO WE'RE NOT!" the sisters yell. You didn't need to be a furry to know that they were lying. Then Ramona pushes things a little too far. "Honestly, it's your own faults that you two don't have mates yet. I don't mind the punk look, but you two take it way too far." The whole time, Chloe signals for Ramona to stop, not wanting to make a scene, but it was all in vain.


"You wanna take this outside?" says the spiky-haired skunk.


"Why not, I could use some fresh air." Ramona retorts, as she and the sisters make their way out the theater. Before they exit, the long-haired skunk turns around and says. "You too, kitten." This made Chloe angry.


"NOBODY calls me kitten!" she says, following them out.


You should go and make sure nothing bad happens to them, but you can't forget what you came here to do in the first place, which is to look out for Colin. What do you do.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Shit's Gettin' Real

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
For a moment, you're torn between looking out for your mates, and looking out for your best friend. Eventually, you decide you might as well do what you came here to do, and make sure Collin's date goes smoothly. You figured Chloe and Ramona can handle themselves, and should keep Natasha's sisters busy.



You buy yourself some popciorn and soda so as not to look suspicious, and take a seat directly behind Collin and Natasha without them noticing. You notice Natasha was holding the popcorn, and you hope Collin doesn't accidently stick his hand between her legs like you did with Chloe.



Sure, that may have led to you scoring two girlfriends, but you doubt Collin would be so fortunate. Your cell phone vibrates in your pocket, and you see a text from Chloe.



Waiting outside. Sisters gone. Where R U?



You quickly type a response.


Watching Collin. Good so far. What now?



I'm coming in.


Five minutes later, Chloe enter the theater and sits next to you. "Where's Ramona?" You whisper. "She got sprayed." Chloe replies. "She had to go home. Try not to breathe around her for a while."



With about twenty minutes of the movie left, how does the remainder of the date go?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Bros before ho's.

choices: Don't sleep with her, but entertain her a little bit.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
Thankfully, the date went really smoothly. Colin and Natasha seemed to be enjoying themselves as well.


When the movie was just about to end, Natasha slips her hand into Colin's, an action that he doesn't object to. They look into each other's eyes an slowly lean in towards each other. The two of them kiss for about ten seconds before they stop. You and Chloe leave the theater quickly so that they wouldn't see that you were sitting behind them.


On the way home, you get a call from Colin. "Dude, my date with Natasha went perfectly! I don't even know why I was so worried!"


"You should have been. Natasha's sisters almost ruined the whole thing."


"Oh really? Well, thanks for looking out for me, man."


"No problem. Oh, and I saw your kiss with Natasha." you hang up the phone before you get a response.


When you get home, you see Ramona on the front porch, in a tub of what smells like white vinegar and peroxide.


"Make all the jokes you want." she says.


"That's what happens when you pick fights." says Chloe.


"We won, didn't we?" Ramona retorts. "So how did it go?"


"Great!" you say. "They even kissed."

All of a sudden, Chloe pulls you into the house. Once inside, she grows to twice her size and carries you to her room. She then throws you onto her bed.


"What's going on?" you ask.


"Remember when I told you that I wanted to wait until the right time to have sex?"


"Yeah..." you say, liking where this is going.


"Well, Mom and Grandma are out of the house, so it's just you and me, your little kitten." she says, nuzzling up to you.


"I thought you didn't like people calling you Kitten." you say.


"You're an exception." she says. "It makes me feel sexy when you say it." She then gets a condom from her drawer.


"What about Ramona? You got to watch when she and I slept with each other."


"She already knows what sex with you is like." Chloe says taking off her clothes. She then gets on top of you. "Now hurry up and do me, already." That must've been the heat talking. What do you do.

choices: "Maybe Luke and Collin can come up with something."
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"As you wish, my lady." You say in your smoothest, most charming voice. Ten minutes later, the two of you lay panting and sweating, Chloe resting her head on your chest. "How was I?" You ask. "Incredible!" Says Chloe between breaths. "Ramona's gonna be so jealous when she hears you lasted twice as long with me than you did with her." You chuckle. "I'm getting better as I go."



You both fell asleep with your arms wrapped around each other, the sound of Chloe's purring soothing you into slumber. The next morning, as you and your two mates walked to the park, you had to hold your breath around Ramona, because she still had some skunk smell to her. "Your mom could have at least let me sleep on the couch." She said grumpily to Chloe. Chloe's mom didn't want Ramona stinking up her house, so she had to sleep in the hammock out back.



"Well, I'm sorry, but my mom doesn't want you gagging us to death. Besides, it could be worse, at least it didn't storm last night."



"I'm gonna get those two skunks back, mark my words."



All day, everyone did their best to avoid Ramona to the point where she had to sit alone on a park bench. You and Chloe see Natasha and she comes over to you and Chloe and asks "What's with her?" "Your sisters sprayed her last night." You reply "How did that happen?" You hesitate, but decide to tell her how the three of you had been watching out for Natasha and Collin last night, and what had happened.



"Those bitches!" She says when you get to the part about how her sisters tried to sabotage her chance with Collin, which surprised you, because you, didn't take Natasha as one to curse. "I should have known they were up to something when they told me to dress like that!"



"Well, Ramona wants to get back at them, if you want in." Says Chloe. "I'd say they deserve some payback." Natasha nods in agreement. "Lori and Onyx have gone too far this time, but what can we do to get back at them?"



"I have an idea." You say.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Take it!

"Something tells me that Luke and Colin can come up with something." you say. Luckily Luke and Colin were sitting at a nearby table. Seems like everyone wanted to come to the park today. "Hey sweetie." says Colin as he sees Natasha. She giggles and blushes in response. Luke, however repeats what Colin said in a mocking tone. "You're just mad because you still don't have a girlfriend." Colin retorts, as Luke rolls his eyes.


You tell your two friends about possibly getting back at Natasha's sisters, and ask if they have a plan in mind. They turn away from you and converse with each other momentarily, until they turn back and say. "We've got it!"


Later that day, Luke explains his and Colin's plan to you, Chloe, Natasha, and Ramona, who by that time had most of the skunk smell off of her. MOST of it.


"Alright, so it's obvious that Lori and Onyx did what they did because they were jealous of Natasha having a boyfriend, right?" Luke asks. You and the girls all nod your heads. "Why don't we give them what they want? I'll ask them both to go on a date with me and-"


"Oh, so you're trying to be like me." you say, interrupting him.

Colin takes out two packets and gives them to Natasha. "These are special beverage sweeteners that stop the glands that excrete a skunk's spray for twenty-four hours."

"Anyway, when they say yes, I'll lead them to a 'secret spot' and that's when-"

"That's when you guys will pelt them with waterballoons."

You meet back at Collin's garage, where Collin mixes your "ingredients" in a blender, bit by bit, then pours it all into a tub with a tap. "We just need one more thing." Says Collin as he hands Natasha an empty jar. "Wait, you expect me to..."

The next day, you, Chloe, Ramona, and Natasha are sitting up on the branches of trees above a small clearing in the woods, waiting for Luke to arrive with your "targets".Each of you holding a bucket full of homemade stinkbombs in your lap. On schedule, Luke appears from the trees with Lori and Onyx. "Remember guys, wait till Luke is away from the girls so we don't hit him by accident." whispers Colin.


"Wait a sec. Couldn't my sisters sense that he was lying about the date?" asks Natasha.

The next morning, which was the last day of winter break, what happens?

As you wake up and go downstairs for breakfast, you see Ramona at the table.

When Chloe's mom and grandma come down the stairs where do they say they're taking you.

Every year on Besita, the city of Krashana holds a grand festival in the park known as the Winter Carnival, and that just happened to be where Chloe's mom and Olivia were taking the three of you. Olivia even mentioned that she had a little surprise for you there. The only problem was Luke and Collin couldn't come, due to there being no more room in the car.


" So what kind of things do they have at this place?"


"Oh, Ice skating on the lake, snow sculpture competition, live entertainment, rides, all kinds of stuff." Says Chloe's mom as she drives you to the carnival. "Have you two ever gone to this before?" You ask your mates. They both nod.



"Me and mom go every year." Says Chloe "I only ever went once, when I was six." Says Ramona "I don't really remember much of it though."


When you get to the carnival, the three of you head off together. Basically, it was like a theme park in the snow. There was rides, food stands, etc , but also the stuff Chloe's mom had mentioned., The first thing the three of you tried was ice skating, but that quickly proved to be a mistake, asbo quickly found yourself flat on you face, or your assassin's every time you attempted to even stand.


Chloe and Ramona couldn't help but giggle at your sad attempt to skate, but didn't say anything. Afterwards you decided to check out...
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Walking in a Winter Wonderland

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"Where should we go next?" asks Ramona.


"I dunno," says Chloe. "Maybe we should let [your name] decide since he's never been here befo-" Chloe's stops mid-sentence when she realizes what time it is. "Scratch that! We have to get to the concert stage!"


You then realize what's going on. Earlier, Grandma Olivia said that she would be the live entertainment at the carnival this year, and that she had arranged for Chloe to sing with her. When you finally get to the backstage entrance, you're blocked by a security guard, a grizzly bear furry.


"It's fine, Butch. They're with me," says Chloe, and the guard lets the three of you in, and you meet up with Chloe's mother and grandma.


Chloe and her grandmother spend a good while preparing for the show. Hair, makeup, dresses, the whole nine yards. All the while, you, Ramona, and Chloe's mother can tell that the poor kitten is very nervous.


"What's wrong, Chloe?" you ask. "It isn't like you to be nervous."


"Yeah, sweetheart," says her mother. "You've sung in front of crowds before."


"Your mom's right," adds Ramona. "Remember the talent show at school two years ago? Everyone loved you!"


"Well, most of the people in this audience are fans of Grandma," Chloe argues. "They're gonna expect me to be just as good as her!"


"Sweetie, you are as good as me," Olivia chimes in. "Hell, by the time you're my age, you're gonna be better. Don't be so nervous."


Chloe sighs. "Okay," she says.


Showtime rolls around, and the MC begins to introduce Olivia.


"Alright, everyone! Put your hands together for the singing legend, you know her, you loved her, the beautiful Olivia Lockheart*!"


Olivia walks onstage as the audience goes wild for her. The former singer basks in the admiration for the first time in a long time.


"Hello, everyone! I hope you're all having a great time at the Winter Carnival. Before I get started, I have a treat for you! I'm not gonna be singing alone today. I want you all do give a warm welcome to my granddaughter, Chloe Benson!"


Chloe, apprehensively steps out onto the stage at first, but after hearing how loud the crowd is cheering, she gets more comfortable. Both Chloe and Olivia give an amazing performance, and how does the crowd react?


*Note: Lockheart is Chloe's mother's maiden name.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Stars of the Show

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
As soon as Olivia and Chloe finished singing, the crowd burst into applause and cheers. Just offstage, you, Ramona, and Chloe's mother applauded as well. "I knew she could do it." You say "Now I see where Chloe got her singing skills from." Chloe and her grandmother continued to bask in the crowd's praises for a while longer, before Olivia takes the mic.


"Thank you! Thank you! It's good to see some of my old fans still remember me. So how did you all like my granddaughter? "



The audience immediately cheers and whistles, causing Chloe to visibly blush beneath her fur. "Do you want to hear her again?" The crowd's response was a resounding "Yeah!" Olivia hands Chloe the microphone and steps back.


"All yours, sweetie."


For a little bit, Chloe hesitated, nervous about doing a solo. But at the urging of Olivia, the audience quickly gave her plenty of encouragement. With a new air of confidence, Chloe began to sing. The sound of her voice was beyond that of any singers you knew of on earth, like the choir of a thousand angels. You couldn't help but loose yourself in the sound of her voice, just standing there, mesmerized. You didn't realize what you were doing until Ramona snapped her fingers at your ear, giggling.


When Chloe is done, the applause and cheering from them is almost deafening. But just as it finished quieting down, you could make out two voices booing at Chloe. You take a peek out into the crowd, noting to yourself to kick the asses of whoever it, when you see the boos were coming from...

She was a criminal? Now you really need to help Collin! You pretend to give up and walk away until you're out of sight before you dial Collin's cell. "Dude, do not leave your house! She's a criminal who's trying to claim you as her boyfriend!"

"Your cousin Missy is coming to visit." you hear Chloe's mom say. Judging by Chloe's response, she doesn't seem too happy. "WHAT!?" she yells angrily. "She wanted to see us, so she asked if she could stay here." her mother says. "And you just said yes?!" she says.


"Chloe, be nice." her mother says. "She hasn't seen you in years."


"There was a reason for that!" yells Chloe. "I can't stand Missy! She's such a bi-" she stops in the middle of her sentence, remembering that she was speaking to her mother.


"Well, there's nothing I can do about it now." her mother says. "Winter break starts tomorrow, and Missy is already packed and ready to go."


You hear Chloe give a loud grunt of frustration, and you quickly run up to your room so she won't catch you. When you shut the door behind you, Ramona looks at you and says "Looks like you were eavesdropping on Chloe and her mom." "How could you hear them from here?" you ask her. "I'm a dog, remember?" she says.


Later that night, you go to Chloe's room and see her sitting on her bed, with a pissy look on her face. "Not right now [your name]." she says. "What's wrong?" you ask, as if you didn't already know. "My cousin is coming to visit and she's a total pain!" she explains. "We haven't seen each other in two years and now, she wants to come visit."


"Curious question: how old is she?" you ask.


"Twenty." she answers. "Ever since she turned eighteen, she's been an even bigger pain in the ass with her high-and-migty attitude."


"Well, whatever happens, Ramona and I are here for you." you say.


"Thanks." she says.


The next day, Chloe and her mother leave to go pick up Missy. "You think she's as bad as Chloe says?" you ask Ramona. "Chloe's not the type of girl that would dislike someone without a good reason. We should be on our toes around this cousin of hers."


Later, you hear a car pulling into the yard. Next you hear an unfamiliar voice saying "Thanks again for letting me stay here, Aunt Claire." "No problem." she replies. Then you hear a frustrated grunt. The door opens and you see Chloe, Claire and a brown cat furry.This must be Missy. Part of her face is cream colored, as well as her chest and stomach fur. You can tell because she has on a top that shows her midsection. She has long, brown hair and a long tail. Her arms, legs, ears, and tail have stripes of a darker brown.


"Oh, Chloe!" she says. "You never told me that you had a mate!"


"Yeah, and for good reason." Chloe mumbles to herself. Nobody (except maybe Ramona) could hear her, but you could read her lips.


"And who's this?" Missy asks, looking at the girl sitting next to you..


"I'm Ramona, Chloe's co-mate." she says.


"And I thought that Chloe didn't like sharing with others." Chloe grits her teeth at that remark.

Later that evening, Claire takes everyone to a local restaurant for a family dinner. How does it go?

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"I just don't know, (your name). I mean, I'm still in homeschool, and she's probably in college. It would be kind of awkward, don't you think?"

You had no idea if Missy was in college, but you were determined to find someone for her, even if it wasn't Luke. "Okay, tell you what. Just come meet her, and take her out on one date. If it doesn't work out, I'll never bother you with this again."

For several moments, there was silence as Luke thought it over, until finally, "Okay. I'll give it a try. I'll be there at seven, but I make no promises that I'll hook up with her, alright?" You agree, and hang up. You tell Missy that Luke agreed to meet her, and she is overjoyed. "I can't thank you enough for this, (your name)! I could just kiss you!" Unfortunately, just as she says that, Chloe and Ramona come down the stairs behind her.

"What was that?" Says Chloe angrily as Ramona growls. You explain everything to them, and that calms them down. "So you were just jealous of us the whole time?" Chloe asks. Missy nods.

"Well then, if you're going on your first date, we need to get you ready!" Says Chloe excitedly, eager to get Missy to leave the three of you alone. The three girls head to the mall to prepare Missy for her date, while you wait at home. That night, you all sit in the living room, as Missy paces back and forth in her new dress, waiting for look to arrive.

"So what's this guy like?" Missy asks "To tell you truth, he used to be a real dick to me and Ramona, but he started respecting me after I kicked a girl in the stomach." "You hit a girl?" Missy asks, shocked "Hey, it was self defense! She was gonna rape me. You would have done the same."

Just then, the doorbell rings. "That must be him!"Squeals Missy excitedly. You get up to answer the door, and you are surprised to see Luke, wearing a tuxedo! "Wow, Luke. I never took you you for the formal type."

"Well, this is my first real date, so I figured I should look my best."

You introduce Luke to Missy, and the two of them head out. "Do you think it'll work out?" You ask Chloe "I certainly hope so." She says "That way, Missy can annoy Luke instead of us."

A few hours later, the phone rings. You answer it, and it was Missy. "So how did the date go?"
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Hesitation

choices: "I think I might ask Missy to go out with me again."
"I don't think Missy's right for me..."
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"Oh, it was wonderful, [your name]!" she says. "Luke took me to the best restaurant in town, and he insisted that he pay for it himself. He was such a gentleman! After that, he took me to see a play at the community theater, and afterwards he gave me his number so I could call him!"


"That's great Missy," you say. "Did you kiss him?"


"How else was I supposed to thank him for the best night of my life?" she asks. "Oh, [your name], I think Luke might be the one!"


"Maybe," you say. "So where are you right now?"


"I'm actually walking towards the front door," she says. "I'll see you inside." With that, the line goes dead. In seconds, you hear a knock on the front door, and you let Missy in. She immediately went up to Chloe's room to tell her and Ramona about how she spent her night with Luke. Meanwhile, you dial Luke's number into your phone and call him.


"Hello?" she says.


"Hey, man," you say. "Missy just told me that your date went perfectly. She also said that you were quite the gentleman."


"Oh, really?" he asks, a little embarrassed, which is kind of out of character for him.


"Yup, I think she really likes you," you say.


Luke chuckles. "Well..."
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: All's Well That Ends Well

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"...I think I might ask Missy to out with me again," Luke says.

You smile and say, "Awesome man. I guess you aren't single anymore."

"Well," Luke says. "I wouldn't go that far yet. I mean it's only been one date."

"True, I hope your second date goes well," you say.

Luke replies, "Thanks, talk to you later [Your name]."

"Bye," you answer and hang up. "Well that solves that problem," you think to yourself. After a few minutes of just sitting thinking about what you did for Missy, you decide to go up and see what Missy and your mates are doing. When you get to the top of the stairs, you accidentally bump into Ramona. "Sorry Ramona," you apologize.

Ramona replies, "That's okay [Your name], I was coming to tell you that Luke just called Missy and I think that he wants to go on a second date."

"Cool, I bet she'll be ecstatic when he asks," You say. Then, you hear a scream of joy coming from the guest bedroom. You and Ramona run to the guest room and see Missy jumping for joy on one of the beds. Chloe is just sitting on the other bed with her fingers in her ears because of the screaming.

Upon seeing you, Missy jumps off of the bed and runs and hugs you so hard you can't breathe, saying, "Thank you, thank you, thank you."

You start tapping Missy on the back and manage to get out, "Can't breathe."

Missy lets go upon hearing that. "Oh, sorry [Your name]," she says. "I should go tell Aunt Claire the news." She then runs out of the bedroom and down the stairs.

You look to Chloe and say, "I assume Luke called and asked for a second date." Chloe just nods and takes her fingers out of her ears. You start smiling but realize something. "Did she say yes before she started screaming?"

What was Chloe's answer?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: "I think I might ask Missy to go out with m...

choices: "You and your mates double date with us."
"You have to find a boyfriend for my sister too."
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
Your heart sank into your stomach as soon as Luke said that.

"What do you mean?"

"I mean, Missy seems like a nice girl and all, but there's just something about her that just doesn't connect with me."

You had try and convince Luke to stick with Missy, for her sake. "Come on man, Missy just told me she had the night of her life with you. If I tell her what you said, she'll be devastated."

"Well, I'm sorry, but she just doesn't seem right for me."

"You only went on one date with her. Don't you think it's kind of early to decide that?"

"Hey, you said just one date, then you'll never bother me with this again. Were those not your exact words?"

He had you there. That was what you said. You get another idea. It was kind of low, and you couldn't believe you were doing this just to make Missy happy, but you guess on the inside, you're just a big softie.

"(Sigh) Alright, Luke, I'll make you a deal. Go on two more dates with Missy before you decide if you like her. Do this for me, and I'll owe you, big time. Whenever you need a favor, I'll do it, no matter what it is."

There was a long pause as Luke considered you offer.

"Alright, I'll do it, on one condition."

"What's that?"
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Negotiations

choices: "It'll be easy; I hear she has a crush on Colin..."
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"Wait, what?" You did say anything, but this is (somewhat) highway robbery. Then again, you're asking to do something he doesn't want to do willingly.

"Exactly as I said, man," Luke says. "Lynette is, well, a sort of copy of Missy. There are times when she gets teased about not having a boyfriend and she says it doesn't affect her. But I catch her a few nights a week where she decides to go out and just release all her emotions in a secreted place."

You feel somewhat bad now. Not only for Luke and Missy but for his sister, Lynette. Come to see it, you do remember seeing a look alike of Luke a few weeks ago. She seemed like a nice girl. You even talked with her once, complete opposite of what Luke was like to you before you considered being friends.

There was no other option. To keep Missy happy, and off your and your girlfriends' backs, this was the only choice.

"Fine; I'll do it. I'm not sure how, but I will, for Missy."

What does Luke reply with?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Are you a (licensed) love doctor now?

choices: Another human guy the same age as you!
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"Appreciate it dude. And I'll give Missy another shot." Luke hangs up.
You have no idea how this will turn out. You blindly agreed (not really) to helping Luke find a guy for Lynette when you yourself have no idea where to find another guy for her. Colin was out of the question. Colin was way too timid for someone like her and you highly doubted that Lynette would truly like Colin. You were still sitting down in the guest room when Ramona walked in.
"Hey (your name). What's with the long face?" Ramona asked.
"Oh hi Ramona. I just called Luke and he was saying that he doesn't want to be with Missy all that much."
"But Missy was chatting away like a whirlwind about Luke."
"You're missing the point Ramona. That's how Missy saw it, but in reality, Luke was more like putting on a show for her."
"This is bad. Missy's heart is going to break into pieces when she hears about this." Ramona said frowning.
"Hold on a sec Ramona. I haven't told you the rest of our conversation. Luke says he didn't think Missy was the girl for him, but he did say he would give her another go if I would find a guy for his sister Lynette."
"Lynette?! No way. She told us she didn't mind being mate-less."
"That's not what Luke told me. Apparently Lynette goes out at night to cry about it. I really want to help Missy by getting Luke with her, but I don't know where to look for another guy for Lynette."
"Hmm... as far as I know, no one really suits Lynette. Maybe we need to look closer for someone." Ramona suddenly yawns."I'm really tired. Let's talk more about this tomorrow. Come on (your name) I'll sleep with you tonight."
"We're always sleeping together." you say.
"You know what I mean by that." Ramona smirks.

Over the next few days of the break, Luke goes on a few more dates with Missy and each is seemingly perfect. Luke is still unsure about how he feels about Missy, but he hasn't said that he didn't want to see her anymore. Missy is still oblivious to the fact that Luke isn't really interested in her. School was starting soon and Missy had to go back home. Luke and Missy had already swapped numbers and Missy promised to call him every few days.
"Bye (your name), Ramona, and Chloe! I'll see you guys soon!" Missy yelled as Chloe's mom drove out from the driveway.
"Well that's finally over," you said as Missy disappeared in the distance.
"Yeah, glad she's gone. Missy is such a pain in the ass." Chloe says.
"I thought she was pretty nice, but you're right. She did get pretty annoying." Ramona agreed.
"Hey you two. Don't be mean to her. She really does want to have someone to love her." you say."Besides, I still have to help Luke find a boyfriend for his sister Lynette."
"So have you come up with anything?" Chloe asks.
"Not as of yet." you say sadly."I guess the best way to go about this is to find a guy at school to date Lynette."

At the start of school, the three of you go around asking other students if they had any idea who could be the right guy for Lynette. One and all say the same message."Your guess is as good as mine." You actually go and ask some of the males at school if they would date Lynette, but most are already with another girl or aren't interested. Chloe, Ramona, Colin, Luke, and you sat down at lunch and everyone isn't in an eating mood.
"Hey man, I'm glad to see you trying, but I don't think we're going to find any guy that's great for my sis." Luke says.
"I'm not giving up just yet. I'm hoping for something to come up." you say.
"Well that something is going to have to be a miracle, because at this rate Lynette will be 70 years old and we still won't find a guy for her." Chloe exaggerated.
Just then, an announcement went up on the PA.
"Greetings to all students at Bestian High (I don't think there was a name for the school right?). This is the dean with an important announcement. For those of you who are interested in going out with a new student, that student has just laid down a challenge for all who are interested. Head to the front of the school in order to hear the details."
"New student?" you ask.
"That must be that new guy the girls were talking about. He seems like a nice guy when I talked to him, wonder what made him do this?" Chloe said.
"New guy huh?" you said with a sly look on your face."Why don't we check this guy out? Luke, I think your sister might have a new boyfriend real soon if this works."
The five of you walk to the front where you see...
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Lady Luck Decides to Pay You a Visit?

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
Immediately, the first thing you see is a crowd of girls blocking your view. At the head of the crowd, is the school principle, Mr. Brent, a German Shepard.

"Girls, please settle down! Now then, our new student, Joshua Winters, has issued a challenge to all the eligible females in the school. He is looking for a girlfriend, and whoever he deems acceptable will get the position."

In Mr. Brent's arms was a large stack of flyers. "I'm assuming since you're here, you're all interested. So please take a flyer, they all have his picture and the details of his little contest." Every girl present grabs a flyer and heads off. When you take one too, Mr Brent smirks. "I thought you were already in a mateship with two other already. Jumping the train, are we."

You chuckle at his little joke. "It's not for me, Mr Brent, it's for a friend." You take a flyer and show it to Luke and your mates. "Well, he certainly looks well enough." Says Ramona. "Maybe, but how is he as a person?" Chloe says. According to the flyer, this Joshua guy was from Australia, and was looking for a girlfriend to keep the rest of the females in the school off his back. Sounds like you could relate.

"Look here, it says here vixens are a plus! Lynette might really have a chance with this guy!"

"Maybe, if some other girl doesn't get to him first."

After school, all of you wander around for over half an hour, trying to find this guy's address. When you finally find it, you are dismayed to see a line of females already at the doorstep. And then, you see who's at the front of the line.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: New Man in Town

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
As you walk closer towards Joshua's house, you look at all the females in line to see him, your vision focuses on one in particular. She was at the front of the line. A white mouse furry, with thick white fur that goes down to just past her shoulders... oh fuck.
