"Crap! It's Eileen!" you think. "She must have caught a whiff of Joshua and figured out that he must be a virgin!" You know you don't know this Joshua guy, but NO man deserves to be taken advantage of by that bitch. There's gotta be some way you can warn him about her, but how!?


"Oi! I've heard of ya!" says a male voice, with a strong Australian accent. You look up and see Joshua poking his head out of his bedroom window, looking straight at you. This causes every girl in line to turn their heads towards you. "I've been lookin' forward to meetin' ya, mate. I'll be right down to let ya in."


You walk towards the front door to meet Joshua, passing by Eileen. You both exchange death glare's for a moment, but then the door opens. "Welcome, mate!" says the Aussie. "Come on in!" You do just that, then Joshua addresses the ladies. "Sorry, lassies. You'll have to wait a little while longer." After he closes the door, he takes you up to his room, and you both properly introduce each other.


"I've heard a lot about ya, mate," he says. "I heard you have two girlfriends. I'm right impressed! How'd ya do it?"


"I'd like to tell you, but there's more important things that you need to know about the girls here," you say.


"Oh, don't worry," says Joshua. "I already know how aggressive these lassies can be."


"Not just that," you say. "They have the ability to grow to twice their size, and they can tell when someone is lying, so it's best not to get them mad."


"Crikey," he says. "Thanks for the tip. Are there any girls in particular I should watch out for?"


"Yes. Eileen, the mouse furry at the front of the line outside," you say. "Two words: steer clear. She treats boys like trophies, she's had a ton of guys under her belt, and she's yet to claim a human or a virgin. I only know this much because she's tried several times to get to me. Luckily, I was able to get a girlfriend and lose my V-card before she could succeed. Now that you're here, she's got a second chance."


"Whoa," he says. "Imagine if I let that twisted lass in my house."


"Now, if you want a quality woman, I suggest my friend's sister, Lynette," you say. "I heard you were into vixens, so you're lucky that she is one."


Joshua's face brightens when he hears this. "Say no more! When and where do ya want me to meet her, mate?"


This was too easy. You tell Joshua when and where to meet Lynette, and you tell him to carry mace in case Eileen shows up. He asks if you and your mates could come along with them, and you happily agree. How does the double date go?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Another Chance

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
At first, Lynette was hesitant to go on the date you had arranged, especially with some guy she didn't even know. But after you introduced her to Joshua, who insisted that you call him Josh, she seemed to warm up to the idea. When asked where she would like to go, she choose a seafood place downtown.

Unlike on earth, where a single crab leg costs ten dollars, seafood on Bestia is very cheap, seeing as the ocean is pretty much their primary food source, so money wouldn't be a problem. The place wasn't too fancy, so there was no need to get all dressed up either. As you, your mates, Lynette and Josh sit around a table waiting your orders, you got to talking.

"So Lynette, what do you think of Josh?"

"So far so good. He seems like a nice enough guy, and that accent of his I find kind of cute."

Josh tries to hide it, but you could swear you saw him blush. He stands and heads toward the bathroom. "I think you embarrassed hi." Says Chloe, smirking. Just then, your heart drops into your stomach as you see Eileen, who had been sitting at a booth in the corner, watching you the whole time. She gets up and follows Josh.

"Shit! Eileen's here!"

The instant you say that, Ramona, Chloe and Lynette shot up from the table and go to confront her. "I'll handle this." Says Lynette "We'll come with. She can't handle all of us." Says Ramona.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: You Should Have Known

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"No!" Says Lynette "Josh is my responsibility, this is my fight!" You and your two mates are both stunned to hear that, and just stand there as Lynette goes to confront Eileen. "Well, I guess that's good news then." You say "If Lynette is being protective of Josh, then she must consider him her boyfriend."

"Wow, they didn't even finish their first date yet, and already she's claimed him." Says Ramona "That's gotta be a record." It wasn't long before you heard the sounds a struggle coming from inside the bathroom. After a few moments, Eileen came flying out the door like a frisbee, crashing into a vacant table. She was followed by Lynette, with Josh by her side.

Needless to say, the commotion caused quite a scene. Everyone in the restaurant was watching. "Keep your hands off my boyfriend!" Says Lynette as Chloe and Ramona pin Eileen's arms to the ground. As Eileen struggles to get back up, cursing at the three other females, you ask Josh if he's alright. "I'm okay, mate." He says I was just washing my hands when this mouse lassy comes in and start flirting with me. Then Lynette came and sucker punched her upside the head."

You turn and look down at Eileen. "You just never give up, do you? Can't you see that by trying to steal another girl's boyfriend, you're only hurting yourself. In more ways than one. The sooner you realize that, the sooner you'll stop getting your ass handed to you on a regular basis."

What is Eileen's response?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Going Solo

choices: Spend some time with your mates.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
Eileen looks at you with great disdain- no, "disdain" is a major understatement. There's only one word that described her expression: hatred. Pure hatred. Then again, who could blame her. She spent months trying to take your virginity, ultimately failing, and now that there was another human virgin around, she felt like she had a second chance, but that's not gonna happen either. Now here she is, pinned under the combined force of Chloe, Ramona, and Lynette, with you talking down to her. There's no way she's gonna let you talk down to her like that.


"Go to hell, [your name]," she says, pouring every bit of hate that she had into that brief statement. Ramona growls fiercely, taking offense to what the mouse just said.


"I should send you to hell for saying that, you stuck-up little-"


"It's okay, Ramona," you say, putting a hand on her shoulder. "She can say all she wants, for all I care. Sticks and stones."


Your mate looks down at Eileen. "Count your blessings," she says.


"Thanks for helping me out, you guys," says Lynette, "but I can take it from here." Chloe and Ramona release Eileen, who stays on the ground, knowing that she's been beaten. Lynette then jabs her fingers into the rodent's ankle, effectively immobilizing her. With Eileen unconscious, the vixen turns to Josh, with a warm smile on her face. "Sorry about that interruption," she says.


"No harm done, lassie," he says. "We can have a go at this date another time."


"Who says it has to end now, sweetheart," she says with a seductive look in her eyes. "The night's not over yet, and I want to take you back to my place. We can make a quick stop to eat somewhere else, then I'll take you to my house."


"O-okay then," says Josh, who was visibly nervous. The couple leaves the restaurant, leaving you and your mates standing in awe. "Well, she certainly didn't waste any time," says Chloe.


"Well, I'm not complaining," you say. "This means that Luke will have to go on a second date with Missy, now."


What do you do?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Watch Your Mouth

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
Later on, you call Luke to tell him the news. "Good news, Luke. I just hooked up your sister with the new guy at school." "I know. They're here right now, up in Lynette's room." You had a pretty good idea as to what they were doing. "Well then, looks like everyone is happy then. Missy and Lynette have boyfriends, and I'm done playing matchmaker."

"But what about me? I told you, I'm not really sure I want Missy as a girlfriend."

"Come on, man. Give Missy a chance. She had a great time on your first date, and besides, we had a deal."

Luke sighs.

"Alright. I'll go on two more dates with her, but if I'm not convinced after that, We're breaking up."

You knew if that happened, Missy would be devastated. Shed probably lock herself in her room and never stop crying. But, you knew you couldn't convince Luke otherwise, so you agreed and prayed their next date goes well. Maybe you and your mates should shadow them, just to be sure?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: (Farnsworth voice) Good News Everyone!

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content: How do the Date go?
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Nah, they'll be fine.

choices: She gets giddy and jumps at the chance, kissing Colin on the spot!
She accepts, but she tries to play it cool.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"Colin?" you ask in disbelief? "You sure?"

"Yeah. Two of Lynette's close friends sit behind me in my Economics class, and I enhance my hearing whenever they mention something interesting. They mentioned Lynette's thing for Colin the day before we were let out for winter break."

You silently thank God that you and Luke were no longer enemies, or he probably would've used that against you somehow.

"Interesting..." you say, pondering how you'd get those two together. "Alright, then. I think I can figure something out. Once I get Lynette a date with Colin, you'll give Missy another chance, right?"

"Yup. It's a deal."

"Good. Talk to you later," you say before hanging up and dialing Colin's number. You were sure that he wouldn't hesitate to go out with someone as pretty as Lynette. Not only would he have an attractive girl by his side, Lynette was also very nice, and she'd help protect Colin from other girls, specifically Eileen.

"Hello?" the mouse answers.

"Colin! Do I have some news for you!" you exclaim.

"You seem... oddly enthusiastic. did you take up a telemarketing job, or something?"

"What? No, there's something I need to tell you, man. You've got an admirer!"

Colin sighs. "That's not news, dude. Every guy in school has at least fifteen admirers."

"Oh yeah?" you chuckle. "What if I told you that one of those admirers was Lynette?"

Colin pauses for a minute and takes that last part in. "Lynette? Lynette Morgan? As in 'Luke's older sister, most popular in the senior class, hips don't lie' Lynette Morgan? That Lynette Morgan?"

You nod in confirmation. "Yeah. That Lynette Morgan. If you're in, we'll go down to Luke's house and have you ask her out. I'll be with you for moral support. Sound good?"

"That sounds friggin' awesome!"

***

The next day, you and Colin make it to Luke's front door. Colin made sure to look casual, but at the same time look his best. His breath was extra fresh, and he had a pack of mints in his pocket just in case. "You ready?" you ask him.

He takes a deep breath and looks at the door. "As ready as I'll ever be," he says before ringing the doorbell. A few moments later, the door opens, and Lynette looks down at you two with a smile.

"Oh! Hey, guys! Luke didn't tell me you were coming. Come on in. I'll go upstairs and get him for you."

"Actually, Lynette," you politely interrupt before she can take off, "We actually came here to see you."

The vixen's ears perk up in intrigue. "Really?"

"M-hm. Colin here's got something he wants to say."

A light blush appears on Lynette's face. "H-he does?" she asks.

"Yeah, I do." Colin answers with a nervous nod as he steps forward. "Lynette, this is a little sudden, and I apologize if I'm being too forward, but... I was wondering if I could take you out on a date sometime. Wherever you want to go, I'll try to make it happen."

Lynette is practically speechless at this point. There's a few seconds of silence before she gives her answer:
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: The Set Up

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
"Well have you tried going to earth and searching there?" you ask her, she shakes her head, "I've been too nervous to travel alone" she tells you. "Well if it helps I'll go with you" you tell her, she lifts her head and looks at you, "you would?" she asks, you nod, suddenly she hugs you tightly, "oh thank you, thank you" she says with her face buried in your shoulder. "Come on lets go talk to the others" you tell her, she lets go of you and follows you down stairs where everyone else was waiting in the living room.

"So?" asks Ramona for one of the chairs, you and Missy sit on the couch with Chloe sitting next to Missy. You explain that Missy was only jealous of the three of you, and that she was afraid of being alone forever, "is this true?" Chloe asks Missy, she nods. "We also talked about the idea of going to Earth to help look for someone for her" you add, "well I think its a great idea, but how are we going to afford tickets to Earth?" asks Chloe. "I can talk to my mother, she works in the spaceport I'm sure she can help us" says Ramona, she gets up and walks over to the phone and calls her mother, she talks on the phone for a few minutes before hanging up. "Well?" you ask, "I got us four tickets to Earth for three weeks" she says, "whoa three weeks?" you ask surprised, "relax, three Earth weeks is equal to four days on Bestia so we'll be back before school starts again" says Ramona.

"Ok, well we better start packing" you say, the four of you return to your rooms to begin packing for the trip to Earth. While you start packing Chloe walks in, "where do we want to start looking for someone for Missy?" she asks, "well I was thinking starting in my home town, I have some older friends that might work for Missy" you tell her. She wraps you up in a tight hug, "thanks for doing this " she says, "alright you two, our flight leaves in three hours, you can cuddle later" you hear Ramona say from behind you, "your right, come on better finish packing first" you say.

An hour later all four of you were finished packing and assembled in the living room, "ok, lets go" you say, the four of you get in Chloe's mothers car and she drives you to the space port, you check in your bags, pass through security and make it to the gate with ten minutes to spare. You board your flight and prepare yourself for the long flight back to Earth.
*skip ahead*

By the time you arrive on Earth it was late morning, around 11:00, "Do you guys want to get something to eat before we find a hotel?" you ask, "sure what do you have in mind?" asks Chloe. "I know this restaurant me and my brother used to go for lunch sometimes" you tell her, "I didn't know you had a brother" says Ramona. "Yeah I have an older brother, I think the last time I saw him was two years ago" you tell her looking over your shoulder as you walk.

You turn back around and suddenly you walked into someone's back spilling their drink on the ground, "crap, I'm sorry I wasn't paying attention" you say to the man, "its ok I was getting a fresh cup of coffee anyway" says the man as he turns to look at you.
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: "Why don't you go to Earth to find some...

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
As the man turns around you instantly recognize his face, "Mark?" you say, "hey little brother" he says with a smile. You introduce him to Chloe, Ramona, and Missy, "so what brings you here?" he asks, you point to Missy, "helping her find a date" you tell him, "I think I can help, I got a buddy of mine who's also looking for someone" he says. "We can try" you tell him, "ok I'll call him and maybe we can do lunch together all six of us" he says, he pulls out his phone and dials a number.

"Hey man you still looking for a date?...... Well are you free for lunch?, ok... well I'll be there in a few minutes" he says into his phone. He put away his phone, "well?" you ask, "I got good news and bad news, which first?" he says, you sigh, "good news I guess". "Well he's willing to give it a try, but the bad news is he is currently knee deep and upside down in a tank doing maintenance when I called" he says. "Well thats not as bad as I though it was" you tell him, "Come on I'll take you to him" he says, the four of you follow him to his jeep parked on the curb, you throw your bags in the back and get in, Missy gets in the front seat next to Mark.

The two of them talk about Mark's friend while he drives, "yeah he sounds perfect for you" says Mark. "So Mark, how long have you been in the military?" asks Ramona, "Um... going on eight years now" he says, "what is it you do exactly?" Chloe asks. "I work with tanks, more specifically I'm a tank commander, my friend Paul, the guy we're going to meet, is my gunner. We also help do maintenance on our tanks too, so if we break it, we fix it" he says.

After driving for a few minutes you arrive at the nearby military base and pass through the checkpoint at the entrance, he pulls up to a small hanger like building and parks. He gets out and the four of you follow him inside, inside the hanger was a Abrams battle tank with the turret pointing to the rear. Besides Mark, there was no one in sight, "Paul you still here?" Marks yells, "in here" you hear a voice come from the turret. "Well get out here" says Mark, you hear some clanking and faint swearing emanating from the turret followed by a head popping out of one of the hatches.

A man in soiled coveralls with machine grease smeared on his hands and face climbs out, he sees the four of you and pauses, "I didn't realize you brought company" he says, Mark walks over and introduces Paul to everyone, you notice Paul seemed a little more interested in Missy than everyone else "I'd shake your hands, but I'm a little covered in grease right now" he says. He looks over at Mark, "so where we going for lunch?", "same place as usual" says Mark. "Ok I'm going to go get cleaned up, I can meet you there" he says, he leaves toward the parking lot, "do you guys have a hotel yet?" asks Mark, "no we just got here when I bumped into you" you tell him. "Well I have a guest room that you can use if you want and I can help get you a decent hotel room too" he says.

"Thank you for helping us" says Chloe, "its the least I could do, come on lets go drop your bags off at my house for now" says Mark. The four of you get back in the jeep and leave the base, after ten minutes you arrive at Mark's house, as you get out of the jeep a female fox furry opens the front door and peeks out from the door way. Mark waves her over and she walks over to him, "guys this is Sheila, my wife. Sheila this is Chloe, Ramona, Missy, and *your name here* my brother" says Mark.

After introductions are made and the jeep unloaded everyone heads inside to stow bags and wait for Paul to call saying he was ready. Half an hour later Mark's phone vibrates, "Paul just texted my he's on his way to the restaurant so we should leave now"he says. The four of you get back in the jeep and head to the restaurant, just as Mark parks, Paul was walking into the restaurant.

You enter the restaurant and find a table for the six of you with Missy sitting next to Paul. The whole time you were enjoying your lunch, Missy and Paul were having their own conversation. As you get up to leave you overhear some of their conversation, "so 8:00?" asks Paul, "8 is fine" says Missy.

*skip to that evening*

For today all four of you are staying at Mark's house and you'll get a hotel tomorrow, you are in the living room with every one else , "so Sheila how did you and Mark meet?" asks Ramona, "I volunteer as a nurse down at the infirmary and one day he came in with some type of injury and we started talking and one thing led to another" says Sheila. Suddenly there's a knock on the door, Missy gets up from the couch and walks over to the door and opens it to Paul standing there, "you ready to go?" he asks, "yeah let me go grab my coat" she says, "So where are you guys going?" asks Chloe. "We're going to see a movie " says Paul, "ok lets go" says Missy with her coat on, they leave and you hear them drive away.

"I hope the date goes well" says Chloe
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Its your brother

choices: Luke decided to prank call the girls
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
The girls all look at each other with grins on their faces.



"PILLOW FIGHT!"



Before you could blink, the girls were whacking each other with pillows. "This is the best idea you've ever had." Says Luke to Collin as he enjoyed the show. "I hope you don't spy on your sister like this." You say. "Hell no man!" Says Collin, disgusted. "Why would you even say that? I'm not that perverted." You notice that the girls seemed to be trying to avoid Cleo's swings most of all, and for good reason.



Of all the species of furries on Bestia, dragons are by far the rarest. There is estimated to be less than fifty of them on the entire planet. Dragons are known for their great strength, even at normal hieght, so a blow from Cleo, even if she was just swinging a pillow, was likely to send someone flying. Which is exactly what happens when one of Cleo's swings hits Maria in the chest, sending her across the room into the sofa, knocking it and Maria over backwards.




At first the girls stopped fighting as they stared in awe at what just happened. But Maria gets back on her feet, a little disoriented, but no injuries. After the shock had passed, they all burst out laughing. "Wow Cleo, you should join the baseball team with a swing like that!" Says Ramona. "That was one of my gentle ones too." Says Cleo.



After that little incident, the pillow fight was over. The girls decided to to what high school girl do best, gossip. "So Ramona, did you really do that earth boy?" Asks Lola. "Yep." Says Ramona with a smile. "Did you see Eileen's face when I told her?" "Totaly!" Says Maria. "She was so red, I was expecting her to suddenly burst into flames!"



"Nice touch by the way with that comment on how you're hotter than she is." Says Cleo. "Serves her right. I always thought she was a bitch, anyway." The girls all nod in agreement. "Besides," Says Ramona, "What would (your name) want with a scrawny rat like Eileen, when he can have all this?" She gestures to her body, sensually rubbing her hands over herself. The other girls woot and say things like "You go girl!" while Luke and Collin were laughing like hyenas. "I guess you like the big girls, huh?" Collin says jokingly, nudging you with his elbow. "Oh shut up." You say.



As the girls continue talking, the show starts to get kind of boring, until.......
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Pillow Fight!

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
The footage that the three of you were getting is getting really, really, boring, until Angela says something. "So, Chloe. I've been watching [your name] in my art class and he's really good. Does he have a sketchbook around?"


"I think so..." she answers. "It might be on the bookshelf." This worries you; not because the camera is on the bookshelf, but you have some.... "suggestive" drawings in your sketchbook. It was at this point that you decide to enforce a "don't touch my stuff" rule from now on. You're train of thought gets derailed as you hear Chloe shriek.


"What the hell!" she yells.


"Oh, shit!" the three of you say.


"What's wrong, Chloe?" Ramona asks.


"There's a camera on the bookshelf!" she yells.


"WHAT!?" all the other girls say in unison. Colin quickly takes a bottle out of his pocket. He twists the cap off and pours three pills into his hand, handing one to you, and one to Luke. "Take these, quick." Assuming that he knows what he's doing, you and Luke take the pills as Colin takes his.


Meanwhile, the girls were clamoring over who planted the camera. Chloe silences the girls and whips out her phone and dials a number, then puts it on speaker. Your phone vibrates in your pocket, and your blood freezes. "Don't worry, just lie." says Colin. You look at him as if he were crazy, and so does Luke. "Trust me." says Colin.


You slowly answer the phone. "Hey, sweetie." you say.


"Don't 'Hey, sweetie' me!" yells Chloe. "We found your camera!"


"What camera?" you ask, although you surprised yourself because you sounded like you were actually telling the truth.


"The camera on the bookshelf!" Ramona yells into the phone. "You, Luke, and Colin are probably somewhere watching us right now!"


"We're just leaving the movies." you say.


"Oh really?" Ramona says suspiciously. "What movie did you see?"


"Amazing Spider-Man." you say.


"That's weird..." says Maria. "He's not lying." this shocked every girl in the room. Out of all the furry species on Bestia, raccoons were the best at sensing dishonesty.


"Oh, okay then..." Chloe says, completely confused. "Sorry for accusing you." She hangs up the phone and the girls start talking about who could've planted the camera. "Maybe it was one of those perverted freshman boys." suggests Lola. "That makes sense..." says Cleo.

"How did they not know I was lying?" you ask, astonished.


"Female furries can sense dishonesty because their auditory nerves are like lie detectors." Colin explains. "These pills cause our voices to sound like we're telling the truth."


"Okay, but why did all three of us have to take a pill?" Luke asks. "Because I wasn't sure who Chloe was going to call." explains Colin.


Later that night, the girls stop talking about the subject and were about to go to sleep. Before Chloe and Ramona get to bed, you call Chloe's phone. "Hello?" she says.


"Chloe, I came across some creep in an alley a block away from the house watching something on his laptop." you say. "When I saw that he was watching all of you on his laptop, I snatched it from him and deleted the file. He ran away before I could get a good look at his face."


"Oh, well at least the tape is gone." she says.


"I'm gonna crash at Luke's tonight. I'll see ya tomorrow." you say.


"Okay, I love you." she says.


"Love you too, bye." you say, before hanging up the phone.


"Awesome." says Luke. Colin pours three more pills and splits them among the three of you. "Just in case they ask us anything tomorrow."
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: Found Out!

1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.content:
The next morning you left Luke's house and headed back home. As you approaches Chloe's house you see the other girls walking out the door. You duck behind a bush just in case they were still suspicous from last night. You quickly swallow the pill Collin gave you before heading inside. Chloe is waiting for you in the living room. "Hey (your name). Can we talk?"



"If this is about last night, I already told you...."



"No, it's not about that. I wanted to talk to you about this."



Chloe holds up a small leatherbound book. Your sketchbook! Oh shit, you think, now I'm fucked. "I found this after discovering that camera last night." Says Chloe "I couldn't help but take a look through it, and I saw some rather...interesting sketches." You start to sweat as she flips through the book, wishing this would just end. She stops at a page. "Particularly this one." She shows you a sketch you made of Chloe lounging naked on a beach.



"I...I can explain..."



"Relax, I'm not mad. In fact, I'm actually flattered."



"Really?"



"Oh yeah, but you know what? I think that you could do better if you had visual aid instead of drawing from you imagination."



Was she serious? Was Chloe really asking you too..."You want me to draw you as a model?" You ask. Chloe nods. "I also saw some of the ones you did of Ramona, and I thought, why not draw the both of us together?" You decide, what the hell, this could be fun. "What kind of drawing do you mean?"
1332321221122221212222122221221222212112.title: The next morning.

choices: Go with Chloe and explain to Ramona afterward.
134.content:
You see that your next class is gym. It was always your weakest subject, and according to the class list, Luke was in your class. Perfect, your least favorite class with your least favorite furry. The boys' locker room was smaller in comparison to the girls' (for obvious reasons), and you and Luke were the only boys in the class, according to the list. As the two of you were changing, (on opposite sides of the room to avoid confrontation) you see someone come into the room. You couldn't see who the furry was, but you automatically assume it was a girl trying to sneak in, but then you recognize the voice.

"Hey, [your name]." the furry said.

"Colin? Is that you?" you ask.

"Who were you expecting?" He asked.

"Well, no one in particular. Besides, I didn't even know you were in this class." you say. "Your name wasn't on the list."

"Typo." Colin briefly explained.

"Well, look who's here." a certain fox furry says.

"And that's our cue to leave." you say, rolling your eyes as you and Colin leave the locker room.

"I didn't tell you two asswipes to go anywhere!" Luke calls out to the two of you.

"You're not my boss." you answer back.

As you exit the locker room, you see all the girls sitting on the bleachers. Some were staring at you, others were staring at Colin. The two of you take your seats where nobody else was sitting, then you see the teacher walk out of her office. She was a badger furry. She was wearing a school t-shirt, shorts, and a red cap. She then took a look at you and walked over to where you were sitting. "Well," she says. "You must be the Earth student the other teachers were talking about. My name is Miss Oliver, and I'm the gym teacher."

Unsure of what to say, you just tell her "Umm... Nice to meet you."

"Well at least I know you have manners." Miss Oliver says with a chuckle. "Okay kids, today we're playing dodgeball!" All the girls cheered.

"Wait, they play dodgeball on this planet?" you say.

"Yeah." Colin says. "It's the most popular sport since females have more physical strength than males. This sport makes it easy for them to show off that strength." Your head sinks. Wonderful, it's your first day, and already you're at risk of getting injured. What next?

"Luckily, males have more flexibility and agility than females, so we can dodge and catch anything that comes our way." Colin says. "So we're not at a total disadvantage."

That made you feel a little better. Ms. Oliver separates the class into two teams. Unfortunately, Colin was put on the other team with Luke. When the game starts, balls start to fly faster than you've ever seen. You managed to dodge every single one that came your way, and you even hit a few of your opponents. After a while it was down to Colin and Luke on one side, and you and a leopard furry on the other. Luke has been trying to knock you out for the entire game, and now he had a clear shot. He sees Colin with a ball in his hand, the only ball on their side of the field, so he snatches the ball and pushes Colin to the ground, allowing him to get hit with a ball. Luke then throws the ball at you. You duck and the ball hits the leopard furry on your side.

"Sorry." you say.

"It's fine." she says.

There was one ball on each side of the field. Sudden death. You pick up the ball on your side, while Luke picks up the one on his. Then you realized: Luke gets agitated easily, so you can use that to your advantage. An evil smile forms on your face.

"It looks like you're not as good as you think," you say. "Does that mean all that talk was for nothing?"

Luke is real mad now. He puts all his strength into one last throw, but he was so agitated, he forgot to aim and misses you badly. You then throw the ball in your hand at him and it hits him in the chest, knocking him to the ground. The entire class cheered, Colin cheering the loudest.

After class ends, Miss Oliver dismisses the class to the locker rooms. You were the last one to get to them, so there was steam obscuring your vision. You open a door and walk in. Then you see all of the girls taking showers and changing. They all squeal in delight.

"Oh, my god! It's [your name]!" one of them says.

"Aw shit!" you think to yourself. One of the girls hugs you and starts kissing your neck, moaning. You get her off of you and exit the locker room. Then you go to the correct one. After you change into your regular clothes, you look in the mirror to make sure that you don't have a hickey.

LATER..................

The school day ends and you were about to leave with Ramona and Colin (you found out that Colin actually live across the street from you) when Chloe approaches you. Your friends tell you that they'll wait for you outside.

"So... you're [your name]?" she asks.

"Yeah," you say. "How did you know?"

"I heard about what happened in gym." she says. "So, I thought you were pretty cool and was wondering if you wanted to hang out with me on Saturday." You thought about it for a second. You were supposed to hang out with Ramona on Saturday, but Chloe was your dream girl (despite you only knew her for a day) and you didn't want to miss out on a chance to go out with her. But Ramona is the closest friend you have on Bestia, perhaps the closest friend you've ever had. What do you do?
134.title: Showdown

choices: Break the kiss. You like Chloe, remember?!
1341.content:
Ramona was your friend, and the first one that you made on this planet. You didn't want to hurt her feelings by standing her up. As much as it hurt you, you did what you had to do.

"Sorry Chloe," you say. "I promised my friend Ramona that I'd hang out with her on Saturday."

You didn't notice that hearing Ramona's name perked Chloe's attention for a half a second, so you continue talking.

"I hope you're not upset or anything." you say.

"No, it's fine." she says. "I think it's nice that you're loyal to your friend. We can meet up some other time."

It was nice that Chloe wasn't mad at you. Now you didn't have to worry about a thing. The days pass, and you and Chloe become good friends, while you also hang out with Ramona and Colin. However, it was weird that whenever you were with Chloe, Ramona wasn't around, and vise-versa. Saturday night had arrived, and you walked over to Ramona's house. You see her waiting for you by her front porch.

"How long were you waiting?" you ask her.

"Only two minutes." she replies before the two of you head out.

"So why did you pick Saturday of all days to hang out with me?" you ask.

"It's 'cause my mom planned on bringing her boyfriend over and I was not gonna be around that." she says with a shudder.

"What do you mean by that?" you ask.

"Ever since my parents got divorced, Mom's been trying to 'fill the void' if you get what I mean." Unfortunately, you did get it. "I feel more sorry for her than I am disgusted by her." she adds.

"Where's your dad?" you ask.

"He moved to another town. I basically switch between Mom and Dad's houses every two weeks." Ramona explains.

"Oh." was all you could say. "By the way, where are we going?" you ask.

"To the park, I want to show you something." she answers.

"Alright." you say.

The two of you arrive at the park and Ramona leads you to a small path through the woods. At the end of the path was a big lake lit up by the stars. You both sit at the edge of the lake.

"Is this what you wanted to show me?" you ask.

"Yeah." she answers. "My dad always told me that one day, I would find someone that I felt would be really close to me, and if I found that person, I should bring them here."

"Wow." you say. "Well, it is true that we're best friends." That was the first time you actually admitted it. Ramona was your best friend. She was there for you since the day she met you.

"[Your name]," Ramona says, "Did you ever wonder why I was always so nice to you?" she asks.

"Because we're friends." you answer.

"Well, that's true," she says. "But I....." she trailed off, not knowing what to say. You look at Ramona, and she looks at you. Then she quickly wraps her arms around you and plants a soft, deep kiss on your lips. You were shocked! You didn't know that Ramona felt this way about you. What do you do?
1341.title: Friends Come First

13411.content:
As you recover from the shock of Ramona suddenly kissing you, you gently but firmly push her away. "Ramona...I'm sorry...but I can't accept this." As you expected, Ramona instantly looks crushed. "Why?" She asks, her eyes beginning to tear up and her lip trembling. "Please don't give me that look." You say, trying not to look her in the eyes. "It's not that I don't like you, I really do. It's just...I have my eyes on someone else."



Ramona begins whining like a puppy as her tears flow down her face. You feel absolutely terrible for doing this to her, but Chloe was the one your heart desired. She buries her face in her hands and starts shaking all over. You know you must have hit her hard, because Ramona was a tough girl, and not one to cry easily.



You stroke her back as she begins to quietly sob. “You won’t hold this against me, will you?” Ramona shakes her head. “No….I’m still your friend.” She says, her voice cracking. “Would you like me to walk you home?” You offer.



She shakes her head again. “I think I need to be alone right now.” She stands up and walks away, her head down the whole time. You mentally punch yourself for hurting Ramona’s feelings like that, but you swear to yourself you’ll make it up to her somehow.



You decide you might as well head home yourself. You take a shortcut through an alley, and come upon a sight that instantly makes your blood boil. Luke had Chloe pinned against the alley wall, trying to rip off her clothes while she tried to push him off.



“Get away from me you jerk!”



“Why:? I’ve got you right where I want you. I’ve waited long enough for you to spread your legs on your own. We’re gonna do it right here, right now, weather you want to or not.”



Chloe slashes Luke across the face with her claws, but he doesn’t release her. Instead, he punches her square in the stomach. That really did it! You grab a baseball bat sticking out of a nearby trash can, and quietly approach Luke from behind.



With a mighty swing, you bring your bat crashing into to the side of Luke’s head. WHAM! Luke was knocked out before he hit the ground, falling sideways in a heap, a large red lump on his temple. “Home run.” You say with a grin. For a moment Chloe stood there in shock. Then she grabs you in a bear hug, planting multiple kisses all over your face, saying “Thank you!” over again.



She finally releases you, giggling. I guess I get carried away a little?” Now it was your turn to stand there in shock. Chloe waves her hand in front of your face. “Oh great.” she says “I think I broke him.” After you regain control of yourself, you ask “Are you hurt?”



“I’m undamaged for the most part.”



“Why didn’t you use your growing ability?”



“This asshole in injected me with something.” She picks up a discarded syringe Luke had dropped. “Stunt.” “What’s that?” you ask. “It’s a drug the suppresses a female’s growth ability temporarily. I should be alright by morning.”



Not only did Luke try to rape Chloe, but he drugged her too! With much difficulty, you resist the urge to beat Luke to death with the bat right there. “How can I ever repay you?” Chloe asks. “That’s not necessary.” You say “The barrage of kisses was reward enough.”



Chloe giggles. “Heroic, and a gentleman. You are definitely perfect.”



“Perfect for what?”



“To be my mate of course.”



You couldn’t believe your ears. You had just met her a few days ago, and Chloe wants to be your girlfriend! Chloe looks down at the unconscious Luke and nudges him with her foot. “Wow, you knocked him out good.” You smile, taking her remark as a compliment. “I played batter on my home team on Earth. If we’re lucky, maybe I gave him a concussion. Want me to hit him again, just to be sure?” You both laugh as you exit the alley.



You walk Chloe home, turns out she lived right across from you. “Well, I guess I’ll see you tomorrow.” She plants one final kiss on your cheek as you hear a voice cry out “(your name)! Wait!” You turn to see Ramona running across the street to you.



“(your name)! I just wanted to say-” She stops as she sees Chloe. She looks from Chloe to you several times before saying “Chloe is the one you have your eyes on, isn’t she?” You nod. “I’m sorry Ramona.”


Ramona turns to Chloe and says…..
13411.title: Break the kiss. You like Chloe, remember?!

134111.content:
"You're very lucky to have him, Chloe." Ramona says.

"Yeah, I figured that out not too long ago. I'm more than lucky." she says, looking at you from the corner of her eye. "Well, I should get home, I'm tired."

"Me too." says Ramona.

"See you guys around." you say to them. This was the most eventful Saturday of your life, and to make up for it, Sunday was a total bore. On Monday morning, you walk outside your souse and see Ramona waiting where she usually does.

"Hey, Ramona." you say.

"Hi." she says back. As you were about to head off to school, you see Colin come out of his house to join you two. "Hey, you guys!" he says.

"Fancy seeing you walking to school today." Ramona says.

"Why is that?" you ask.

"My sister, Eileen usually drives me to school, since she has her own car." Colin answers.

Ramona grunts in frustration. "I need my own car." You and Colin laugh when you hear a familiar voice.

"What's up, guys!"

You all turn and see Chloe walking towards you. Your heart jumped in surprise and joy, while Ramona's demeanor took a nose dive. When the four of you got to school, Chloe stops you before you go in. "Maybe you should hold my hand, so the other girls will back off."

"He's not a two-year-old." Ramona quietly mutters to herself. When you and Chloe walk in, a group of girls was about to rush you, but the sight of you and Chloe holding hands stopped them in their tracks. Chloe turns to you and smiles. "Come on," she says. "I have an idea." She pulls you to the main hallway, where most of the students were. The two of you stand in the middle of the hall and Chloe looks deep into your eyes. You never thought that Chloe would kiss you, right then and there. You eventually close your eyes and kiss her back. When Chloe breaks the kiss, she says that she'll see you later, and walks off to her locker.

When you go to your locker, you faintly hear the sound of crying. You turn around and see Colin comforting Ramona. "It's okay, Ramona." he says. "These things happen. I promise that you'll feel better soon." Aw shit. you think yo yourself. Ramona must've seen Chloe kissing me. When Ramona gets up and leaves, you go over to Colin.

"Is she okay?" you ask.

"I'm afraid not." he says gloomily. "I just wish there was a way that I could make her feel better." You stop and think for a second. Why would Colin word that last sentence like that. Is it possible that...

"Colin," you say.

"Yeah?"

"You like Ramona, don't you." you say, with a smile on your face.

Colin looks at you in shock and...
134111.title: Settling for Second Best

1341111.content:
“Alright, you got me.” Says Collin sheepishly. “I do like her, and have for quite some time. I just couldn’t get her to notice me. When I saw you were friends with her, I thought I had lost my chance.” “You almost did lose your chance.” You tell him about what happened at the lake on Saturday. “So you rejected her?” Collin says hopefully. “Please don’t say it like that.” You say. “I really like Ramona as a friend, it’s Chloe that I have romantic feelings for.”




“So I still have a chance!” Collin pumps his fist in the air in celebration. “You suddenly have an idea, and Idea that can fulfill both yours and Collin’s wishes to make up to Ramona. “I think I know how to make this whole thing better.” You say. “I’ll ask Chloe if she wants to go out to lunch this weekend. I’ll invite Ramona, and you come meet us there, but pretend you didn’t know about it.”




Collin quickly catches on to your plan. “You’d do that for me?” He asks. “For both of you.” You reply. “You and Ramona. I promised myself I would make it up to her for hurting her feelings like that. If this works, we’ll all be happy.”




You expected Collin to be happy about your plan, what you didn’t expect was for him to suddenly hug you. “That means a lot man.” He says “I owe you one.” “Can you please let go of me?” You ask “You’re crushing my spine.” Collin lets go of you, realizing the awkwardness of the situation. “Well, I gotta get to class.”




“Me too.”




Later at lunch, you asked Ramona if she wanted to go to lunch on Saturday, but you didn’t tell her about Collin or Chloe. Why?” She asked. “Shouldn’t you be doing that with Chloe?” “I just wanted to make up to you for hurting you so bad.” You say. “I thought I could buy you lunch, whatever you want.“




“Alright, I guess that would be nice.”




You go back to your table and sit next to Chloe telling you about your plan. “So, you tricked Ramona in going on a double date with you and me, and you’re pairing her up with Collin without her knowing?”




“Well, when you say it that way I sound like a prick, but that’s basically it, yeah.”




“Don’t you think she’ll be angry when she finds out?”




“It’s worth a try. If it works, Ramon and Collin will both be happy, and I’ll have made up to Ramona.”




“What if it doesn’t work?”




“Well, Ramona wouldn’t do anything to harm me….would she?”
1341111.title: Schemeing and Coniving

13411111.content:
Saturday comes, and after you get dressed, you make a three-way call with Chloe and Colin.

"You guys remember the plan?"

"Of course." says Colin.

"Are you sure this in gonna work?" asks Chloe.

"Mostly." you reply.

"Good enough for me." Colin says.

You hear Chloe sigh into the phone.

You had agreed to meet Ramona right out side her yard at 12:30. it was now 12:25, so you decide to get going. When you get to the meeting spot, you see Ramona leaving her house. "I'll be back, Mom!" she calls, looking back at the house. "And keep Roxanne out of my room!"

"Hey Ramona." you say.

"Hi," she says back. You could tell that her normal personality was back, hopefully your plan would work out. You and Ramona head of to the local diner, and you look around for a place to sit. While Ramona has her back turned, you quickly text Colin that you got to the diner. The plan was that Colin would show up fifteen minutes after you and Ramona arrived at the diner, then Chloe would show up ten minutes after that.

You and Ramona get seated, but it takes a while for the waitress to arrive.

"What's the deal with customer service? This is ridiculous." Ramona says.

"Trust me, it's no better on Earth." you say. Ramona laughs. "I didn't know that."

Right on cue, Colin shows up. "Hey, guys!" he says. "Hi, Colin." says Ramona. "Wanna join us." This took both you and Colin by surprise. Neither of you were expecting her to actually invite Colin to join you.

"Uh, sure." Colin says, going with the flow. "Mind if I sit next to you?"

"Not at all." she says. This was going better than expected. Ten minutes later, Chloe shows up. This was a major hurdle. You were afraid that Ramona wouldn't want to stick around if Chloe showed up. Fortunately takes a seat next to you and the four of you start talking. The waitress finally shows up and takes your orders, too. Everything was going so perfectly. Colin was even able to put his arm around Ramona without her objecting to it. Just then, somebody shows up that makes things difficult.
13411111.title: Couldn't be Better

134111111.content:
Your heart drops like a brick as you see Luke enter the diner, but you can’t help but smile when you see he has several layers of gauze wrapped around his head. Being that you were all sitting in the center of the diner, he instantly sees you, and comes towards you scowling.




“Here comes Captain Dipshit.” You whisper to Chloe and the others. “Well, what do we have here?” Comes Luke’s voice from behind you. “Everyone I hate at one table.” You turn around to face him, pretending to not have noticed him before. “Oh, hello Luke. What happened to you? Your mom crack you over the head with another whiskey bottle?”




Chloe, Ramona and Colin laugh at your remark, while Luke just growls. “I know it was you that hit me from behind, like the pussy you are. “Well, it’s a good thing you have that thick skull of yours to protect what little of a brain you have.”




After another round of laughter, you look Luke in the eyes and say “Can you prove it was me that gave you that lump?” “Who else would come to the rescue of this little skank?” Luke gestured to Chloe. As Chloe stood up to smack Luke, you step between them and glare at Luke.




“That’s it, Luke, now I really have to hurt you. I don’t give a fuck what you say about me, but insult Chloe or any of my friends, and you just bought yourself a one-way ticket to the emergency room. You, me, outside, now.”




Before you know it, you and Luke are facing each other in the alley behind the diner. “I’m going to enjoy this.” Luke says, cracking his knuckles. “You enjoy getting your ass kicked?” You say “You must really be a masochist.” Luke tries to punch you, but you quickly grab his wrist and jam your thumb into his armpit, twisting his arm behind his back.




You kick Luke behind his knee, dropping him down onto one leg, unable to do anything to fight back. You twist his arm even further as he cries out in pain. “I should have warned you,” you say “I took some self defense classes back on earth. Now, if you ever do anything to harass me or my friends again, I will personally rip your balls off and feed them to you, understand?”




Apparently, Luke didn’t understand, because his only response was “Fuck you, stupid ape.” Before you could retaliate, luke was knocked out for the second time in a week, this time by Chloe, who had come up behind you and whacked luke over the head with a trashcan lid.



“Couldn’t let you have all the fun, could I?” She says with a smile. You both dump Luke into a nearby dumpster and head back to your table. “So how did it go?” asked Collin. “Let’s just say that when Luke wakes up, he’s gonna need to bathe for week.”




The rest of your lunch went on as if the incident with Luke hadn’t happened. As you ate your food, you saw Collin looking over at Ramona as she ate her pasta. So far she didn’t mind the advances he had made on her, or did she just not notice? You wonder when Collin was finally going to make his move.
134111111.title: A Slight Setback

1341111111.content:
It was going good so far, so why shouldn't Colin try to ask Ramona out? Colin looks across the table at you and Chloe, as if he was telepathically asking you if the time was right. You and Chloe look at each other, the you look back at Colin and nod your heads.

He takes a deep breath and turns to the beautiful golden retriever sitting next to him. "Ramona?" he says, trying to get her attention.

"Yeah, Colin?" she says, having no idea what's coming.

"I was wondering if we could go to the movies next Saturday, just you and me."

"Why can't Chloe and [your name] come with us?" she asks, not realizing that she was being asked on a date.

You quickly think of an alibi. "Chloe and I are doing something next Saturday, so we can't go."

Chloe nods her head in agreement. Ramona shrugs her shoulders. "I guess it can't be helped, then." she says, turning to Colin. "How does seven o clock sound?"

"Sounds great." Colin replies.

After the four of you finish eating, you and Chloe sneak away from Colin and Ramona.

"So, what are we gonna do when Colin and Ramona are out?"

"Weeeeell..." Chloe says. You can hang out at my house."

"Sounds good!" you say.
1341111111.title: Make Your Move

13411111111.content:
Saturday seemed to take forever to come, for you and Collin. You were both excited, Collin because he was finally going on a date with Ramona (more or less), and you because you would get to spend time with Chloe. Amazingly, for the entire week leading up to Saturday, you didn’t see Luke at all. Maybe that last whack on the head from Chloe finally knocked some sense into him.




Saturday night finally arrives. You tell your parent you’ll be back around eleven. As you step outside, you reach into your pocket to make sure your can of pepper spray is still there. If you’ve learned one thing from living on Bestia, it’s always be prepared. You didn’t want to be attacked by Luke, or worse, some stalker girl from school, especially while walking alone at night.




As you approach Chloe’s front door, you decide to try the old charming routine. Granted, you’ve never had anyone to use it on before, but no time like the present. You ring the doorbell and quickly try to think of something smooth to say.




When Chloe answers the door, you put on your best gentleman act. “Good evening, Chloe. May I say you look absolutely ravishing tonight?” You gently take her hand and kiss it. Chloe giggles before saying, “I’m afraid you are mistaken.” That’s when you see the real Chloe coming down the stairs behind the one in front of you.




For a moment you think you are seeing double, before the second Chloe says “You see mom? I told you he was a sweet guy.” MOM!? You were just hitting on Chloe’s mother! They both burst out laughing as they let you inside, blushing furiously. Chloe explained how she and her mother look exactly alike, and they are often mistaken for twins.




“It’s alright.” Her mother says placing a hand on your shoulder. “You’re not the first one to make that mistake, and you won’t be the last. Besides, it’s so good to see my Chloe has such a nice boy like you. Unlike that thug, Luke.”




You turn to Chloe in surprise. “You had Luke as a boyfriend?” “Only briefly.” She says. “I dumped him a few weeks before I met you, but he didn’t seem to get that fact through his thick skull. That’s probably why he assaulted me in the alley.”



“Which reminds me,” Chloe’s mother says as she suddenly hugs you. “I just have to reward the boy who rescued my daughter from that degenerate.” You told her that wasn’t necessary, but she insisted. “You two go on and hang out or whatever you want to do, and I’ll order pizza for us. It’s the least I can do to thank you, (your name).





You and Chloe spent most of the evening playing her favorite card game, Kritz. It was basically the Bestian version of Uno, except the loser owes the winner of each round a prize of their choosing. In Chloe’s case, she wanted kisses, which you were more than happy to provide.




After that, you just sat around chatting. Eventually, the subject turned to Collin’s date with Ramona. “Do you really think Ramona was that oblivious when Collin asked her out?” You asked. Chloe shrugged. “I don’t know. Maybe she was just acting ignorant so as not to embarrass him.”




Your cell phone rings and, speak of the devil, it’s Collin. You ask him how his date went.
13411111111.title: Date Night

134111111112.content:
All sorts of possibilities come to your head when you hear Collin say those words. "I'm sorry to hear that, man. What happened?" Collin explains in exact detail how his, for lack of a better word, date was such a failure. Firstly, they had to walk to the theater because neither of them owned a car, or had the money for a taxi. That wouldn't have been so bad, if the theater wasn't on the other side of town. Well, you really should have thought of that beforehand, you think to yourself.



Next, Collin didn't have enough money for them to get into the theater, they had raised the prices apparently, and Ramona had to use her credit card. She didn't seem to mind, but it embarrassed Collin. While they were watching, Collin was so nervous he didn't try to make his move until three quarters through the movie. So far everything Collin had told you seemed like rather minor ordeals, until he gets to the worst part.



"Then, when I finally worked up the never to kiss her, before I could even ask her she starts itching and scratching like crazy. It was my cologne! She must have been allergic to something in it and broke out in hives!" That would definitely ruin any date. "Where is she now?" You ask " At home, probably scratching herself bald. I really fucked up on this. What can I do?" You really didn't think you were the one Collin should be asking for advice, seeing as you've never been on a real date.



"Well, is Ramona mad at you?"



" No, she said it wasn't my fault because I didn't know she was allergic."



"Then you still have a chance with her. Maybe next week, why don't you..."
134111111112.title: "It was a disaster!"

1341112.content:
Colin acts like you said nothing. "So, you feel bad about your situation right now? It's really crazy."

"And then I asked you if you liked Ramona," you repeat.

"Uh, hey! Is that a new sweater?" Wow, he's such a terrible liar. Ironic for him being a mouse; you'd expect for him to be a bit mischievous in his nature. Not even his crooked smile and sweating is helping.

"I've had this for years, actually. Dude, just tell me, do you like Ramona?"

"I..." Then he starts to run away. You somehow grab his tail, and feel a bit awkward because of that, especially since now Colin is on all fours and trying to run away, squeaking on the process.
You pull him back to his original spot and he calms down.

"Do you like Ramona!?"

"Okay! YES! I really like Ramona!" Colin exclaims. "But I just don't know how to explain it to her."

"Well, be straightforward about it," said a familiar voice. Who it belonged to was...
1341112.title: What a horrible liar

13411122.content:
You and Collin both turn to see Ramona standing the, hands on her hips and a smirk on her face. You let go of Collin's tail as he gets back on his feet, sweating and stuttering. "R-R- Ramona! H-H-H-How much of that did you hear?"


"Oh, enough to know you have a crush on me, and are too afraid to tell."


Even through his fur, you could see Collin's face was burning redder than a tomato. Ramona smiles and says, "Well, since the cat's out of the bag now, are you gonna ask me out or what?" For a long moment, Collin just stood there like a statue, his face getting progressively redder as sweat flowed down his face. Ramona waves her hand in front of his face with no response.



"Do you think I killed him from embarrassment?"


Finally, seeing no other option, you give Collin a light smack on the back of the head. "Ramonawillyougooutwithme?" He suddenly blurts out. Ramona does best not to burst out laughing as she smiles and nods. "I guess so. You seem like a nice enough guy. I'll see you at seven on Friday." Giving Collin a smile and a wink, Ramona walks off, intentionally swaying her rear from side to side, knowing Collin was watching.


Collin turns to you and says...
13411122.title: And the Awkward Meter Goes Up Another Notch

choices: Head home since it is very late.
13412.content:
Truth be told, because Ramona was so close to you, you developed a bit of a crush on her just a few hours after you met. She was a great friend, the only friend you have, next to Colin, in your life. It was her kindness that made you become unsure of what to do to not ruin your friendship. But now that this happens, you can easily put that aside.

Because of that, you gave no resistance to letting her kiss you, so you kiss back, hugging her as well. Matter of fact, this is your first kiss, even. You can tell it was hers as well as of what you tasted, sweet and kind, a bit unsure and somewhat restrictive, by overall compassionate and savory.

You released after about a minute of making out, making a small smacking sound as she went back, still in each others' arms. Even the moon out couldn't hide the blush that Ramona had for suddenly kissing you right there.

"I'm sorry," she said, "but I... I really like you, (your name). I know you liked Chloe when you just saw her, but I couldn't let you go. You're not like all those other perverts out there; you're something special to me. Please, be my mate instead..."

Her iconic puppy eyes made her seem a lot cuter in the moonlight. You had to say yes. She entrapped you in a death hug, simultaneously squealing with delight.

"Oh, (your name)!" You hug back. She whispers into your ear, "thank you."

Well, it is an interactive, right? What do you do?
13412.title: Let the kiss go on.

14.content:
You were about to go talk to Chloe, but then somebody ruins the whole moment for you, Luke.

"Well, hello there, [your name]." he says.

"What do you want?" you ask, not in the mood for his nonsense.

"Oh, nothing." he says. "I'm just wondering why you're trying to get close to MY girlfriend."

"Give it a rest, Luke, will ya?" Ramona interjects. "You know that she's not your girlfriend. You've been saying that shit for the past six years!"

"This is a 'January' and 'February' conversation, fatso, so 'March' your way out." Luke remarks. That set Ramona on the edge.

"Listen, fox!" she threatened. "Don't pretend that you'r a badass now, 'cause I can easily kick that fantasy right out of that thick head of yours!" Ramona was about to get down to business when somebody suddenly steps in.

"What's going on here?" you hear them say. You see another fox furry, only it was a girl with bouncy, golden hair and green eyes. She was taller than you, Luke, and Ramona, and she looked a little familiar.

"Oh, hey Lynette." Ramona answers.

"Is my little brother causing trouble again?" she asks.

"Wait, Luke is your brother!?" you ask.

"That's right." Lynette answered. She then turned attention to her brother. "So, Luke. You picking on people again?"

Luke suddenly got scared and said "N-n-no." Then he walked away, but not before he shot you a nasty glare and mouthing the words: "This isn't over.".

"Sorry about that," Lynette says. "My brother can be a real dick sometimes."

"It's okay," you say with a chuckle. "I'm just glad you came along."

"You give me too much credit." she replies. "So, you seem really cool. I was gonna help paint the school theater after school today. You wanna come with me?"
14.title: Luke's Weakness

141.content:
Normally you would have said no, but there was something about Lynette, something....hypnotic, that made you decide to say yes. "Great!" Lynette says. "I was worried I would have to do it alone. I'll see you after school."


For the rest of the day, you noticed female furries of various species staring at you longingly. You get the feeling that some of them are following you around, because as you were taking a drink from the fountain, you felt something looming over you, and something cold and wet being pressed against your neck.


You stand up straight and turn around to find a female wolf had been sniffing you. "Uh, can I help you?" Without saying a word, the wolf pinned you against the wall and began to passionately make out with you. You tried to struggle free (She was suffocating you and she didn't seem to be slowing down) but she only pressed herself against you even harder, her tongue invading your mouth and wriggling around like an eel.


Finally, with no other options, you jab your fingers hard where her shoulder met her neck, striking a pressure point. She instantly went limp and passed out on the floor. For a moment you stood there, stunned and panting. "I guess it pays to watch Star Trek." You say before going back to class, looking over your shoulder evey ten steps, on the lookout for anymore stalkers.


At the end of the day, you meet Lynette in the school auditorium, but you didn't see any painting supplies. "Where's the paint?" You ask. Lynette grins. "We won't be painting anything." She says. Your blood freezes as you realize what was really going on. "Then why did you want me to come here?" You ask, dreadsing the answer.


"So I could have you all to myself, sexy." Lynette suddenly started to get taller, utilizing her natural growth ability. Her clothes became tughter against her body untill they finally tore to shreds, exposing her curvy, supple body. Normally you woulkd be running for the exit, but there was this strange scent in the air, a sweet, arousing aroma, that persuaded you to stay.


Lynette now towered over you at twenty feet tall. She smiled as she bent down and picked you up with one hand. "Little known fact about us vixens." She says. "Our bodies produce a natural pheramone that instantly hypnotizes any males who inhale it.It makes them that much easier to break."


You're actually kind of enjoying this. But a voice in the back of your head is screaming "WAKE UP STUPID! FIGHT IT!"
141.title: Say yes.

choices: Ramona's friend, Colin. A mouse furry.
1411.content:
"You've got to fight it, man!"

"But I can't..."

"You're stronger than this! You can resist her!"

"But her pheromones... they're so intoxicating..."

"Lynette's no better than Luke, dude! You know this! WAKE THE FUCK UP!"

"No.. I'm too weak... I'm hers now..."

Your mind was having a heated conversation with your body, and your mind was losing. You had no idea what you were doing. Your body was completely acting against your will.

"I know my little brother's been bothering you, sweetie," Lynette says. "But I'll make you feel much better about it. You don't have to worry about him at all when I'm done with you." She gives a somewhat evil chuckle.

Lynette picks you up so that your face is at an even level with hers. Then she kisses you fiercely, her tongue ferociously fighting with yours. Once she breaks the kiss, she looks at your pants.

"Ah, I see you're loving this." she says. "Oh, goodie! Then you're gonna love what I have in store for you, handsome."

Just then, the auditorium doors burst open. "DROP HIM, BITCH!!!" you hear someone say.

You turn and see that it was Ramona. "Oh, thank God!" you think to yourself.

"Leave it to a dog furry to figure out my motives." Lynette says with contempt. "He's my lover, Ramona, get your own!"

"I'm not here for him out of lust." your friend says. "I'm here 'cause I'm his friend! And I'm loyal to my friends no matter what!"

Ramona then uses her growth ability to grow as tall as Lynette, but her clothes don't rip.

"Ultra-stretch fabrics," she says. "Stylish and functional." Ramona charges at Lynette, punching her in the gut. She doubles over in pain, writhing in agony on the floor. "You'll... regret that... Ramona..." she says weakly.

Outside the school, you and Ramona were walking outside the school gates.

"So how did you find out about Lynette's plan?" you ask Ramona.

"Dog furries can sense suspicious activity." she explains. "I had a slight hunch when she first asked you to help her with the auditorium, to I kept my eye on her."

"I guess you are my best friend." you say with a chuckle. "Thanks for looking out for me."

"No problem, dude." she says. "Hey, who's that over there?"

You look in the direction Ramona was looking in and see...
1411.title: Lynette the Hypnotist

1412.content:
Half of you wants to just let her have her way with you, but your other half says that's just the pheromones talking, and to break free of her spell. With a mighty force of will, you hold you breath to stop breathing in her scent, and desperately try to break free of her grip.


Lynette just giggles at your attempts to escape. "They're so cute when they struggle." She says to herself. After several minutes of trying to loosen her fist, you get one last ditch idea. You open youth mouth and bite down hard on Lynette's thumb.


That did the trick. Lynette yells in pain and instinctively drops you. When you hit the floor you get a couple of bruised ribs, but nothing broken. No sooner than you landed, you were instantly on your feet and running out the door and straight for home faster than the Roadrunner.


When you get home, you feel it would be better not to tell your parents that you were in all probability nearly raped twice today. That night you sleep with your pellet gun under your pillow, just incase. The next day you decide to go to school prepared, keeping a taser in you pocket incase a female tries to molest you again.


As you walk past the boys bathroom, you are suddenly grabbed and pulled inside. "What the f-" A furry hand clamps over your mouth as your captor whispers in your ear "Shut up and just listen." You rip the hand away from you mouth and spin around to see none other than Luke.


"What do you want?" You say, your hand gripping the taser in your pocket. "I can't believe you." Says look, slowly stepping towards you, forcing you to back up into a wall. "The whole school knows how you resisted a female's advances, and then attacked her, my sister no less." You were ready to give 500 volts to the groin when he says, "That takes balls."


Your grip on the taser loosens as he continues. "I never thought you had it in you, but I was wrong. You just might have what it takes to join us.” “Join who?” You ask. “Haven’t you noticed how there are almost no other males in this school?”


You realize he was right. Other than Luke, every furry you had met had been female. “Well, that’s because there are an estimated 100 males on this entire planet. Because there are so little of us, we are treated as property. If a male is unfortunate enough to be claimed by a female, he is basically her slave for life. We have no rights, no power, no will.”


So it’s basically the same as being married on earth, you think to yourself. “I am part of an underground organization called UMA, we fight for male rights and freedom, and to overthrow the oppression of the females. I’m offering you the chance to join us, to fight for your future. We are planning our first major strike, and we need all the help we can get. Will you join us?”
1412.title: Rebellion

14121.content:
You thought about it for a second. You were given the chance to defend yourself against future attacks. On top of that, Luke was being nice to you. You were sold.

"Okay, I'm in." you say.

"Perfect." Luke says. "Our next meeting is Friday night. Meet me at the school gates at seven, and then I'll show you where we have our secret meetings."

"Got it." you say.

"And... I wanted to say that I'm sorry for being such a jerk to you." he says, surprising you. "I thought that you'd be a weakling, but I was wrong. You were able to hold your own against a girl that even I was afraid of."

"It's cool." you say before leaving the bathroom.

After you leave, you see Ramona. "Dude! What happened?" she asked. "I saw Luke pull you into the bathroom."

You didn't want to tell Ramona about the UMA, so you just tell her that you that you patched things up with Luke.

"Bullshit!" she says, laughing. "You're lying, right?"

"No, it's true." you say.

"Whatever, I wanted to tell you something."

"What?"

"Chloe and I were talking, and she wants to go out with you and me on Saturday night!" she says. "Am I a good wingman or what?"

"It's not a date." you say.

"Of course not, think about it." Ramona explains. "We go out as a group, she gets to know you, and if all goes well, she'll want to go on a REAL date with you."

"Oh, I get it." you say.

"See you on Saturday!" Ramona says as you two headed off to your next classes.
14121.title: The New Member

141211.content:
The streets are quiet as you leave your house, dressed all in black, your jacket hood obscuring your face. You told your parents you had been invited to a party and would be back by eleven. You walk through the dark streets, keeping to the shadows as much as possible.


You reach the school, where Luke is waiting, dressed much the same as you. “Were you followed?” He asks. You shake your head. Luke motions for you to follow, and he leads you through town for several
minutes before coming to a forest.


“Where exactly are we going?” You ask. “Our headquarters.” Says Luke. “You’re not officially a member yet, so you’ll have to be initiated first.” “What exactly does this initiation involve?” “You’ll see.”


After hiking for several minutes, you come to a small clearing in the trees. Luke reaches down and gropes around on the ground for something. He lifts up, opening trapdoor in the ground leading to a staircase. You follow him down the stairs into what looks to be an abandoned mine. Luke suddenly grabs your hand.


“You better hold onto me.” He says. “I know you humans can’t see in the dark.” He leads you down the pitch-black tunnel to a chamber illuminated by lanterns. About fifty furries of various species stood in a square formation in the center of the room, half of them your had to be around age, the rest were adults. At the head of the group was a furry that wore a blank, plain white mask over his face, but you could tell by the shape of the mask he was a feline. Like you and Luke, everybody in the room wore black.


“Welcome.” Said the masked cat. The must have been a voice modulator in his mask, because his voice reminded you of Darth Vader. “ My name is not important, but you may simply call me X. You are the first human to join the United Males Army. Only two things are required of you, a pledge of loyalty to our cause, and proof of that loyalty. Do you accept these terms?”


You nodded. “Then repeat after me.” X clenched his fist and placed it over his heart, you did the same. X began reciting the pledge, and you repeated him after each line.


I solemnly swear from here on out
I will fight for the freedom of all male-kind
I will do what is necessary
To achieve our goal
And instill our supremacy
Even to my last breath


After you finished the pledge, the other furries in the room placed their fists over their hearts in salute. “Now, all that remains is for you to prove your loyalty.” Said X. Just then two ther UMA members, a wolf and a tiger, enter the room, dragging an unconcious female with a black bag over her head. “We found this one snooping around in the tunnels.” Said the wolf. “Probably trying to spy on us.”


Even though you couldn’t see his face, you could tell X was smiling. “Perfect.” X handed you a pistol as the wolf and tiger tied the bagged female to a chair as she began to wake. “This shall be your test.” Said X. “Execute her, and prove your loyalty to the cause.”


You stared down at the gun in your hand in disbelief. Were they serious?! They wanted you to kill her?! You thought they were going to be a political group, you had no idea you were getting involved with a bunch of terrorists!


“Why are you hesitating?” Said X in a deadly voice. “Do it!” You did swear to do as necessary, and you get the feeling if you don’t do it, they’ll kill you instead. Good God, what have you gotten yourself into?


You aim the gun with trembling hands, shakily aiming for the captive female’s forehead. Just close you eyes before you squeeze, you think, that way you won’t have to see it. But as the wolf takes the bag off of the captive’s head, your heart sinks.
141211.title: Initiation

1412112.content:
You were devastated to see that it was Chloe’s face that was under the bag! You were even more hesitant than before now that you knew your crush was the girl you were holding at gunpoint. Your grip on the gun was now very loose. “What the hell are you doing, boy!?” X shouted. “SHOOT HER!”

“No! Please don’t!” Chloe said. “I fell into the tunnel and I couldn’t find my way out! I swear!” You desperately wished that this was some cruel idea of a joke. This was NOT what you signed up for. “Would you really trust the words of a female?” X says, trying to coerce you.

“Wait a second, X!” Luke says. “I never had to do something this serious when I was initiated last month! You told me that we wouldn’t be hurting anyone!” Luke turns to you. “Don’t do it, man. I’m sorry I got you into this.” Needless to say, X was furious. “SHOOT HER BEFORE I KILL ALL THREE OF YOU!” he roared. You and Luke look at each other. He mouths the words “Let’s grab Chloe and go.” to you. You nod in agreement. You raise your gun as if you were going to shoot Chloe, then you suddenly dash towards her and grab her, heading out the exit with Luke following you. Chloe gets on her feet and quickly helps to guide you out of the cave, while you give your gun to Luke so that he can cover your back. The three of you make it outside and dash towards the school, hoping to lose the ten furries that were sent to pursue you. You find a hiding spot in the tool shed, and stay there for at least an hour to make sure that they were gone.

The three of you leave the tool shed, giving sighs of relief. “Thank you guys so much!” Chloe says happily. “I thought that I was done for.” “No problem,” you say. Your parents were expecting you to be home at eleven, so you hoped that Ramona didn’t mind some extra guests. You knock on her door and Ramona answers. “Luke? Chloe? [your name]? What are you guys doing here?” she asks. “Can we come in, then explain?” you ask. “Sure,” she says.

Ramona takes the three of you up to her room. When you walk in, you see a grey mouse furry with short, brown hair. “[Your name], this is my friend Colin.” Ramona said. We were studying together when you guys show up. Colin seemed like a trustworthy guy, so you decide to tell him and Ramona about what happened.

“And you guys weren’t found?” Colin asks in disbelief. “That is so badass!” Ramona says. “But all jokes aside, we need to stop the UMA.” “I have an idea.” Chloe said. “We know that the UMA is fighting for male rights, right? They have a good idea, but they’re going about it the wrong way. So what if we made our own organization for equality between the sexes?” “That’s a good idea.” you say. “We can gather members, boys and girls, and settle the issues nonviolently. I’m in!”

“Us, too!” Ramona, Colin, and Luke say.

“Great, we can scout for members tomorrow at school.” Chloe says, and then she turns to you. “Can I talk to you outside for a second?” When you two left the room, Chloe started talking. “I think it was really heroic of you to save me, even though we barely know each other.” she said. “It’s no problem.” you say. Chloe gives you a warm hug, then she looks up at you and stares into your eyes. She then puts her lips upon yours, giving you a kiss. It wasn’t a forceful kiss, but a soft, romantic one. You almost passed out. You and Chloe go back into Ramona’s room.

“Did you chicken out?” Luke asked.

“No.”

“Did you puke?” Colin asked.

“No!”

“Ha! I knew he wouldn’t choke!” Ramona said. “You two owe me ten bucks, each!”
1412112.title: Breakout!

14121122.content:
The next day, you were in your living room watching the news. Turns out your attempt to recruit members to your little group didn't go so well. You had all started up a petition, and had so far gotten thrity-seven signatures for it. The problem is, thirty-five of those signatures were all the other males in the school, and the reaming two were Chloe's and Ramona's.


Just like human women, it turns out furry females are reluctant to share power. Even though X was clearly a complete psychopath, you were beginning to see his perspective of things. He wanted to bring power to the males of Bestia, which was understandable, but clearly he was willing to kill anyone who stood in his way, innocent or not.


You and Luke had reported what had happened last night to the police, but when they had gone to check out X's lair, it had been abandoned. Luke had told you that X and his lackeys were planning their first major strike, but he didn't say what exactly they were going to do. Apparently, X hadn't told him, because when questioned on what is was they were planning, Luke said he didn't know.
