As it turns out, you were about to get your answer, because as you watched the news, an emergency broadcast pops up on the screen. The anchorwoman on the screen is visibly shockwed as she reads the report. "This just in, the Senatorial Palace had just been bombed! We now go live to Felicia Drays on the scene."



Bestia was not governed by a single ruler. Itwas ruled by a council of senators, all female of course. The screen cuts to a scene of utter pandamonium, the Senatorial Palace up in flames as Felica Drays, a female skunk, stood on the scene live.

"Just minutes ago, chaos erupted as the Senatorial Palace suddenly exploded, with all the senators in the middle of their annual meeting. Firefighters are desperatley trying to put out the flames, no word yet as to how the explosion was caused, but..."


Suddenly, the screen turns to static for a moment, before you see the blank, white mask of X on screen. "Males of Bestia, for too long have we suffered under the foot of the corrupt female regime. IT was we who destroyed the symbol of oppression you call the Senatorial Palace, and that was only the first step in our grand plan of liberation. Soon, it will be us who rule over this world, while the females tremble beneath our boots, in their rightful place. We may be few in number, but rest assured, that will matter little, when the next phase of our plan is complete. As for you acursed females, you can look forward to being assimilated."


The screen cuts back to the news station, needless to say, you couldn't believe what you just saw. X had only aboput fifty other accomplices in his so called "Spectre" group. How could they have been able tio assassinate the senators of Bestia, and Hijack the news station, all on their own? Your cell phone rings in your pocket, and you look at the caller ID to see it is...
14121122.title: Bombing and Broadcasting

choices: "The two of you must come with us."
"We'll be keeping an eye on both of you."
141211222.content:
You see it was Luke that was calling you. "Hey buddy, what's up?" IT's funny how just a couple days ago, you never would have called Luke "buddy", but he had actually started to respect you now, since that incident with his sister.


"(Your name), are you watching TV?"


"Yeah?"


"Did you see what just happened?


"Yeah, did you know they were planning something like this?"


"I told you, they never said anything about killing anyone. Anyway, I need you to come over to my house, right now. It's very important."


"What about Lynette?"


"Don't worry about her, just get here as fast as you can."


You quickly put on your jacket and shoes, and run over to Luke's house. When you get there, Luke is sitting on the sofa in the living room, weith two females, a tiger and a leopard, in black uniforms standing in fornt of him. "Are you (your name)?" The tiger asks. You nod


"Have a seat."


You sit beside Luke, and the two felines infront of you get straight to business. "We are agents for SIREN." Said the leopard, indicating their uniforms. "We understand to two lof you were recently involved with the terrorist organization known as Spectre. We are goibng to ask you some questions, and don't even try to lie to us."


For over an hour, they interrogated the two of you. They asked if you had known about Spectre's plans, or where their current location was, and how long Luke had been with them. You had no choice but to tell them the truth, since they would know if you were lying, so you told them you had no idea what Spectre was planning or where they are, or the names of it's members. when they finally finished, the two officers look at each other, then back to you and say...
141211222.title: Interrogation

1412112221.content:
You and Luke get scared the minute they say that. Before you know it, you're in the car that the two agents came in, on your way to God knows where. The agents sat in the front while you two sat in the back, with a wall between the front and back seats.


"Where do you think they're taking us?" Luke asks.


"I dunno," you say. "The windows are tinted, so I can't see a thing."


"Alright, I am legit scared right now," he says, which is something you'd never expect him to say.


"Keep it down back there!" says the leopard, her voice reverberating throughout the vehicle. That was enough to shut you and Luke up for the rest of the ride. You finally arrive in some kind of garage, and you and Luke are escorted into some sort of office. It looked like something out of a spy movie. This must have been SIREN's headquarters. You then see two other agents carry in two females and one male that look really familiar.


"Ramona? Chloe? Colin?" you ask. "Is that you?"


All of a sudden, a very official looking furry approaches the five of you. It was a male wolf with brown fur. "Now that the five of you are here," he says, "the induction ceremony can begin."


You and your friends all say at once:
1412112221.title: We're Going on a Little Field Trip

14121122211.content:
"Yes."Says the wolf "You''ll see what I mean. Come with me, all of you." He dismissed the other agents before leading all of you down a long hallway to what you assumed was his office. He took a seat behind his desk, while you and Chloe sat in the two chairs in front of him, with everyone else standing behind you.



"My name is Commander Briggs." He said "I am the head of SIREN. I trust you all know what SIREN is, correct?" You shook your head, while everyone else nodded. Looking at you, Briggs said "Simply put, SIREN is the highest enforcement agency on Bestia, answering only to the council. We handle the really big situations the government and police can't, from drug runners to terrorists. Speaking of which, I understand that you and your friend were involved with the organization responsible for the bombing of the Senatorial Palace, and assassination of the entire council just today."


For the second time that day, you and Luke explain how you had no idea of Specter's plans. "I see. It has also come to my attention that all of you have been trying to form a group for equal rights for males, akin to Specter, but peacefully?" You all nod. " Well then, here's the plan. We have no doubt that Specter will be llooking for you two." He indicated you and Luke "Therefore we believe you may be our only lead to the location of Specter, and its leader, this so called X. The two of you are going to be temporarily recruited as undercover SIREN agents. We place a tracer and a wire on each of you, and allow Specter to capture you. Then we''ll know where to find them, and put an end to all this."


Briggs now spoke to the whole group. "Perhaps when this whole mess is over, SIREN will be able to back you little rights group. You ,of course, may refuse my offer, but if you accept, and we pull this off, Bestia would be forever in your debt, and you all will receive special commendations for your service." Briggs stood up and went to leave the room to give you all time to discuss the situation, but just before he left, he turned to Chloe and said "Buy the way, your name wouldn't happen to be Benson, would it?"


"Yes."


Briggs paused for a moment, then said "I knew your father. Bravest man I ever served with."After Briggs left, you immediately turn to Chloe and said "What was that about?" "My father was an executor for SIREN." She explained Before you could ask, she said "Executors are what those agents who brought us here are, the field officers of SIREN. They are exempt from the laws and regulations of normal government agencies, and are free to deal with their targets as they see fit. My father was the first male to join them. Briggs must have been his partner."


With that out of the way, you all begin discussing whether or not to take SIREN up on their offer. Eventually, you all agree that...
14121122211.title: Deputized

141211222111.content:
You and Luke walk side by side, down a dark street late at night. Your mission was to wait for Spectr to try and abduct you, and let yourselves be captured. SIREN would then follow the tracer signal they had planted on you, and come to your rescue. For nearly three hours, the two of you wandered the streets of the city, with no results. You started chatting, just to kill the boredom.


"So what made you join Specter in the first place?"


Luke hesitated. "I don't really know. I guess I was sick of my sister always being over me. Do you have any sisters?"


You shake your head.


"Consider yourself lucky. Sisters are a royal pain in the ass, younger or older."


"You fight with her a lot?"



"Sometimes. But it always ends with her growing to twenty feet tall and sitting on me."


"Why do you put up with her then?"


"What other choice do I have? There's no way I could beat her in a fight, and then there's my mom."


The two of you decided to rest on a park bench and continue your discussion there. "You really hate them don't you?" You ask "Who?" "The females." "Wouldn't you if you grew up on a world where males are treated as prizes? I joined Specter because I wanted to fight their oppression, but I never wanted to exterminate them."


Before you could reply, your are cut off by a sudden surge of electricity through your body. Your muscles go limp, and you fall to the ground, Luke doing the same. The last thing you see before you black out, is someone dressed completely in black, brandishing the taser he had shocked you with.


When you finally come to, you see you and Luke have both been tied to chairs in a dimly lit room. standing in front of you, is a male wolf, clearly a Specter agent, judging by his attire. "Sleep well?" He says "Don't bother trying to scream for help, this entire place is totally sound-proof."


He pulls up another chair and sits in front of the two of you. "X was very displeased how you both betrayed us." He says. He looks over to you. "You, will not be leaving this place alive. Since your little stunt at your initiation, X has decided that humans can't be trusted, male or not." He turns over to Luke. "But for you, Luke, X is willing to give you a second chance."


"What do you mean?"


"I mean, if you swear your allegiance to our cause, and prove your loyalty by offing your little monkey friend, X will forgive everything."


You almost expected Luke to revert to his old way, and sell you out instantly, but to your surprise he refuses. "No fucking way!": He says "I ain't gonna kill anyone." Just then, and loud tapping sound echoes through the room. "Hear that?" Asks the wolf "That's Hugo. You remember Hugo, right?"


Luke's eyes widen with fear, and you could swear you heard him let out a small whimper. "Home-run Hugo?" He asks, his voice trembling. "That's right. He's just been itching to get some batting practice, if you get my meaning. I hear he's ever put nails in it now. Now, I'm gonna ask you one last time, and if you refuse, I'm calling Hugo over. And he's gonna take that bat of his, and beat you to a pulp. So, what's it gonna be?"
141211222111.title: Mission Accepted

1412112221112.content:
Luke trembles at the thought of being beaten repeatedly by Home-Run Hugo's bat of nails. That fear was enough to finally make him crack. "Fine, you win," says Luke.


"What!?" you say, not believing what you're hearing. Then again, you and Luke had only recently become friends. Why should you be surprised that he'd sell you out?


The wolf chuckles. "I knew you'd make the right choice, Luke." he says. He takes out a switchblade and slices the ropes that kept Luke confined to his chair. "Welcome back to Spectre," he says.


"I can't believe you," you say to Luke.


"I'm sorry, man," he says, with shame in his voice. "I... I just..."


"Don't worry about him," the wolf says. "Like I said, you did the right thing."


"No, I didn't..." says Luke, "but I'm about to!"


Luke suddenly takes his hand and chops the wolf's neck with the side of his hand, stunning him. When he gets himself together, he looks at Luke with rage in his eyes.


"Why you little prick!" he yells. "You're gonna pay for that!" He reaches into his pocket, most likely for his switchblade, but he can't seem to find it.


"Looking for this?" Luke asks, revealing the switchblade from behind his back. He then quickly cuts you free from the chair, and it's now two against one. The wolf doesn't seem to care, as he charges full speed at the both of you. You both manage to dodge the attack and get a hold of his arms, wrestling him to the ground. In a decisive blow, you punch the wolf in his temple, knocking him out.


You both give a sigh of relief. "Man, I thought you had really sold me out," you say.


"No way, dude," he says. I just needed a way to get myself free so I could get the upper hand."


"Well, thanks. I really appreciate it," you say.


Luke gives an embarrassed chuckle. "Here, you take the knife. I can hold my own in hand-to-hand combat, so you'll need it more than me."


All of a sudden, the door opens again and behind it...
1412112221112.title: Stabbed in the Back

choices: Go Jack Bauer on his ass!
14121122211122.content:
You and Luke both spin around, ready to fight for your lives, when you see the same two SIREN agents you met earlier. Their guns were raised, but they lowered them as they looked around in surprise. "Wow." Said the leopard "You two are better than we gave you credit for."


"It's about time you guys showed up! What kept you?"


"We lost your tracer's signal for a bit." Says the tiger "That, and it took some time to get here." She nudges the wolf with the tip of her boot. "Out cold. Maybe you guys should consider becoming agents full time. Anyway, I have some bad news. Our plans seem to have backfired. We hopefully you would be taken to Specter's main base, but this is just a statehouse in the basement of an abandoned building."


Needless to say, you and Luke were not pleased.


"So we just risked our live for nothing!?"


"Not necessarily." Said the leopard "We did manage to arrest a few Specter operatives when we busted this place. They're being taken back to headquarters for interrogation." She looks down at the unconscious wolf "I think we'll start with this one." Back at heaquarters, you, Luke, Collin, and the girls stood behind a two-way mirror, looking in at the wolf in an interrogation cell.


He was strapped into a restraining chair, while the two Executors tried to get some answers out of him. After half an hour of trying, the only thing they got out of him was that his name wad Victor. Seemingly giving up, they left the room and spoke to you and Luke. "Maybe you two would like to try this." Said the Tiger "Keep in mind," says the leopard " You are legally sanctioned with SIREN, so feel free to use any methods you see fit."


Luke turns to you and says "So how do you want to do this?"
14121122211122.title: Late to the Party

141211222111222.content:
You turn to Luke, who is smirking at you. "I think Victor deserves a little payback, wouldn't you say?" You smile wickedly and nod. "You're not really gonna torture him, are you?" Asks Chloe worryingly "Nothing too extreme." Says Luke "We'll just rough him up some."


You both go into the interrogation room. Victor sneers as you enter. "You two again? Not only did you rat us out, but now you're working for the enemy. X is gonna have both your heads on a silver platter for this." You put on your best threatening voice and reply " It looks to me like you're not in a position to be making threats."


You and Luke stand on either side of Victor, and look him straight in the eyes. " Now then, we're gonna ask you some questions." Luke says "If you know what's good for you, you better cooperate. Where is X?"


"Go fuck yourselves."


Luke punches Victor in the mouth for that remark. "Where is he?" Luke repeats " At your house, getting head from your mother." Victor received another punch, the time in the groin for that. As he howled in pain, you get an idea. You grab Victor by the throat and press his head back into the chair as you reach into your pocket and pull out the switchboard from earlier.


"Now then, tell us where X is, our you''ll never see again." You hold the tip of the blade in front of his face, hovering just centimeters from his eye. You thought that would be enough to make him shit himself, but Victor just smirks. "You don't have the guts, monkey man." Damn it, he saw through your bluff. But then you have another idea. You open the door to the cell and stick your head out.


"Tell Briggs to get a car battery down hear. Maybe this prick will talk after a few thousand volts to the balls."
141211222111222.title: Go Jack Bauer on his ass!

choices: "They're gonna transmogrify every human on Earth."
"They have another machine that turns furries into normal animals."
1412112221112221.content:
That last threat did the trick. Victor suddenly broke out in a cold sweat as you said those words. "Alright! Okay! I'll talk!" Both you and Luke smile at your success. You both pull up a chair and sit on either side of Victor. "Start talking."



"Alright. I can't tell you where X is, because he isn't even anywhere on this planet."



"What do you mean?"



"I mean he's in space, where no one from SIREN will be able to reach him."



"But this makes no sense, how could X have the technology to get to outer space, when not too long ago, you and your little group were hiding in a mine?"



"If I tell you that, he'll kill me."



If you don't tell us, you're gonna wish we had killed you. He may not have the cuts to carve you up like a turkey, but I sure as hell do." It didn't take long for Victor to change his mind. "Specter made a deal with the Scarilians. They're helping us in our cause." You had no idea what a Scarilian was, but the look on Luke's face when Victor said it was one of pure disbelief.



"What was the deal?"



"If the Scarilians gave us their technology, and helped us take over Bestia, we would send them females to use as slaves and breeding stock. X figured there were way too many of them on this planet, why not give away the extras?"



You and Luke couldn't believe what you were hearing. Even though you couldn't see them behind the two-way mirror, you were sure Collin, Chloe and Ramona were watching with their jaws on the floor. "That's not all." Says Victor. "X sent some of our agents to Earth, to try and recruit human men to our cause."



"But you said X decided humans can't be trusted."


"They can't. That's why he sent this strange machine with them that the Scarilians gave us. I don't know what it's called or how it works, but thew bottom line is, it can change the species of any living organism. In short, they're turning humans in furries."



"Anything else you want to spill?"



"Just one last thing..."
1412112221112221.title: Victor sings like a canary

14121122211122211.content:
Your eyes widen as you hear what Victor says. You then turn to Luke. "You finish up here," you tell him. I need to talk to the boss. After your talk with Briggs, he calls you and your friends in to the briefing room.


"What's this about, boss?" asks Colin


"[Your name] has something he wants to say to all of you, regarding Spectre's latest scheme," says Briggs as he calls you up to address your friends.


"Okay, guys," you say. "We all know that Spectre is planning to turn all the humans on Earth into furries. It's safe to assume that the females will be sent to the Scarillians as slaves and the males will be recruited as Spectre agents. It goes without saying that this plan needs to be stopped. Luke, were you able to get Victor to tell you when this device will reach Earth?"


"One week," he says. "Victor said that they will be taking the machine to all the continents on Earth and transmogrify all the humans, one continent at a time."


"That's a lot of work to carry one big machine around," says Ramona.


"Well, we should take advantage of that," says Chloe. She then turns to Luke. "What continent are they hitting first?"


What's Luke's response.
14121122211122211.title: They're Gonna What!?

141211222111222111.content:
"Victor swallowed a suicide pill he was hiding in one of his teeth. But before he did, he said the device was on ship headed for Earth. It will arrive in Europe, and go on from there?"


"Do we have the name of this ship?"


"He died before I could get him to say. All I got from him was what exactly this thing does."


"And that is?"


"Basically, it's like a nuclear bomb, only it doesn't actually destroy anything. It sends out a wave of radiation that mutates any humanoid in it's path. With the blast radius of this thing, entire countries could be morphed in a matter of days."


"Well, we're fucked then." Said Collin "Dozens of ships go from Bestia to Earth everyday." "We have to figure something out." Said Chloe "If Specter is being backed up by the Scarilians, we're all in serious..."


"Wait a minute." You cut in " I'm sorry if this sounds naive, but who are the Scarilians?"


"Scarilians are the natural enemies of Bestians." Chloe explains " They're an insectoid race from the planet Scarilia, which is baisically a plnat-sized hive. We've been fighting them since the beginning of our history, mostly because they kidnap us in order to reproduce. You don't want to know how, trust me."


"Anyway," Says Briggs " I''ll order all the spaceports to release their records of recent flights to Earth to us. That ship is bound to be in there somewhere." Three days later, you receive a phone call from Briggs. Is it good news or bad news.
141211222111222111.title: What the Hell is a Scarilian?

1412112221112221112.content:
"(Your name), I've got good news and bad news." Briggs said.
"Okay. So what's the good news?" you ask.
"I've compiled all the records and cross-referenced them to find the ship with the machine." Briggs said.
"Alright. So what is the bad news?" you ask.
"Here the problem. I've narrowed it down to 5 ships that will land in Europe in the next 4 days. There's no possible way we can check all of them before they land." Briggs answered.
"That's real nice." you say sarcastically.
"Anyway, the point being, we need to figure out how we can stop the machine from reaching Earth. Any suggestions?" Briggs asked.
You thought for a while and then you say,"I've got a plan that should work. How good are the small ships when it comes to speed?"
"They are capable of light-speed travel. Why?" Briggs inquired.
"Good. Why don't you come over to my house so I can explain the details? I'll call over Ramona, Luke, and Chloe." you say.
"Why not just tell me on the phone?" Briggs asked.
"Because I have a feeling we have some eavesdroppers." you say.
"Fine, be there in an hour." Briggs said before he hung up.
1412112221112221112.title: This is bad...

14121122211122211121.content:
When Luke, Ramona, Chloe, and Briggs arrived at your house, you close the front door and bolt it shut as well as lock all the windows in the house.
"Why are you locking up the place? It's like you're preparing for an attack or something." Luke says.
"I have a feeling that Spectre is going to knock on my door soon." you answer.
Once this task was finished, everyone gathers around in the living room. You begin by saying,"Briggs, how many ships are we going to be able to intercept before they reach Earth?"
"We are going to be able to intercept two of them. Why do you ask?"
"Perfect. This plan is going to work then." you say triumphantly.
"What plan?" everyone asked.
"Simple. There's 3 different ships that's heading for Earth that we can't intercept right? So, why not we land on Earth before they do, and then we search the ships before they can unload anything?" you say.
"That's a good plan, but there's a lot of flaws in it. How are we going to search all of them before they unload anything? Each ship is landing in a different city." Briggs says.
"Glad you pointed that out. We'll split into 3 groups, each group will take a human customs team with them and search the ships and whoever finds the machine will report it to the others." you say."Since I'm sure the machine is going to be well guarded, I think we should each have a SIREN agent with us as backup."
"Glad to see you worked out all the kinks, but who's going with who and where is everyone going?" Chloe asked.
"Anyone have a map of Earth?" you ask. Briggs pulls out a hologram and he circles the cities that the ships will land in. They were: London, Paris, and Venice.
"Okay." you say. "I think we should split into groups now to make explaining things easier. So... I'll pair up with
14121122211122211121.title: The Master Plan

141211222111222111212.content: Who do you pair up with? Chloe or Luke?
141211222111222111212.title: The Feline or the Fox?

choices: It's Chloe's house (though you don't know it yet)
15.content:
You look back to the enchanting feline across the hall, and just stand there, mezmerized. Your brain was screaming at you to go up and talk to her, but your body wouldn't respond. You just stand there, locked in battle with yourself. Dozen of question run through your head at light speed. What do I say to her? Should I ask her out? What if she says no?Apparently, you were standing there for longer than you thought, because Ramona gets impatient and grabs your wrist, leading you down another hall.



"Hey!"



"If you stood there any longer, you would have made us late. The bell's going to ring in thrity seconds."



To your dismay, your first class was Chemistry. On Earth, you never really liked science classes in general, but chemistry was the worst for you. You outright flunked it, and had to go to summer school. Of course, you were the only boy in the class, so as soon as you walk in the door, the whole room turns stares at youlongingly, except the teacher, Ms. T, a tigress. "Ah yes, we have a new student from Earth with us, Mr. (your name). Please take a seat anywhere." You knew immedietley to sit next to Ramona, incase any of the females surrounding you tried to pull something. As Ms. T began her lecture for the day, you instantly knew this would be hell for you, due to the fact that on Bestia, they have a different periodic table than on earth, so you had no idea what the teacher was talking about.



"Now, who can tell me what I would get if I boil Zioxitride, Diamondium, and Titanousum together?"



Ms. T might as well have been speaking greek, because you had never heard of any of this. Then came the part where you had to pick a lab partner. Almost all at once, the other girls tried to get to you, but Ramona quickly claimed you before they could. That was partly why you liked Ramona, she was always reliable.



The assignment for today was to mix certain chemicals togther to make some sort of solvent. Unfortunatley, you end up mixing the wrong chemicals, causing the mixture you created produce copious amounts of smoke, setting off the fire alarm throughout the entire school. Needless to say, everyone was standing outside, as the ensuing mess was being sorted out. At the end of the day, Ms. T called you into her room.



"Ms. T, I'm sorry about the..."



"It's alright (your name), You didn't mean to cause it. It could have been much worse, at least it wasn't poison gas. Anwya, I think Chemistry may not be your strongsuit, so I've assigned you a private tutor for the subject."



She hands you a small note with an address. "You are to report to this address Monday through Friday at svsen sharp. Understand?" You nod and look at address to see where you'll be going tonight for help in chemistry.
15.title: With Science Of Course!!!

151.content:
You head over to Ramona's house, you ring the doorbell, she opens the door she looks friendly

"Oh Hi!" She says "So glad you could come!"

You enter her house, take your backpack off

"Do you want a snack before we get started?" Ramona asks

"Just some popcorn, would be OK." You say

"You humans sure have weird tastes in food." Ramona says but she goes to grab a bag of popcorn anyway

You sit down on the sofa you look out the window and see...
151.title: It's Ramona's house

choices: You study hard, but you find time to chat.
152.content:
You were only able to recognize the address on the note because it was on the same street as yours. "Thanks, Ms. T." you say.


"Have a good afternoon, [your name]." she says.


"You too," you answer.


That afternoon, when you got home, your parents were on your case about what had happened at school. You calmed them down by telling them that you had a tutor and that it wouldn't happen again. As you get your other homework done, you get your chemistry book and head off to the address that Ms. T had given you. When you get to the house, you knock on the door. You hear a voice.


"Chloe, the door." a voice calls out


Wait a second. Did that person just say Chloe?


"Can you get it?" another voice answers.


This is Chloe's house! If that wasn't enough proof, her last name was on the mailbox, too. You were happy and nervous at the same time. Your excitement/nervousness is interrupted when someone opens the door. She looks exactly like Chloe, but she's wearing a different set of clothes and her hair was wrapped in a ponytail, so you assume that this isn't her.


"Hello!" she says warmly. "Can I help you?"


"Hi, um... I'm here to see Chloe." you say. "Are you... her sister?"


"Oh heavens, no!" she says. "I'm her mother."


You blush with embarrassment.


"Don't worry, sweetie. Chloe and I get mistaken for each other all the time, and a lot of people assume that we're sisters." she says. She sees the books in your hand. "Oh, you must be who Chloe's tutoring. Come on in."


As you enter the house, you see that it looked really well decorated. Chloe's mother climbs up the stairs to her room. "Chloe's in the honors Chemistry class, so she'll, know what you're studying in your class." How does the tutoring session go?
152.title: Jackpot!

1522.content:
When Chloe's mother reaches the top of the stairs, she calls out "Chloe, that boy from school you're tutoring is here!" "Coming!" Chloe replies. Moments later, Chloe emerges from her room and invites you inside. "So, I heard you nearly burned the school down today." She says teasingly.



"First of all, it was an accident, and secondly, there wasn't any flames, just smoke."



"I'm only kidding with you." She says. "Now then, let's get started." For the next hour or so, Chloe explains the basics of the Bestian periodic table to you, telling you the properties, symbols, and in some cases dangers, of the various elements.



You really did pay attention as much as you could, but you couldn't help but get distracted sometimes by Chloe's beauty. Luckily, she never caught you staring. "Well, that about covers the periodic table." She says "Tomorrow we'll get into formulas and reactions."




She looks at the clock and sees that it is about eight-thirty. "I don't know whjat time your parents expect you to be home, but you can stay here and chat for a bit if you want." With a mighty force of will, you keep yourself from jumping for joy as she says that. "Well, tell me about yourself." You say.For the next twenty minutes or so, she tells you about her interests and hobbies. When she mentions that she's the smartest girl in school, though, you think she's exagerating.



"You don't believe me?"



"Nah, you're too pretty to be that smart." You instantly slap your hand over your mouth, realizing whjat you just said. But Chloe just smirks and says "I'll have you know not all smart girls wear glasses and braces. I scored top marks in every science class I've had. Go ahead, ask me anything."



"Alright, what is the airspeed velocity of an unlaiden swallow?"



"Is this an Earthling or Bestian swallow?"



"Damn, she is good."
1522.title: All Work and No Play....You Know The Rest

choices: You get a call from your parents.
15221.content: You decide that it wouldn't hurt to stay here a little longer, even though you'd be coming her every weekday. You and Chloe continue chatting for another half hour until-
15221.title: No Harm in Staying a Little Longer, Right?

choices: Yet another incident in Chemistry Class
152212.content:
You look at the clock and see that it is nearly ten. "Well, I should get going." You say as you pick up your book and head for the door. But just before you can grab the doorknob, the door swings open, revealing a smaller cat furry with the same fur pattern and eyes as Chloe, with her blonde hair in pigtails.



"Sis, mom says..."



She stops mid sentence when she sees you, and just stands there, staring at you. "Hello." You say, trying to break the awkwardness of her staring. "Hi." She says shyly. "Are you that Earth boy from down the street?" You nod. "Cool!" She exclaims, suddenly excited "I've never met a human before!"



"What is it Cora?" Says Chloe "Mom says it's time to go to bed, so your boyfriend will have to go home." "He is not my boyfriend!" Says Chloe defensively "And he was just leaving." Cora looks up at you with hope in her eyues "So you're available then?"



"Cora, out!"



Cora looks back at you one last time with a dreamy expression on her face, before turning around and leaving.



"That was your...?"



"My little sister, yes. I hope you weren't bothered by her. She can be a pain in the ass sometimes, and she's at that age where her hormones do all her thinking for her."



You nod. "Hey, when you said I wasn't your boyfriend, did you mean..." "Don't take it personally." Saus Chloe reassuringly "I just met you tongiht, you didn't really expect me to consider you my boyfriend just because Ms. T assigned us together, did you?" You sahke your head "No of course not." You say, though you secretly wish that had been the case.



"Well, see you tomorrow."



After you get home and ready for bed, you look out the window to see tweo big green eyes staring at you from the house across the street. "You knew it had to be Cora, and close your blinds so as to to be disturbed by the thought of her watching you in your sleep.



The next day...
152212.title: Sibling Rivalry

1522121.content:
The next day, as you walk out the house, you see Ramona waiting by the fence.


"So, looking forward to another study session with your dream girl tonight?" she says teasingly. You had told her that Chloe was your tutor, and about what happened with Cora.


"Ha, ha." you say sarcastically. "Speaking of which, where is she?"


"She has a car, so she drove to school early like always." Ramona explains, then she sees the occupied look on your face. "What's wrong? Did you have a wet dream about Chloe and don't want me to know?"


"Why do you have to be like that?" you ask. "If you must know, I'm like this because I saw Cora staring at me from her window last night."


"Aww!" she says. "Wittle [your name]'s got a witlle admirer!"


"That's not funny!" you say.


On your way to school, you and Ramona see an extra shadow on the ground. The two of you turn around and see Cora.


"Hi!" she says to you. You apprehensively wave back.


"What are you doing here, Cora." Ramona asks. "Isn't the middle school in the other direction."


"Shut up, Ramona!" Cora snaps at her, and Ramona growls in response. She's pretty much friends with Chloe, but she always thought that her sister was a little brat.


"Sooooo, [your name]." she says. "Are you coming over again, tonight?" You were nervous to go over to Chloe's again, since her little sister is pretty much obsessed with you at this point. Then again, you don't want to fail Chemistry, or blow up the school, plus Chloe will be there.


"Yeah..." you answer.


"Okay, cool. See ya!" she says, and with that, she walks off in the other direction.


"I don't know how I'm gonna focus on studying tonight." you tell Ramona.


Than night, you go up to Chloe's house and knock on the door. Who answers?
1522121.title: Stalker Much?

15221212.content:
Somewhat to your dismay, it was Cora that answered the door. "Hi (your name)!" She says cheerfully.



"Hi." You say "Is Chloe ready?"



"She's in the shower right now. Why don't you come sit in the livingroom?"



You reluctantly do so, sitting on one end of the sofa while Cora sits on the other. "So, what are you coming over here every day for?" Cora asks as she scoots a little closer. "She's helping me with chemistry class in school." You say. "Is it true you almost blew up the school?" She asks, getting even closer. "No!" You say "All I did was mix the wrong chemicals and set off the smoke alarm, there were no flames, or explosions, or anything." By now Cora is directly next to you, brushing herself against your arm.




"You know what?" You say, standing up. "The recliner looks more comfortable, so I think I'll sit there instead." You had hoped that would give Cora a hint, but instead she just comes over to you and sits in your lap. She swings her legs over the arm of the chair and lays her head against your chest. You found this situation to be extremely uncomfortable, and wondered how you could get her off of you, without hurting her feelings. You couldn't stand the sight of a girl crying, especially a youger one.



Cora looks up at you, and stares directly into your eyes with her bright green ones. For what felt like forever, you just stare back at her, wanting to push her off, but you couldn't move, as though Cora held you in some hypnotic trance. This goes on for a while longer, until Cora begins to lean closer and closer to you, and....
15221212.title: Awkward.....

152212122.content:
The sound of footsteps coming down the stairs snaps you out of your trance. You have enough time to put your hands on her shoulders and push her away from you.


"Hey, no fair!" says Cora. "I almost had you!"


"Is that so?" says a voice coming from the bottom of the staircase. You look up and see Chloe with her hands on her hips, glaring at her little sister. "Get off of him." she says sternly.


"No way!" Cora says, hugging you tightly. "He's mine!"


"Get off of him, NOW!" Chloe says with a tone of voice that scared even you. At once, Cora gets off of your lap and goes up the stairs, mumbling to herself.


"You alright?" asks Chloe.


"I'm just fine," you say. "Quick question: what did she mean by 'I almost had you?'"


"Cat furries can manipulate people by staring into their eyes." she explains. "She just learned how to do it, so she's been abusing it a lot lately. It doesn't work on other cats, though, so she hasn't tried it on me or on Mom."


"I can't help but think that she's gonna try it again." you say.


"I would suggest getting contacts." she replies.


Taking her advice seriously, you get yourself some contacts that night after your study session.


Two weeks go by, and you start to get better and better at Chemistry. Ms. T, seeing the improvement, decides to decrease the amount of tutoring sessions from Monday through Friday to Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. It was a bittersweet thing; you didn't see Chloe as often, but you also didn't see Cora as often either. She had continued to pursue you, but you had gotten the hang of avoiding her.


One Friday afternoon, you get your first test back from Ms. T. Judging by the smile she had on her face, you must have gotten a good grade. You look over the test and are pleased to see that you only got two questions wrong. After school, you find Chloe and tell her the good news.


"Congratulations!" she says. "I knew you could do it."


"It's only because you helped." you say.


"You know, what? We should celebrate." she says. "Why don't we go out tonight? My treat."


You repress the urge to jump for joy. "Where should we go?" you ask.
152212122.title: In the Nick of Time

choices: This is going too far, tell Chloe about Cora
Keep quiet, it's not worth the pain
1522121222.content:
"How about we go out for dinner tonight?" Says Chloe. "I know this great place in town."



"Sounds good." You say "I'll see you at seven."



When you get home, you see Ramona waiting in front of your house. "What took you so long?" "Me and Chloe were just planning a little celebration for tonight." "So you finally got a date?" You hesitate "Well, I'm not sure if you could call it a date. Chloe said she doesn't consider me her boyfriend."



"But apparently her sister does. Have you thought about what you're going to do about her?"



"I don't know what I can do. The other day she tried to hypnotise me, and now I have to wear contacts to protect myself."



"I thought your eyes looked different. Anyway, what if she tries something tonight?"



You hadn't thought of that. What if Cora did try something tonight? Maybe Chloe would make sure she didn't find out about your, for lack of a better word, date with her. "If she does, I'm sure Chloe will take care of her." You bid farewell to Ramona as you head inside.



That night, you wait outside Chloe's house, not wanting to knock, for fear of Cora answering the door. Instead, you call Chloe on your cell phone, and tell her you're outside.A few minutes later, she comes out, with Cora nowhere in sight. "So, where's your car?" You ask "I thought we could walk, since it's such a nice night."



You walk throught the streetlamp lit streets downtown to a nice looking restaraunt. The two of you are seated at a table in the middle of the dinningroom and wait for your food to arrive. After ten minutes of waiting, Chloe has to go to the bathroom. As soon as she enters the ladies room, you see Cora coming towards your table, and sits in Chloe's seat.



"How the hell did you get in here?"



"I'm a cat, silently stalking my prey comes natural to me. I thought my sister said you weren't her boyfriend?"



"Look, Cora, can't you see that i'm not interested in you? I'm in high school and you're in middle school. It just wouldn't be right for us to be together."



"Why not? Legally, we're both teenagers, and I always liked older guys."



"I'm sorry Cora, but nothing you do will me me even consider going out with you."



You see Cora's eyes widen as she attempts her hypnosis trick again. "I'm going to make you love me, wether you like it or not." You cross your arms and smirk. "That isn't going to work again, Cora. I'm wearing contacts from here on out."



Cora Growls in frustration, then sees Chloe coming out of the bathroom. She quickly ducks under the table, hidden by the tablecloth. Then you feel multiple sharp pains sting your legs as Cora graps it, her claws digging through your pants. "You tell her I'm here, and I bite."



Finally, your food arrives just as Chloe reaches the table. It was rather difficult to eat with Cora's razor sharp claws digging into your foreleg. Then, you feel Cora removes one hand from your leg, and slowly undo your zipper.
1522121222.title: She Just Can't Take A Hint

15221212221.content:
The minute you feel your zipper going down, you start to freeze. Chloe sees the nervousness in your face.


"Are you okay?" she asks. At that moment, Cora puts the tips of her claws on you legs again, as a warning of what would happen if you told. At this point, however, you don't care. You're not gonna have dinner with your crush while being blown by her thirteen year old sister underneath the table.


"Okay, this has gone far enough!" you say, taking Chloe by surprise.You reach your hands under the table and pinch Cora's arms as hard as you can.


"OW!" she says, releasing you out of reflex, her head bumping the table.


"What the hell!?" says Chloe as she looks underneath the tablecloth to see her little sister.


"Hey, big sis." she says. Chloe looks at your legs and sees the holes in your pants and the small bloodstains.


"What did you do to him!?" she asked.


"She dug her claws into my legs to keep me from telling you she was here." you say. "She threatened to bite me if I did."


"That's it, Cora! You're going home right now!" Chloe says. "And I will be telling Mom."


"What!?" Cora says. "Come on, big sis. Please don't tell her."


"Consider yourself lucky," she says. "I could've told her about the time you almost hypnotized him, now get your ass home!"


Cora obediently turns around an heads home, knowing that Chloe had mastered her transformation ability while she hadn't. After calming down, she turns her attention to you.


"I'd like to finish our dinner, but I need to take you to my place and check your wounds." she says. Chloe pays the bill and carries you home in her twenty-foot form. When you get back to the house, you see Cora being reprimanded by her mother. You also see a belt in her hand and red marks on Cora's arms. In Chloe's room, she lays you down on her bed and rolls up your pants.


"Oh, my God," she says. "I'm so sorry she did this to you."


"It's okay." you say.


"I can fix this," she says. "You're lucky I'm a cat."


"Why?" you ask. You get your answer when Chloe licks each claw mark in your leg. A few seconds later, the pain stops, and the wounds fade.


"Cat furries can heal small wounds by licking them." she explains. "You know, you were really brave to risk getting bitten just to get Cora off of you. And those marks were pretty bad, too."


"Well," you say. "I never really considered myself to be brave."


"Well you are." she says. "It's one of the things I like about you." Before you can respond, Chloe kisses you, wrapping her arms around you. The kiss continues for awhile until someone opens the door.
15221212221.title: Risk It!

choices: "Just stay away from me from now on. Got it?"
152212122211.content:
Needless to say, you were quite surprised when Chloe suddenly kissed you. Looks like she does consider you her boyfriend now. For a few moments, you jst sat there and enjoyed it, but you hear the door open, and you both turn to see Chloe's mom standing there with a smile on her face.



"Aww, how sweet."



"Mom! Uh...I can explain!"



"It's alright Chloe. It's not like I can really be upset with you anyway, I' kissed plenty of boys at your age. Besides, I thought the two of you would make a nice couple."



Chloe sighs with relief as you ask "What happened to Cora?"




"Let's just say she won't be sitting down any time soon." Says Chloe's mom "Also..." She calls downstairs for Cora to come up. When Cora reaches the door, She appears to genuinely regret what she did, and not just because of the punishment she recieved for it. Her lower lip is quivering and her eyes are big and teary.




"I'm sorry, (your name). I just wanted you to like me as much as i did you."



While she really did seem sincere, part of you was still mad at her for the injuries she gave you. But, then again, she was just a kid, and a furry one at that. You suppose this sort of behavior is normal at her age. What should you say?
152212122211.title: It's Chloe and Cora's mom

1522121222111.content:
Cora grins like the chesire cat on hearing that you forgive her. She launches herself forward, grabbing you in a hug as she cries into your chest. You lightly pat her back as both Chloe and her mom go "Awww".But their mother's face suddenly turns stern.



"Don't think this will get you out of your punishment, young lady. You're still grounded for the next two weeks."



Cora nods.



As their mother go back downstairs, Cora looks up at you and says "If there's anything I can do to make it up to you, tell me, and i'll do it." You were about to decline her offer, when you get an idea. "Come to think of it, there is something you can do."



Cora's eyes light up eagerly. "What is it? Anything!"



"Well, there's this guy at school who is always a total prick to me. His name is Luke..."



The next day, as you were walking to school, just as you expected, you see Luke coming towards you. Ramona was home with a cold, which is why he was brave enough to come up to you now. "Hey monkey boy, what are you doing with my girl?"



"You're girl?"



"You heard me, Chloe is my girlfriend, what's she doing with a hairless ape like you?"



"For your information, chloe apparently doesn't think of her self as "your girl", because last night she kissed me, full on the lips."



"WHAT!?"



"That's right." You say, putting your fingers to your lips and making a kissing sound. "Mmmm, strawberries."



"That's it, now you're gonna get it!"



Luke raised hisa fist, but turns around when he feels a tap on his shoulder. There stood Cora, just as you had planned. "Excuse me, are you Luke?" She asks politely. "Yeah, what do you want shrimp?" Chloe's eyes widen as she begins her hypnosis routine. Soon, Luke just satands there, still as a statue, lost in a trance.



"What now, (your name)?" Cora asks.



"I think some sort of punishment is due for Luke." You say. "Make him do something humiliating, and in public, right here, in front of the whole school."



Cora smiles wickedly as she come sup with an idea. "Luke, when I finish speaking, you will...."
1522121222111.title: Payback Time

choices: "Oh, come here." You extend your arms. (Forgiven and forgotten)
"Fine, but please dont do it again." (Forgiven and bitter)
152212122212.content:
Without you guys knowing, the door opens slowly. It doesn't even creak at it is now fully open. Behind the door was Cora, who has teary eyes and a wet muzzle. Her eyes were closed so she couldn't see what you were doing.

"(your name), I... (gasp)" she looks at you and starts to cry again. You didn't notice until you slightly squinted and saw a figure in the doorway. You realize its Cora. Her crying forced you to escape your kiss with Chloe and she looks back, sorta blushing because of that interference.

"Uh... Cora, what you saw is an illusion because of your tears," she says in a sort of hypnotic voice.

"I already know what happened. I just came to apologize to (your name)."

"Fine, but make it quick."

Cora walks towards you with her head down. You then see their mother come into the front of the door.

"(Your name), I'm so sorry. I guess I was a bit too obsessive that I lost sight of the wrong that I was doing. Please, I hope you can forgive me. I know I don't deserve it, but please."

You look at her big eyes. You know Cora isn't trying to hypnotize you, but that look is enough for you to let go of your grudge. Still, what she did is too reprehensible. You try to find it in your heart to forgive her though. After all, she's only 13. You took a moment and finally said...
152212122212.title: More awkward than what it has to be

choices: "Will you agree to be my boyfriend?"
1522121222121.content:
"(Gasp), [your name]..!" Cora lunged toward you and starts gripping you tightly and sobbing into your chest, being really happy you forgave her. The other cats think that his was cute and go, "Awww."

"Consider yourself lucky that he forgave you, Cora," Chloe said.

"That still doesn't excuse you for your punishment, young lady," their mother says.

"What?" you say. "Ms. Benson, please. It was just a minor mistake. Trust me, I've seen worse. Don't punish Cora for this."

"What!?" came from both Chloe and her mother. Cora looks up at you with a grateful expression.

"[Your name], do you really mean that?"

"Look, Cora. I can forgive the fact that you were jealous of your sister, hypnotizing me to kissing you, and even when you scraped me just a few minutes ago. But I don't think that deserves a beating and punishment like that." Meanwhile, you rubbed get arms that are still red from the belt slaps.

It took a moment, but their mother finally obliged. "(Sigh) All right, [your name]. Cora, you're lucky he's a very forgiving person. Cora you are no longer punished."

She starts crying again and hugs you tightly. "Oh, thank you, [your name]! Thank you, thank you, thank you!"

You pet her head. Chloe was smiling, but was a bit unconvinced since Cora has been hogging and hugging you the whole time. Minutes later, she leaves.

"And that's another thing I like about you, [your name]," Chloe says. "I'm glad I have you."

"Well, I'm just a guy who thinks everyone is venial."

"So, [your name]..."
1522121222121.title: "Oh, come here." You extend your arms. ...

choices: Lynette catches you staring at her
Lynette makes a move on you first!
153.content:
That evening, you found the address Ms. T had given you. You ring the doorbell, and hear a voice on the other side of the door say "Luke, can you get that?" Wait do whoever said that just say Luke? No, it couldn't be. It had to be some sort of coincidence. There's no way your luck could be that bad, right? But when the door opens, you see that it most certainly is.


"Oh, no fucking way."


Standing in the doorway in front of you, was none other than your worst enemy, Luke. "What do you want, Monkey?" You clench your fist, but restrain yourself from hitting him. "Look, Luke, I'm no more happy about this than you, believe me. But Ms. T put us together, so lets get this overwrite, without killing each other."


"What the he'll are you talking about? I don't have Ms. T."


Just then, you hear footsteps coming down the stairs behind Luke. "Oh, that must be the boy from school Ms. T assigned me." You look over Luke's shoulder to see a tall fox girl with long, blonde hair and a body that could only be described as "heavenly" as just looking at her curvaceous figure instantly caused your pants to suddenly become tighter.


The gorgeous vixen pushes Luke away as she greets you. " Hi, I'm Lynette, your new tutor." You can only stutter as you try to return her greeting. "H..h..h. hi, I'm (y.. your name)." Lynette giggles, finding your shyness kind of cute. " Well then, if you'll come with me, we've got a lot of work to do." She leads you to the dining room, and you place your text and note books on the table. As Lynette begins to explain the periodic table of Bestia, you can't help but not really listen, but instead focus on her beautiful body, nodding when ever she says something.


You don't normally let your hormones control you like this, but there was something about Lynette, something enchanting, that seemed like she had cast some kind of spell over you. You suddenly have the urge to reach out and make a move on her. What little of your common sense that remained struggled desperately to snap you out of your stupor, but just before it gave out...
153.title: It's Luke's house (oh crap)

1531.content:
You really want to pay attention to what Lynette is saying, lest you burn the whole school down next time you mix two chemicals together, but you can't get over how pretty she is. Eventually, Lynette notices your absent-mindedness, and chuckles.


"You know," she says, "Staring at me isn't going to help you learn any of this stuff."


You immediately snap out of your trance. "I'm sorry, I-I just... I mean-"


"It's fine," says Lynette, "I get that from younger guys all the time. It's this pheromone my body gives off. All vixens have it, and while most can control it by the time they're sixteen, I'm having a little trouble getting it under control."


"Really?" you ask. "How old are you?"


"Eighteen," she says, "so I'm two years behind my... 'deadline,' for lack of a better word. I'll try not to distract you too much."


So, Lynette resumes her lesson, and you're much more attentive this time. You're able to understand the material more, and you're confident that you won't set off another smoke alarm in class. By the time you two were done, it was nine thirty, so you needed to get home.


"I should be going, Lynette," you say. "Thanks for helping me out."


"Oh, it's no trouble at all," she says. "It was kind of fun tutoring you. Before you go, let me give you something."


Lynette quickly grabs a pen and jots down something on a piece of paper, then she hands it to you. "I'll see you around," she says with a smile.


You smile back at her and head back home. Once you get in your room and settle in, you look at the paper Lynette gave you.

(924)-145-2983
Text me so I have your number.

You can't believe that Lynnete just gave you her number! Sure, it was most likely so you could contact her if you needed more help, but still! You immediately text Lynette so she could have your number.
1531.title: Next Time, Be a Little More Subtle

15311.content:
The following morning, as you and Ramona walked to school, Ramona asked "So I heard you got stuck with Captain Dickhead as a tutor, huh?" You chuckle at Ramona's name for Luke. "Actually, it's his sister that's tutoring me." Ramona looks at you in disbelief. "No way! Lynette is your tutor?"


"Yeah. What about it?"


"Lynette is like, the queen of the school! She's captain of the cheerleading squad, president of the senior class, and the most popular girl in school! Just about every girl in school is friends with her, even the nerdy ones! Do you know what this means?"


You shake your head.


"It means that if you can get her to fall for you, you'd be set for your whole life in school! Did you notice her making any hints or something at you last night?"


"No, actually. She noticed me staring at her awhile, but it was all down to business with her."


"Try sitting with her at lunch today. Maybe she'll make a move on you. If not, make one on her."


"Why is this such a big deal?"


"If you can get Lynette to officially claim you as her boyfriend, you won't have to worry about any other girls trying to violate you all the time. Not to mention, Luke will never bother you again. Everyone knows he's scared shitless of his sister."


That was reason enough to convince you to go along with the plan, so at lunch, you sat at Lynette's table, which was strangely deserted, other than you and her. "Hi Lynette, mind if I sit here?" "Sure, go ahead." Says Lynette, smiling. As you sit beside her you ask "So why are you sitting by yourself? I heard you're friends with everyone in the school."


Lynette nods "I just like my space is all. I'm not actually friends with everybody, there are some who are jealous of me. They've even tried spreading rumors about me." "What kind of rumors?" You ask "Like I've had plastic surgery, for one." She turns to you and gestures to her ample bosom. "I mean, really, do these look like implants to you?"


How do you reply?
15311.title: The next day...

choices: Pretty easy, this is gonna be cake!
Rather hard, but that won't stop you!
153112.content:
"Of course not," you say, making sure not to stare at Lynette's chest for too long.


"I know. It's ridiculous that people would want to say things like that," she says.


"Jealousy drives people to do stupid things," you say. "So, are you free for another study session tonight?"


"I think so," she says, whipping out her phone. "Let me check my schedule."


You notice that Lynette had a rather interesting wallpaper on her cell phone. "What's that?" you ask.


"Oh, it's a poster for this movie that's coming out this weekend," she says. "I'm really excited to see it. I love comedy movies!"


This is it. You have a chance to ask Lynette out and get her to fall for you.


"Well, I have nothing to do this weekend," you say. "I can go with you, if you want."


Lynette looks at you for a second, then smiles. "Sure, why not? I'll take you to the movies with you, but on one condition." she says.


"What's that?" you ask.


"Ms. T is giving your class a quiz on Friday," she explains. "She grades papers quick, so she'll have the quizzes done by the end of the day. If you can get an A minus or higher on that quiz, we can go to the movies together. If not, I'll be going solo. Deal?"


This was definitely a risk, but a risk worth taking. "Deal!" you say, and the two of you shake on it.


"So, on the topic of that study session tonight, it looks like I'm free, so I'll see you tonight." Lynette says.


That night, you make it over to Lynette's place and (thankfully) she is the one to answer the door this time. When you two get your books out and get to work that you find out that the material is...
153112.title: They Look Pretty Real to Me

1531122.content:
When you see what you will be studying tonight, you are a little shocked to see how complex it is. If it didn't say so on the book cover, you would have said you must have been given a college text book by mistake. Even so, you were determined to get that date with Lynetee, no matter the cost. Not that you were sure that it would really count as a date.


In all honesty, you didn't want to pull this off just because it would get you one step closer to relief from Luke and the rapid girls at wschool, though that was one reason. You really did find yourself attracted to Lynette, not just for her body, but for who she was. She was kind, caring, friendly, all good qualities for a woman. (Not to mention very hard to find in human females.)


You and Lynette dive straight into work, with her reading the text to you and you memorizing whatever you could. Afterwards, she would test you by asking you questions, and you would repeat what she had read. The whole ordeal was quite a workout on your brain, and by the end you felt like you had a small migraine. Hopefully, it would be worth it.


"Well, you did pretty good on my own little quiz, think you can do the same tomorrow?"



"I hope...I mean, I know so."


Lynette smiles at you warmnly


"That's what I like to hear. You better head home now and get some sleep. We don't want you tired on the day of the test."


You go home and collapse onto your bed, falling asleep within minutes. The next day, as you walk out the door to school, quickly running through what you learned last night in your head, you hear someone calling your name. You turn to see...
1531122.title: Why so Quizical?

choices: She's dressed in a normal t-shirt and jeans.
She decided to dress nicer than usual tonight.
15311221.content:
You grunt in frustration when you hear the familiar voice.


"I hope the fact that you just called me by my real name is a sign that you're less pissy than usual today," you say.


"You're dead wrong, chump!" says Luke. "I saw the way you were looking at my sister last night. You better stay away from her. I don't want to be known as the guy who's sister is dating a human, so don't try anything funny!"


You scoff at the fox. "Don't front, Luke," you say. "I know the real reason why you don't want me around your sister. You know that if she ends up liking me, then you couldn't mess with me anymore, 'cause if you did, you'd be facing the wrath of the one person you're afraid of."


"Aside from me, of course," says Ramona, appearing out of nowhere.


"Yeah, right!" says Luke. "You may be right about me being afraid of Lynette, but there's no way in hell that I'm afraid of you, Ramona."


Just then, Ramona barks loudly at Luke, showing her razor sharp teeth. Luke lets out a girlish scream, and you and Ramona laugh at the fox, hi-fiving each other as you both start to walk away from him.


Here it is, the moment where you test everything Lynette's taught you. The moment were you test if your worthy to go on a date with her, the moment that decides your fate! ........Okay, maybe that was going a little too far, but still, this Chem quiz is pretty damn important! As you get your first look at the paper in front of you, you recognize a lot of the stuff that you went over with Lynette. Maybe all the studying paid off. You blaze through the quiz, and when you finish, you look over all the questions again to weed out any stupid mistakes you may have made. You then hand the paper to Ms. T, hoping that you did good. You then had a good fifteen minutes to rest before class ended. Before you leave the classroom, Ms. T calls you to her desk.


"[Your name], Lynette told me about the little 'wager' you have with her, so I took the liberty of grading your quiz first," she says.


"Wow, she wasn't kidding when she said that you grade papers fast," you say.


Ms. T chuckles. "Anyway, I'm sure you'll be pleased with your score."


She hands you your quiz and you smile when you see that you got a near perfect score on it. "Good luck on your date tonight," she says with a wink.


After showing your grade to Lynette, she smiles and tells you to meet her at her house at 6 PM tonight. You do just that, knocking on her door as you arrive at her house at the specified time. When Lynette answers the door you see that...
15311221.title: Today? Of All Days!?

choices: Luke, trying to sabotage your date
Ramona, making sure everything gopes smoothly for you
153112212.content:
Your eyes widen in surprise when Lynette opens the door, and you see what she's wearing. She wore a short red dress that stopped half way down her thighs, and hugged her body rather tightly, showing off her curves, yet covering them at the same time. On her feet, she wore a pair of dark purple high heels, making her about five inches taller than you. You also notice that her tail was much bushier than usual, and slowly swayed back and forth behind her with an almost hypnotizing effect.


You didn't realize you had been staring until Lynette snaps her fingers infront of your face. "Like what you see?" She says with a small smirk. You quickly regain your senses and stutter. "Well...you look...ravishing tonight." Lynette giggles at awkwardness of your comment. "I like to look my best when I go out. You wou.ldn't happen to have a car, would you?" You shake your head.


"That's alright, the theater isn't too far away, and it's a nice night, so we can walk."


As you both walk down the start lit streets, you can't help but admire the way Lynette's hips swayed from side to side as she walked, not to mention...her rather lovely rear. (Not that you would ever say that out loud) You wonder if she would miond if you were to wrap your arm around her waist, but to your surprise, she wraps her arm around you instead.


"Better stick close. Don't need us getting seperated in the dark."


You rather enjoyed the feeling of her fur, plus the silk of her dress rubbing aginst you, so needless to say, you didn't complain.When you reach the theater, you were going to buy tickets for the both of you, but lynette insisted on paying for her own. "You don't have to act like such a gentleman around me." She said " I can get my own stuff."


As the two of yoiu watched the movie you wonder if this would be a good time to try and sneak a kiss from Lynette. PArt of you thought now would be the best timew to try, while your other half thought it was only the first date (if you could call it that) and trying it now would be going too far.


Unknown to you, a mysterious figure in a large trenchcoat, hat, and glasses sits directly behind you and Lynette. Who is this suspicious character?
153112212.title: (Insert Wolf-Whistle Here)

1531122121.content:
Oh crap, it's Luke. He looks really geeky in the glasses so you can't help but snicker at him. Lynette didn't notice as this was a comedy movie. You control yourself and see Luke making a hand motion near his neck.
"Really..." you thought. "He's gotta be desperate to ruin a date." Hang on a sec. This is your date he trying to ruin!!! You jerk your thumb to get him to leave, but he hands you a piece of paper with a note.
"Tell my sis that you need to use the restroom and we'll settle this outside. If you don't, I'll force your head near her shoulder and I drool on her making it seem like you did it."
You glare at Luke, but are unsure of what you should do. It would be bad to leave the room with Luke, but you didn't want him to ruin your date, so you decide to...
1531122121.title: Why is this dipshit here of all places?

choices: Just then, there's a knock at the door
1532.content:
Just before your self control gives out, you are suddenly snapped out of it when Lynette says in a seductive tone "What do you say we take this up to my room?" Normally you would question her as to why she'd invite you to her room, but you're so entranced by her beauty that you eagerly accept without even thinking.

As you follow her upstairs, you can't help but watch the swaying of her hips and her perky rump. When you step inside her room, she locks the door behind you. "I bet you didn't know we vixens give off a pheromone that hypnotizes any males who breathe it, even human ones." She sits down on her bed and motions for you to join her. As you do so, she continues "I know Ms. T assigned us together to study, but i can't help myself. I mean, here i have the new human boy all to myself, and i know you're a virgin too, I can smell it on you."

She takes your hand and places it on her chest. "Can you feel my heart racing?" You nod, but you're really more focused on the softness of her breasts. "Forgive me for being so forward, but pretty much what I'm trying to say is...wanna do me?"
1532.title: Lynette makes a move on you first!

choices: "...we could go to a love hotel."
"...we could go on a real date."
15322.content:
Lynette scoots closer to you with a soft smile on her face.

"I..." you hesitate, unsure of what to say.

"You don't have to rush your decision," the vixen assures you. "I won't force you if you say no. While I do want this, I don't want to make you do something you don't want to do."

That last statement eases your nerves a little, but right when you're about to answer, you hear a knock on the door. "Lynette?" a female voice called out.

The fox quickly jumps out of the bed and rushes to unlock her bedroom door. "Coming!" she answered. She opened the door, revealing a red vixen with long hair that was the same jet black as Luke's. Judging from what she was wearing, she seemed to be a nurse.

"How was work, Mom?" Lynette asked.

"Same old, same old," the older fox answered. She then looked behind your daughter and saw you sitting quietly on the bed. "Oh? Is this the new human student I've heard about?"

Lynette nodded. "Yeah, Ms. T asked me to help tutor him."

"Nice to meet you, Ms..." you say, forgetting Luke and Lynette's last name.

"Oh, just call me Liane, dear," she chuckles with a dismissive wave. "No need for formalities. Well, I'll leave you kids to it," she looks at her daughter one last time before leaving, "and don't forget our rule, Lynette."

"Yes, mother," the young vixen says dejectedly as her mother leaves, and she shuts the door once she's gone. "Sorry about that. I didn't know my mom would be home early."

"If you don't mind my asking," you say, "what's this 'rule' she mentioned?"

"Well, my parents are pretty open-minded about sex, but the only rule they have is that I can't do it while either of them are in the house. It's not bad, considering my mom works late as a nurse, and my dad travels frequently, but when plans change, it kinda sucks when I have things planned." She looks back at you. "I guess we'll have to do this some other time, assuming you were going to say yes, of course."

You give her a nod of understanding.

"I'm... sorry for using my pheromone on you," she sighed. "I kinda got caught up in the fact that I had you to myself, and I thought that using it would be the best way to get you up here and listen to my offer. Just know that I had no intention of taking things further if you said no. As much as I wanted you to say yes, I still wanted the decision to be yours at the end of it all."

You chuckle. "Well, thanks for letting me have that," you say gratefully. "I was afraid that you'd be the type that would still try to take me."

Lynette shakes her head. "Trust me, I respect a male's free will. Although, I feel I should at least give you something to make up for the lost opportunity." She leans in and plants a soft kiss on your lips that lasted for a few seconds. "Still, since Ms. T wanted us to use these days for studying, so we should set our own separate date so you can still learn what you need to learn."

"Sounds good to me," you say.

"So you're saying that you're willing to give me a shot?" she asks.

You nod. "Yeah. I mean, you seem to be really nice, so why not?"

Lynette smiles and gives you a warm hug. "Thanks. We have Friday night off, so I was thinking..."
15322.title: Talk About Bad Timing

153221.content:
For a second, you thought you had misheard Lynette. "What did you say?" "I said we could go to a love hotel. I know a pretty nice one in town. What do you say?" Do you really want to go through with this? You're pretty much scheduling to lose your virginity, and to a fox, no less.

Then again, from what you can tell, Lynette seems like a pretty nice girl. Plus when you're on a planet that's mAden of of mostly rabid females, having a girlfriend can come in handy. "Alright, let's do it." Lynette smiles and kisses you on the forehead. "Meet me here Friday night at seven."

Come the end of the week, you and Lynette are driving into town in her car. You pull up to a hotel with a large neon sign shaped like a heart. After Lynette parks the car, she turns to you and says "Are you ready for this?"

"As ready as I'll ever be."

Lynette reaches into the back seat and grabs a backpack she had put there before leaving her house. The two of you check in and head to your room. The instant you walk inside, Lynette picks you up bridal style, tosses you onto the bed, pounces on top of you, and latches your wrists to the bedposts with handcuffs.

"Damn! You've been planning this whole thing out, haven't you?"

"More than you know, handsome."

Giving you a sly smile and a wink, Lynette picks up her backpack and goes into the bathroom for about ten minutes, before coming out dressed in...
153221.title: Kinky Kitsune

info.brief_description: A human on a planet of furries? Not a good combination.
info.description:
You're just a regular human boy, aged 16, eleventh grade. When you were 13, a faraway planet of anthropomorphic animals came into contact with Earth and formed an alliance. Eventually, humans started taking vacations to the furry planet of Bestia and furries started vacations to Earth. Your family actually moved to Bestia two days ago, and that's where our story begins.

Before we begin, there's something you should know about Bestia.

You know that on Earth, the females outnumber the males, right? Well it's the same situation on Bestia, only to a bigger extreme. The planet's population is about the same as Earth's, but the ratio of females to males on Bestia is so large that males are pretty rare on the planet. Males on Bestia have the ability to enhance any of their five senses to extreme levels while the females have the ability to grow up to four times their size. Since males are rare on Bestia, sometimes girls end up fighting over a guy and they can be extremely aggressive. The school system on Bestia is the same as Earth's so you'll have no problem adapting to that.

There are quite a few people you'll come across in your new neighborhood.

Ramona Barks: 16 years old. A golden retriever furry. Ramona's your next-door neighbor and took it upon herself to be your first friend, and as such, she is very loyal to you. She has thick, blonde hair reaching past her shoulders and she's a bit thick in her body and curvy, but not fat. God help you if you call her fat.

Luke Morgan: 17 years old. A red fox furry with short black hair. You and Luke... aren't on the best of terms. The guy has a bit of a superiority complex, and he's not too fond of humans... or maybe it's just you specifically, but who knows? Maybe you two could look past your differences and become friends.

Chloe Benson: 16 years old. A light orange cat furry with blonde hair. You have a bit of a crush on her, but who could blame you? She's cute, smart, and is a pretty nice girl. Chloe values honesty above all else, and has little patience for liars. She also has a talent for singing, a talent that she inherited from her grandmother.

Colin Gray: 16 years old. A grey mouse furry. Colin is another friend of yours that you meet through Ramona. A whiz with mechanics, Colin is quite the smart guy, but he is a little bit of a wimp, and most girls consider other options before going after him. Poor guy.

Eileen Gray: 18 years old. Colin's older sister. A white mouse furry with red hair. Eileen is the second most popular girl in your school's senior class. She takes pride in the large number of guys she's seduced and slept with, and she sees each guy as another prize. The only things she hasn't managed to do was claim a virgin, and claim a human. Unfortunately for you, you happen to be both.

Cora Benson: 13 years old. Chloe's little sister, who is practically a mini version of Chloe. She's quite the mischievous troublemaker, and she's taken quite a liking to you, despite the age gap. (Only exists in some storylines)

Claire Benson: 32 years old. Chloe's mother. Despite her age, she looks quite young, so much so that she and Chloe are often mistaken for twins. Claire had Chloe when she was 16, and was left by her boyfriend to raise the little kitten on her own. Despite her hardship, she's still a loving mother.

Lynette Morgan: 18 years old. Luke's older sister. Lynette is the most popular girl in the senior class, and is the only person that Luke is afraid of. Despite her popularity and good looks, Lynette is still very smart with impeccable grades. She's basically the Chloe of the senior class.

Lucy Morgan: 17 years old. Luke and Lynette's cousin. A fox furry with gold fur and purple hair. Unlike Luke, Lucy is really fascinated by humans and human culture.

Now, here are the rules of this interactive.

Please make the chapters coherent and easy to understand.

Keep the story going unless it's necessary to end it.

Sex is allowed, and you can be descriptive if you want.

Vore.... well, while this used to be allowed, since it hasn't really been used in the story and I don't have much of a taste for it anyway, I've decided to disallow it.

If you love the story, add a chapter.

If you think the story is good, but needs improvement, add!

If you hate the story, add and make it something you'd like.

If you would like, you can send messages to me about how this story is, and check out my portfolio for more stories!

ENJOY!

EDIT: 8/20/12: As of today, this story has reached 100 chapters and reached its first anniversary on this site!

EDIT: 9/13/12: As of this edit, this story has reached over 2000 views! Thanks to all the readers!

EDIT: 5/10/12: I just realized that this interactive reached 200 chapters over a week ago. A little late acknowledgement, but awesome!
